http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/duplicator/RegisterEntityClass Shared This allows you to specify a specific function to be run when your SENT is pasted with the duplicator, instead of relying on the generic automatic functions.
Note: Automatically calls {{LibraryFunction|duplicator|Allow}}. string name: The ClassName of the entity you wish to register a factory for function function: The factory function you want to have called. It should have the arguments (Player, ...) where ... is whatever arguments you request to be passed. vararg args: A list of arguments you want passed from the duplication data table.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/duplicator/RegisterEntityModifier Shared This allows you to register tweaks to entities. For instance, if you were making an "unbreakable" addon, you would use this to enable saving the "unbreakable" state of entities between duplications.
This function registers a piece of generic code that is run on all entities with this modifier. In order to have it actually run, use {{LibraryFunction|duplicator|StoreEntityModifier}}. string _name_: An identifier for your modification. This is not limited, so be verbose. "Person's 'Unbreakable' mod" is far less likely to cause conflicts than "unbreakable" function _function_: The function to be called for your modification. It should have the arguments (Player, Entity, Data), where data is what you pass to {{LibraryFunction|duplicator|StoreEntityModifier}}.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/duplicator/RemoveMapCreatedEntities Server Help to remove certain map created entities before creating the saved entities This is obviously so we don't get duplicate props everywhere. It should be called before calling Paste.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/duplicator/SetLocalAng Shared "When a copy is copied it will be translated according to these. If you set them - make sure to set them back to 0 0 0!"
Angle v: The angle to offset all pastes from

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/duplicator/SetLocalPos Shared "When a copy is copied it will be translated according to these. If you set them - make sure to set them back to 0 0 0!"
Vector v: The position to offset all pastes from

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/duplicator/StoreEntityModifier Server Stores an entity modifier into an entity for saving
Entity entity: The entity to store modifier in
string name: Unique modifier name
table data: Modifier data

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/duplicator/WorkoutSize Server "Work out the AABB size"
table Ents: A table of entity duplication datums.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/EFFECT/Init Client Called when the effect is created.
CEffectData effectData: The effect data used to create the effect.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/EFFECT/Render Client Called when the effect should be rendered.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/EFFECT/Think Client Called when then effect should think, return false to kill the effect.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/effects/Create Client Returns the table of the effect specified.
string name: Effect name.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/effects/Register Client Registers a new effect.
table effect_table: Effect table.
string name: Effect name.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/engine/ActiveGamemode Shared Returns the name of the currently running gamemode.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/engine/CloseServer Server Closes the server and completely exits. This is only functional when running in server test mode (launch option -systemtest). Server test mode is used internally at Facepunch as part of the build process to make sure that the dedicated servers aren't crashing on startup.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/engine/GetAddons Shared Gets the addons you have downloaded from the workshop.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/engine/GetGamemodes Shared Returns a table containing info for all installed gamemodes

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/engine/GetGames Shared Returns an array of tables corresponding to all games from which Garry's Mod supports mounting content. The "mounted" and "installed" values currently do not work correctly serverside on dedicated servers. Some games will always report true while others will always report false.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/engine/IsPlayingDemo Client Returns true if we're currently playing a demo. You will notice that there's no server-side version of this. That's because there is no server when playing a demo. Demos are both recorded and played back purely clientside.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/engine/IsRecordingDemo Client Returns true if the game is currently recording a demo file (.dem) using gm_demo

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/engine/LightStyle Server This is a direct binding to the function engine->LightStyle. This function allows you to change the default light style of the map - so you can make lighting lighter or darker. Youll need to call {{LibraryFunction|render|RedownloadAllLightmaps}} clientside to refresh the lightmaps to this new color.
number lightstyle: The lightstyle to edit. If you want to edit map lighting, you want to set this to 0.
string pattern: The pattern to change the lightstyle to. "a" is the darkest, "z" is the brightest. You can use stuff like "abcxyz" to make flashing patterns. The normal brightness for a map is "m".

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/engine/OpenDupe Client Loads a duplication from the local filesystem.
string dupeName: Name of the file. e.g, engine.OpenDupe("dupes/8b809dd7a1a9a375e75be01cdc12e61f.dupe")

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/engine/SetMounted Shared Sets the mounting options for mountable content.
string depotID: The depot id of the game to mount.
boolean doMount: The mount state, true to mount, false to unmount
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/engine/TickInterval Shared Returns the number of seconds between each gametick.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/engine/WriteSave Client Stores savedata into the game (can be loaded using the LoadGame menu)
string saveData: Data generated by gmsave.SaveMap
string name: Name the save will have.
number time: When the save was saved during the game (Put CurTime here)
string map: The map the save is used for.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/ENTITY/AcceptInput Server Called when another entity fires an event to this entity.
string inputName: The name of the input that was triggered.
Entity activator: The initial cause for the input getting triggered.
Entity called: The entity that directly trigger the input.
string data: The data passed.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/Activate Shared Activates the entity. This needs to be used on some entities (like constraints) after being spawned.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/AddCallback Shared Add a callback function to a specific event. This is used instead of hooks to avoid calling empty functions unnecessarily.
string HookType: One of the following: * "OnAngleChange" - called whenever the entity angles change * "BuildBonePositions" - called whenever the bones are being built * "PhysicsCollide" - called when the physics collide
function func: The function to call

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/AddEffects Shared Applies an engine effect to an entity.
number effectEnum: The effect, see {{Enum|EF}}.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/AddEFlags Shared Adds engine flags.
number flag: Engine flag to add, see [[Enums/EFL|EFL_ enumerations]]

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/AlignAngles Shared Rotates an object so that it's angles are aligned to the ones inputed.
Angle from: Unknown.
Angle to: Unknown.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/BecomeRagdollOnClient Client Spawns a ragdoll for the entity, and makes the entity invisible.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/Blocked Server Dispatches blocked events to this entity's blocked handler. This is an internal function and only useful when interacting with entities like func_movelinear.
Entity entity: The entity that is blocking us

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/BoneLength Shared This function takes the boneID and returns the length of it in an unrounded decimal
number boneID: The ID of the bone you want the length of. You may want to get the length of the next bone ( boneID + 1 ) for decent results
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/BoundingRadius Shared Returns the distance between the center of the bounding box and the furthest bounding box corner.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/ENTITY/BuildBonePositions Client Called when the bones of the entity should be updated, see the note.
number boneCount: The number of bones the entity has.
number physBoneCount: The number of physics bones the entity has.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/CallOnRemove Shared Causes a specified function to be run if the entity is removed by any means.
string identifier: Identifier of the function within CallOnRemove
function removeFunc: Function to be called on remove
any argn...: Optional arguments to pass to removeFunc
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/ClearPoseParameters Shared Resets all pose parameters such as aim_yaw, aim_pitch and rotation.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/CreatedByMap Server Returns whether the entity was created by map or not.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/CreateParticleEffect Client Creates a clientside particle system attached to the entity.
string particle: The particle name to create
number attachment: Attachment ID to attach the particle to
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/CreateShadow Shared Draws the shadow of an entity.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/DeleteOnRemove Server Whenever the entity is removed, entityToRemove will be removed also.
Entity entityToRemove: The entity to be removed

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/DispatchTraceAttack Shared Performs a trace attack.
CTakeDamageInfo damageInfo: The damage to apply.
Vector traceStart: The start position of the trace.
Vector traceEnd: The end position of the trace.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/Disposition Server Returns the way one entity "feels" about another. Only used for NPCs.
Entity ent: The entity to get the disposition from.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/DontDeleteOnRemove Server This removes the argument entity from an ent's list of entities to 'delete on remove'
Entity entityToUnremove: The entity to be removed from the list of entities to delete
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/ENTITY/Draw Client Called when the entity should be drawn.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/DrawModel Client Running this function will draw the model of the attached entity. This can only be used in 3D rendering hooks, such as {{HookFunction|ENTITY|Draw}}

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/DrawShadow Shared Sets whenever an entities shadow should be drawn.
boolean shouldDraw: True to enable, false to disable shadow drawing.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/ENTITY/DrawTranslucent Client Called when the entity should be drawn translucently.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/DropToFloor Server Move an entity down until it collides with something.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/DTVar Shared {{Deprecated|Use [[Entity/NetworkVar]] instead. It offers the same functionality with more features.}} Sets up a self.dt.NAME alias for a [[DTVars| Data Table var]]
string Type: The type of the DTVar being set up. It can be one of the following: 'Int', 'Float', 'Vector', 'Angle', 'Bool', 'Entity' or 'String'
number ID: The ID of the DTVar. Can be between 0 and 3
string Name: Name by which you will refer to DTVar. It must be a valid variable name. (No spaces!)

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/EmitSound Shared Plays a sound on an entity. If run clientside, the sound will only be heard locally.
string soundName: The name of the sound to be played.
number soundLevel: A modifier for the distance this sound will reach, acceptable range is 0 to 511. 100 means no adjustment to the level.
number pitchPercent: The pitch applied to the sound. The acceptable range is from 0 to 255. 100 means the pitch is not changed.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/EnableCustomCollisions Shared Flags an entity as using custom lua defined collisions. Fixes entities having spongy player collisions or not hitting traces, such as after {{ClassFunction|Entity|PhysicsFromMesh}}
boolean useCustom: True to flag this entity
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/EnableMatrix Client Can be used to scale a model by a vector

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/ENTITY/EndTouch Server Called when the entity stops touching another entity.
Entity entity: The entity which was touched.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/EntIndex Shared Gets the unique entity index of an entity.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/Extinguish Server Extinguishes the entity if it is on fire.
Has no effect if called inside EntityTakeDamage (and the attacker is the flame that's hurting the entity)
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/EyeAngles Shared Returns the direction a player/npc/ragdoll is looking as a world-oriented angle.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/EyePos Shared Returns the position of an Player/NPC's view, or two vectors for ragdolls (one for each eye)

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/Fire Server Fires an entity's input
string input: The name of the input to fire
string param: The value to give to the input
number delay: Delay in seconds before firing

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/FireBullets Shared Fires a bullet.
table bulletInfo: The bullet data to be used. See [[Structures/Bullet|BulletInfo]] structure.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/FollowBone Shared Makes entity follow another entitys bone.
Entity parent: The entity to follow bone of
number boneid: The bone to follow
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/ForcePlayerDrop Shared Forces the Entity to be dropped, when it is being held by a player's gravitygun or physgun.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetAngles Shared Gets the angles of given entity.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetAttachment Shared Gets the orientation and position of the attachment by its id.
number attachmentId: The internal id of the attachment.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetAttachments Shared Returns a table containing all attachments of the given entitys model.
Returns an empty table or '''nil''' in case it's model has no attachments.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetBloodColor Server Returns the blood color this entity

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetBodygroup Shared Gets the exact value for specific bodygroup of given entity.
number id: The id of bodygroup to get value of.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetBodygroupCount Shared Returns the maximum value the bodygroup can have. Minimum value being 0.
number bodygroup: The id of bodygroup to retrieve maximum value of.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetBodygroupName Shared Gets the name of specific bodygroup for given entity.
number id: The id of bodygroup to get the name of.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetBodyGroups Shared Returns a list of all attachments of the entity.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetBoneCount Shared Returns the amount of bones in the entity.
Some entities are known to cause this function return '''nil''' instead of zero.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetBoneMatrix Shared Returns the matrix ( position / rotation transform ) of a given bone entity.
number boneID: The bone to retrieve matrix of. * Not supplying this argument returns unknown matrix * Bones clientside and serverside will differ

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetBoneName Shared Returns name of given bone id.
number index: ID of bone to lookup name of

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetBonePosition Shared Returns the position and angle of the given attachment, relative to the world.
number boneIndex: The bone index of the given attachment. See {{ClassFunction|Entity|LookupBone}}.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetChildBones Shared Returns ids of child bones of given bone.
number boneid: Bone id to lookup children of
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetClass Shared Returns the classname of a entity.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetCollisionGroup Shared Returns the entity's collision group
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetColor Shared Returns the color the entity is set to.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetConstrainedEntities Server Returns the two entities involved in a constraint ent
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetConstrainedPhysObjects Server Returns the two entities physobjects involved in a constraint ent

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetCreationID Server Returns entity's creation ID. Unlike {{ClassFunction|Entity|EntIndex}} or {{ClassFunction|Entity|MapCreationID}}, it will always increase and old values won't be reused.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetCreator Server Gets the creator of the SENT.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetCycle Shared Returns the frame of the currently played sequence.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetDTAngle Shared Get an angle stored in the datatable of the entity.
any key: Can be a string or number. Specifies what key to grab from datatable.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetDTBool Shared Get a boolean stored in the datatable of the entity.
any key: Can be a string or number. Specifies what key to grab from datatable.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetDTEntity Shared Get an entity stored in the datatable of the entity.
any key: Can be a string or number. Specifies what key to grab from datatable.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetDTFloat Shared Get a float stored in the datatable of the entity.
any key: Can be a string or number. Specifies what key to grab from datatable.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetDTInt Shared Get an integer stored in the datatable of the entity.
any key: Can be a string or number. Specifies what key to grab from datatable.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetDTString Shared Get a string stored in the datatable of the entity.
any key: Can be a string or number. Specifies what key to grab from datatable.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetDTVector Shared Get a vector stored in the datatable of the entity.
any key: Can be a string or number. Specifies what key to grab from datatable.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetFlexNum Shared Returns the number of flexes this entity has.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetForward Shared Returns the forward vector of the entity, as a normalized direction vector
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetFriction Server Returns how much friction an entity has. Entities default to 1 (100%) and can be higher or even negative.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetGravity Shared Gets the gravity multiplier of the entity.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetGroundEntity Shared Returns the object the entity is standing on.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetHitBoxBone Shared Gets the bone of a hit box
number hitbox: The number of the hit box
number group: The number of the hit box group

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetHitBoxBounds Shared Gets the bounding box of a hit box
number hitbox: The number of the hitbox
number group: The group of the hitbox

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetHitBoxCount Shared Gets how many hit boxes are in a given hit box group
number group: The number of the hit box group
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetHitBoxGroupCount Shared Returns the number of hit box groups that an entity has.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetInternalVariable Shared An interface for accessing internal save values on entities. This is similar to accessing an entity's save table. NOTE: This function seems to be broken.
string VariableName: Name of variable corresponding to an entity save value.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetKeyValues Server Returns a table containing all key values the entity has.

'''WARNING:''' This function is broken and will not return any useful info. If you want to get the key values, you'll have to use {{HookFunction|GM|EntityKeyValue}} hook.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetLocalAngles Shared Returns the rotation of the entity relative to its parent entity.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetLocalAngularVelocity Shared Returns the non-VPhysics angular velocity of the entity relative to its parent entity.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetLocalPos Shared Returns entity's position relative to it's parent.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetManipulateBoneAngles Shared Get the entity's angle manipulation of the given bone. This is relative to the default angle, so the angle is zero when unmodified.
number boneId: The bone's ID

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetManipulateBonePosition Shared Get the entity's position manipulation of the given bone. This is relative to the default position, so it is zero when unmodified.
number boneId: The bone's ID

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetManipulateBoneScale Shared Get the entity's scale manipulation of the given bone. Normal scale is Vector(1, 1, 1)
number boneId: The bone's ID
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetMaterial Shared Returns the material override for this entity.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetMaxHealth Server Gets the max health that the entity was given. It can be set via SetMaxHealth(amount)
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetModel Shared Gets the model of given entity.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetModelRadius Shared Gets the models radius.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetModelScale Shared Gets the selected entity's model scale.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetMoveCollide Shared Returns the move collide type of the entity. The move collide is the way a physics object reacts to hitting an object - will it bounce, slide?
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetMoveType Shared Returns the entity's movetype
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetName Server Returns the mapping name of this entity.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetNetworkedAngle Shared Returns a networked Angle value.
Can also be written as {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetNWAngle}}. string Index: The index of the networked Angle (can also be a number). Angle default: Value to return if no such networked var exists.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetNetworkedBool Shared Returns a networked boolean value.
Can also be written as {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetNWBool}}. string index: The index of the networked boolean (can also be a number). boolean default: Value to return if no such networked var exists.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetNetworkedEntity Shared Returns a networked Entity.
Can also be written as {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetNWEntity}}. string index: The index of the networked Entity (can also be a number). Entity default: Value to return if no such networked var exists.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetNetworkedFloat Shared Returns a networked float value.
Can also be written as {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetNWFloat}}. string index: The index of the networked float (can also be a number). number default: Value to return if no such networked var exists.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetNetworkedString Shared Returns a networked string value.
Can also be written as {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetNWString}}. string index: The index of the networked string (can also be a number). string default: Value to return if no such networked var exists.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetNetworkedVar Shared Returns a networked string value.
string key: The name of the networked var.
any default: Value to return if no such networked var exists.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetNetworkedVector Shared Returns a networked Vector value.
Can also be written as {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetNWVector}}. string index: The index of the networked boolean (can also be a number). Vector default: Value to return if no such networked var exists.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetNoDraw Shared Returns if the entity's rendering has been disabled
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetNumBodyGroups Shared Returns the body group count of the entity.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetNumPoseParameters Shared Returns amount of pose parameters the entity has.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetNWAngle Shared Returns a networked Angle value.
This is the short version of {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetNetworkedAngle}}. string index: The index of the networked Angle (can also be a number). Angle default: Value to return if no such networked var exists.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetNWBool Shared Returns a networked boolean value.
This is the short version of {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetNetworkedBool}}. string index: The index of the networked boolean (can also be a number). boolean default: Value to return if no such networked var exists.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetNWEntity Shared Returns a networked Entity.
This is the short version of {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetNetworkedEntity}}. string index: The index of the networked Entity (can also be a number). Entity default: Value to return if no such networked var exists.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetNWFloat Shared Returns a networked float value.
This is the short version of {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetNetworkedFloat}}. string index: The index of the networked boolean (can also be a number). number default: Value to return if no such networked var exists.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetNWInt Shared Returns a networked integer value.
This is the short version of [[Entity/GetNetworkedInt|Entity.GetNetworkedInt]]. string index: The index of the networked integer (can also be a number). number default: Value to return if no such networked var exists.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetNWString Shared Returns a networked string value.
This is the short version of {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetNetworkedString}}. string index: The index of the networked string (can also be a number). string default: Value to return if no such networked var exists.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetNWVector Shared Returns a networked Vector value.
This is the short version of {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetNetworkedVector}}. string index: The index of the networked Vector (can also be a number). Vector default: Value to return if no such networked var exists.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetOwner Shared Returns the owner entity of this entity.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetParent Shared Returns the parent entity of this entity.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetParentPhysNum Shared If the entity is parented to an entity that has a model with multiple physics objects (like a ragdoll), this is used to retrieve what physics object number the entity is parented to on it's parent.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetPhysicsAttacker Server Returns player who is claiming kills of physics damage the entity deals.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetPhysicsObject Shared Returns the entity's physics object, if the entity has physics
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetPhysicsObjectCount Shared Returns the number of physics object an entity has (usually 1 for non ragdolls)

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetPhysicsObjectNum Shared Returns a specific physics object from an entity with multiple (ragdolls)
number physNum: The number corresponding to the physobj to grab. Starts at 0
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetPos Shared Gets the position of entity in world.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetPoseParameter Shared Returns the pose parameter value
string name: Pose parameter name to look up

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetPoseParameterName Shared Returns name of given pose parameter
number id: Id of the pose paremeter

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetPoseParameterRange Shared Returns pose parameter range
number id: Pose parameter ID to look up
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetRenderMode Shared Returns the render mode of the entity.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetRight Shared Returns the rightward vector of the entity, as a normalized direction vector
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetSaveTable Shared Returns a table of save values for an entity.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetSequence Shared Return the index of the model sequence that is currently active for the entity.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetSequenceActivity Shared Return activity id out of sequence id. Opposite of {{ClassFunction|Entity|SelectWeightedSequence}}.
number seq: The sequence ID

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetSequenceName Shared Return the name of the sequence for the index provided. Refer to {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetSequence}} to find the current active sequence on this entity.
number index: The index of the sequence to look up.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetShouldServerRagdoll Shared Returns if entity should create a server ragdoll on death or a client one.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetSkin Shared Returns the skin index of the current skin.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetSolid Shared Returns solid type of an entity.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetTable Shared Returns the table that contains all values saved within the entity.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetTextures Shared Returns all the textures of entitys model.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetTransmitWithParent Shared Returns true if the TransmitWithParent flag is set or not.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetUp Shared Returns the upward vector of the entity, as a normalized direction vector

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetVar Shared Retrieves a value from entitys {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetTable}}.
string name: Name of variable to retrieve
any default: A default value to fallback to if we couldn't retrieve the value from entity
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetVelocity Shared Returns the directional velocity of the entity.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GetWorkshopID Server Returns ID of workshop addon that the entity is from.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GibBreakClient Shared Causes the entity to break into its current model's gibs, if it has any. The gibs will be spawned on the currently connected clients and will not be synchronised. Any clients that connect after this function is called will not see them. == Notes == * This does not remove or even hide the entity, you must do that yourself * If you are using this on a SEnt, make sure {{ClassFunction|Entity|PrecacheGibs}} is called at least once before this function is. * If called on the client, the entity will gib for that client only. * It is preferable to use this function instead of the server once, for performance reasons. == See Also == {{ClassFunction|Entity|GibBreakServer}}
Vector Force: The force to apply to the created gibs

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/GibBreakServer Shared Causes the entity to break into its current model's gibs, if it has any. The gibs will be spawned on the server and kept synchronised with all clients. == Notes == * This does not remove or even hide the entity, you must do that yourself * If you are using this on a SEnt, make sure {{ClassFunction|Entity|PrecacheGibs}} is called at least once before this function is. * While this function is shared, it does not appear to do anything on the client. * Large numbers of serverside gibs can cause lag since the server needs to treat each individual segment as an entity (ish). You can avoid this cost by spawning the gibs on the client == See Also == {{ClassFunction|Entity|GibBreakClient}}
Vector Force: The force to apply to the created gibs
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/Health Shared Returns the health of the entity.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/Ignite Server Sets the entity on fire.
number length: How long to keep the entity ignited. Not supplying this argument will not ignite the entity at all.
number radius: The radius of the ignition, will ignite everything around the entity that is in this radius.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/ENTITY/Initialize Shared Called when the entity is created.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/Input Server Fires input to the entity with the ability to make another entity responsible. Similar to {{ClassFunction|Entity|Fire}}
string input: The name of the input to fire
Entity activator: The entity that is directly responsible
Entity inflictor: The entity that is indirectly responsible (often a player)
any param: The value to give to the input. Can be a String, Float or Integer

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/InstallDataTable Shared Sets up Data Tables from entity to use with {{ClassFunction|Entity|NetworkVar}}. This is internal function and you shouldn't need to call it.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/IsConstrained Shared Returns true if the entity has constraints attached to it
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/IsConstraint Server Returns if entity is constraint or not

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/IsEFlagSet Shared Checks if given flag is set or not.
number flag: The engine flag to test, see [[Enums/EFL|EFL_ enumerations]]
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/IsInWorld Server Returns if the entity is within the world bounds.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/IsLineOfSightClear Shared Returns true if the target is in line of sight.
Vector target: The target to test. You can also supply an {{Type|Entity}} instead of a {{Type|Vector}}
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/IsNPC Shared Checks if the entity is a NPC or not.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/IsOnFire Shared Returns if the entity is on fire.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/IsOnGround Shared Returns if the entity is on ground.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/IsPlayer Shared Checks if the entity is a player or not.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/IsPlayerHolding Server Returns true if the entity is being held by a player. Either by Physics gun, Gravity gun or Use-key.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/IsRagdoll Shared Checks if the entity is a ragdoll.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/ENTITY/IsTranslucent Client Called whenever the entity should tell if it's translucent or not.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/IsValid Shared Returns if the entity is valid (ie not NULL). Instead of calling this directly it's a good idea instead to call [[Global/IsValid|IsValid]] 
IsValid( entity )
This not only checks whether the entity is valid - but also checks whether it's nil.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/IsVehicle Shared Checks if the entity is a vehicle or not.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/IsWeapon Shared Checks if the entity is a weapon or not.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/IsWorld Shared Returns if the entity is the map's Entity[0] worldspawn

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/ENTITY/KeyValue Server Called when the engine sets a value for this entity.
string key: The key that was affected.
string value: The new value.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/LocalToWorld Shared Converts a vector local to an entity into a worldspace vector
Vector lpos: The local vector

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/LookupAttachment Shared Gets the attachment index of the given attachment name, returns nothing if the attachment does not exist.
string attachmentName: The name of the attachment.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/LookupBone Shared Gets the bone index of the given bone name, returns nothing if the bone does not exist.
string boneName: The name of the bone.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/ManipulateBoneAngles Shared Sets custom bone angles
number BoneID: Index of the bone you want to manipulate
Angle Angle: Angle to apply

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/ManipulateBonePosition Shared Sets custom bone offsets
number BoneID: Index of the bone you want to manipulate
Vector Vector: Position vector to apply

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/ManipulateBoneScale Shared Sets custom bone scale
number BoneID: Index of the bone you want to manipulate
Vector Vector: Scale vector to apply

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/MapCreationID Server Returns entity's map creation ID. Unlike {{ClassFunction|Entity|EntIndex}} or {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetCreationID}}, it will always be the same on same map, no matter how much you clean up or restart it.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/MuzzleFlash Shared Fires the muzzle flash effect of the weapon the entity is carrying. This only creates a light effect and is often called alongside {{ClassFunction|Weapon|SendWeaponAnim}}

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/NearestPoint Shared Performs a Ray OBBox intersection with the entity and returns the hit position.
Vector position: The vector to start the intersection from.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/NetworkVar Shared Creates a network variable on the entity. This function should only be called in {{HookFunction|ENTITY|SetupDataTables}}.
string type: Either of: * "String" * "Bool" * "Float" * "Int" * "Vector" * "Angle" * "Entity"
number slot: Each network var has to have a unique slot. The slot is per type - so you can have an int in slot 0, a bool in slot 0 and a float in slot 0 etc. The max slots right now are 4 - so you should pick a number between 0-3
string name: The name will affect how you access it. If you call it "Foo" you would add two new functions on your entity - SetFoo and GetFoo. So be careful that what you call it won't collide with any existing functions (don't call it "Pos" for example).
table extended: A table of extended information. '''KeyName''' If the table contains a "KeyName" key the value can be set using [[Entity/SetKeyValue]]. This is useful if you're making an entity that you want to be loaded in a map. The sky entity uses this. '''Edit''' The edit key lets you mark this variable as editable. See [[Editable Entities]] for more information.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/NextThink Shared In the case of a scripted entity, this will cause the entity's next "OnThink" event to be run at the given time. Does not work clientside!
number timestamp: The timestamp at which the next think should occur.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/OBBCenter Shared Returns the center of an entity's bounding box as a local vector.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/OBBMaxs Shared Returns the highest corner of an entity's bounding box as a local vector.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/OBBMins Shared Returns the lowest corner of an entity's bounding box as a local vector.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/OnGround Shared Returns true if the entity is on the ground, and false if it isn't.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/ENTITY/OnReloaded Shared Called when the entity is was reloaded by the auto-reload system.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/ENTITY/OnRemove Shared Called when the entity is about to be removed.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/ENTITY/OnRestore Shared Called when the entity was reloaded from a save game.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/ENTITY/OnTakeDamage Server Called when the entity is taking damage.
CTakeDamageInfo damage: The damage to be applied to the entity.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/ENTITY/PassesTriggerFilters Shared Polls whenever the entity should trigger the brush.
Entity ent: The entity that is about to trigger.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/ENTITY/PhysicsCollide Shared Called when the entity collides with anything.
table colData: Information regarding the collision. See [[Structures/CollisionData]]
number collider: The physobject of our entity that collided.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/PhysicsFromMesh Shared Builds the mesh from a table mesh vertexes.
table vertices: A table consisting of {{Struct|MeshVertex}}.
boolean static: Whenever the collisions should be static.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/PhysicsInit Shared Sets the solid type of the physics. This function will remove the last physobj and create a new.
number solidType: The solid type of the entity, see {{Enum|SOLID}}.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/PhysicsInitBox Shared Makes the physics object of the entity a AABB.
Vector mins: The minimum position of the box.
Vector maxs: The maximum position of the box.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/PhysicsInitConvex Shared Builds the mesh from a convex collision mesh.
table vertices: A table consisting of {{Type|Vector}}s.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/PhysicsInitMultiConvex Shared Builds the mesh from multiple convex collision meshes.
table vertices: A table consisting of tables containing {{Type|Vector}}s.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/PhysicsInitSphere Shared Makes the physics object of the entity a sphere.
number radius: The radius of the sphere.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/ENTITY/PhysicsSimulate Server Called when the entity should calculate its physics.
number phys: The physics object of the entity.
number deltaTime: Time since the last call.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/ENTITY/PhysicsUpdate Shared Called whenever the physics of the entity are updated.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/PhysWake Shared Wakes up the entity's physics object

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/PointAtEntity Server Changes an entities angles so that it faces the target entity.
Entity target: The entity to face.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/ENTITY/PostEntityCopy Server Called after the duplicator finished copying the entity

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/ENTITY/PostEntityPaste Server Called after the duplicator pastes the entity
Player ply: Player who pasted the entity
Entity ent: The entity itself
table createdEntities: All entities that are within the placed dupe
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/ENTITY/PreEntityCopy Server Called before the duplicator copies the entity

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/RagdollSolve Server Normalizes the ragdoll. This is used alongside Kinect in {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetRagdollBuildFunction}}, for more info see ragdoll_motion entity.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/RagdollStopControlling Server Sets the function to build the ragdoll. This is used alongside Kinect in {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetRagdollBuildFunction}}, for more info see ragdoll_motion entity.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/RagdollUpdatePhysics Server Makes the physics objects follow the set bone positions. This is used alongside Kinect in {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetRagdollBuildFunction}}, for more info see ragdoll_motion entity.
number unknown: Probably the physics object to update
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/Remove Shared Removes the entity it is used on.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/RemoveAllDecals Shared Removes all decals from the entities surface.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/RemoveCallOnRemove Shared Removes the CallOnRemove'd function referred to by identifier
string identifier: Identifier of the function within CallOnRemove

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/RemoveEFlags Shared Removes specified engine flag
number flag: The flag to remove, see [[Enums/EFL|EFL_ enumerations]]
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/ENTITY/RenderOverride Client Called instead of the engine drawing function of the entity.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/RestartGesture Shared Allows you to set the entity's animation gesture. If the given gesture is already playing, it will reset it and play it from the beginning.
number sequence: The activity number to send to the entity. See {{Enum|ACT}} and {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetSequenceActivity}}

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/SelectWeightedSequence Shared Returns sequence ID corresponding to given activity id. Opposite of {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetSequenceActivity}}.
number act: The activity ID, see {{Enum|ACT}}.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/SendViewModelMatchingSequence Shared Sends sequence animation to the view model. Seems to be the same as {{ClassFunction|Entity|ResetSequence}}.
number seq: The sequence ID returned by {{ClassFunction|Entity|LookupSequence}} or {{ClassFunction|Entity|SelectWeightedSequence}}.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/SetAngles Shared Sets the angles of the entity.
Angle angles: The new angles.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/SetBloodColor Server Sets the blood color this entity uses.
number bloodColor: An integer corresponding to {{Enum|BLOOD}}.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/SetBodygroup Shared Sets an entities' bodygroup.
number bodygroup: The id of the bodygroup you're setting.
number value: The value you're setting the bodygroup to.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/SetCollisionGroup Shared Sets the entity's collision group.
number group: Collision group of the entity, see {{Enum|COLLISION}}

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/SetColor Shared Sets the color of an entity.
Color color: The color to set.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/SetCreator Server Sets the creator of the SENT.
Player ply: The creator

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/SetFriction Server Sets how much friction an entity has when sliding against a surface. Entities default to 1 (100%) and can be higher or even negative.
number friction: Friction multiplier

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/SetGravity Shared Sets the gravity multiplier of the entity.
number gravityMultiplier: Value which specifies the gravity multiplier.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/SetHealth Shared Sets the health of the entity.
number newHealth: New health value.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/SetIK Client Enables or disable the inverse kinematic usage of this entity.
boolean useIK: The state of the IK.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/SetKeyValue Shared Sets key value for the entity.
string key: The key
string value: The value

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/SetLocalAngles Shared Sets angles relative to angles of {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetParent}}
Angle ang: The local angle

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/SetLocalPos Shared Sets local position relative to the parented position. This is for use with {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetParent}} to offset position.
Vector pos: The local position

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/SetMaterial Shared Sets the rendering material override of the entity.
string materialName: New material name.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/SetMaxHealth Server Sets the maximum health for entity. Note, that you can still set entity's health above this amount with {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetHealth}}.
number maxhealth: What the max health should be

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/SetModel Shared Sets the model of the entity.
string modelName: New model value.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/SetModelScale Shared Scales the model of the entity.
number scale: A float to scale the model by
number deltaTime: Transition time of the scale change.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/SetMoveCollide Shared Sets the move collide type of the entity. The move collide is the way a physics object reacts to hitting an object - will it bounce, slide?
number moveCollideType: The move collide type, see {{Enum|MOVECOLLIDE}}

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/SetMoveType Shared Sets the entitys movetype.
number movetype: The new movetype, see {{Enum|MOVETYPE}}

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/SetName Server Sets the mapping name of the entity.
string mappingName: The name to set for the entity.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/SetNetworkedAngle Shared Sets a networked angle at the specified index on the entity.
any index: The index that the value is stored in.
Angle angle: The value to network.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/SetNetworkedBool Shared Networks a boolean value from server to client or from client to server.
string key: The key the value can be accessed with.
boolean value: The value to be set. This value can be accessed wi

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/SetNetworkedEntity Shared Sets a networked entity at the specified index on the entity.
any index: The index that the value is stored in.
Entity entity: The value to network.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/SetNetworkedFloat Shared Sets a networked float at the specified index on the entity.
any index: The index that the value is stored in.
number float: The value to network.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/SetNetworkedInt Shared Sets a networked integer at the specified index on the entity.
any index: The index that the value is stored in.
number integer: The value to network.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/SetNetworkedNumber Shared Sets a networked number at the specified index on the entity.
any index: The index that the value is stored in.
number number: The value to network.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/SetNetworkedString Shared Networks a string value from server to client or from client to server.
string key: The key the value can be accessed with.
string value: The value to be set. This va

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/SetNetworkedVar Shared Sets a networked var at the specified index on the entity.
any index: The index that the value is stored in
any var: The variable to network

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/SetNoDraw Shared Sets if the entity's model should render at all
boolean shouldNotDraw: true disables drawing

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/SetNotSolid Shared Sets whether the entity is solid or not.
boolean IsNotSolid: True will make the entity not solid, false will make it solid.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/SetNWString Shared Networks a string value from server to client.
This is an alias of Entity:SetNetworkedString
Running this function clientside will only set it clientside - not serverside. string key: The key the value can be accessed with. string value: The value to be set.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/SetOwner Shared Sets the "owner" of the entity, which will disable the collision and damage receiving for this entity.
Entity owner: The entity to be set as owner.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/SetParent Shared Sets the parent of this entity.
Entity parent: The entity to parent to. Setting this to nil will clear the parent.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/SetPersistent Shared Sets whether or not the given entity is persistent. (Like using the context menu and clicking Make Persistent or Stop Persisting.)
boolean persist: Whether or not the entity is persistent.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/SetPhysicsAttacker Server Sets the player who gets credit if this entity kills something with physics damage.
Player ent: Player who gets the kills. Setting this to a non-player entity will not work.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/SetPlaybackRate Shared Allows you to set how fast an entity's animation will play, with 1.0 being the default speed.
number fSpeed: How fast the animation will play.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/SetPos Shared Moves the entity to the specified position.
Vector position: The position to move the entity to.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/SetPoseParameter Shared Sets the specified pose parameter to the specified value.
string poseName: Name of the pose parameter.
number poseValue: The value to set the pose to.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/SetRagdollAng Server Sets the bone angles. This is used alongside Kinect in {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetRagdollBuildFunction}}, for more info see ragdoll_motion entity.
number boneid: Bone ID
Angle pos: Angle to set

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/SetRagdollBuildFunction Server Sets the function to build the ragdoll. This is used alongside Kinect, for more info see ragdoll_motion entity. function func: The build function. This function has one argument:
[[:Category:Entity|Entity]] ragdoll - The ragdoll to build

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/SetRagdollPos Server Sets the bone position. This is used alongside Kinect in {{ClassFunction|Entity|SetRagdollBuildFunction}}, for more info see ragdoll_motion entity.
number boneid: Bone ID
Vector pos: Position to set

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/SetRenderBounds Client Sets the render bounds for the entity.
Vector mins: The minimum corner of the bounds, relative to origin of the entity.
Vector maxs: The maximum corner of the bounds, relative to origin of the entity.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/SetRenderMode Shared Sets the render mode of the entity.
number renderMode: New render mode to set, see {{Enum|RENDERMODE}}.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/SetSaveValue Shared Sets a save value for an entity.
string name: Name of the save value to set
any value: Value to set

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/SetShouldServerRagdoll Shared Sets if entity should create a server ragdoll on death or a client one.
boolean serverragdoll: Set true if ragdoll should be created on server, false if on client

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/SetSkin Shared Sets the skin of the entity.
number skinIndex: Index of the skin to use.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/SetSolid Shared Sets the solidity of an entity.
number solid_type: The solid type. See [[Enums/SOLID|SOLID_ enums]].

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/SetTable Shared Changes the table that can be accessed by indexing an entity. Each entity starts with its own table by default.
table tab: Table for the entity to use

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/SetTransmitWithParent Shared When this flag is set the entity will only transmit to the player when its parent is transmitted. This is useful for things like viewmodel attachments since without this flag they will transmit to everyone (and cause the viewmodels to transmit to everyone too).
boolean onoff: Will set the TransmitWithParent flag on or off

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/ENTITY/SetupDataTables Shared Called when the entity should set up its [[Networking Entities| Data Tables]]. This is a much better option than using Set/Get Networked Values.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/SetUseType Server Sets the use type of an entity.
number useType: The use type to apply to the entity. See {{Enum|USE}}

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/SetVar Shared Allows to quickly set variable to entitys {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetTable}}.
string name: Name of variable to set
any value: Value to set the variable to

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/SetVelocity Shared Sets an entity's velocity with a given vector velocity.
Note: If applied to player, it will '''ADD''' velocity, not '''SET''' it. Vector velocity: The new velocity to set
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/SkinCount Shared Returns the amount of skins the entity has.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/Spawn Shared Initializes the entity and starts it's networking.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/ENTITY/SpawnFunction Server This is the spawn function. It's called when a client calls the entity to be spawned. If you want to make your SENT spawnable you need this function to properly create the entity.
Player ply: The player that is spawning this SENT
table tr: [[Structures/TraceResult|TraceResult]] from player eyes to their aim position
string ClassName: The classname of your entity

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/ENTITY/StartTouch Server Called when the entity starts touching another entity.
Entity entity: The entity which is being touched.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/StopParticleEmission Client Stops all particle effects parented to the entity. Seems like clientside version of {{ClassFunction|Entity|StopParticles}}
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/StopParticles Shared Stops any attached to the entity engine particles using {{LibraryFunction|Global|ParticleEffectAttach}}.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/StopSound Shared Stops emitting the given sound from the entity. '''Note: This only works with sounds added as scripts, or with''' {{LibraryFunction|sound|Add}} Using a file path will not make this function work.
string fileName: Path to the sound file

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/TakeDamage Server Applies the specified amount of damage to the entity.
number damageAmount: The amount of damage to be applied.
Entity attacker: The entity that initiated the attack that caused the damage.
Entity inflictor: The entity that applied the damage, eg. a weapon.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/TakeDamageInfo Server Applies the damage specified by the damage info to the entity.
CTakeDamageInfo damageInfo: The damage to apply.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/TakePhysicsDamage Server Applies physics damage to the entity
CTakeDamageInfo dmginfo: The damage to apply

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/ENTITY/TestCollision Shared Allows you to override trace result when a trace hits the entitys Bounding Box.

Note: Your entity must have {{ClassFunction|Entity|EnableCustomCollisions}} enabled for this hook to work. Vector startpos: Start position of the trace Vector delta: Offset from startpos to the endpos of the trace boolean isbox: Is the trace a hull trace? Vector extents: Size of the hull trace?
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/ENTITY/Think Shared Called when the entity thinks.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/ENTITY/Touch Server Called when another entity touches the entity.
Entity entity: The entity that touched it.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/TranslateBoneToPhysBone Shared Gets the phys bone for a bone
number bone: The number of the bone

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/TranslatePhysBoneToBone Shared Gets the bone number corresponding to a physics bone.
number physNum: Number of the physics object

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/ENTITY/TriggerOutput Server Triggers all outputs stored using {{HookFunction|ENTITY|StoreOutput}}.
string output: Name of output to fire
Entity activator: Activator entity
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/ENTITY/UpdateTransmitState Server Called whenever the transmit state should be

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/ENTITY/Use Server Called when another entity uses this entity, example would be a player pressing "+use" this entity.
Entity activator: The initial cause for the input getting triggered.
Entity caller: The entity that directly triggered the input.
number useType: Use type, see {{Enum|USE}}.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/Use Server Called when an entity is used. (Default, 'E' is pressed)
Player User: The player that used the entity.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/Visible Server Returns true whether or not the provided entity is visible from the passed entity.
Entity Entity: The Entity

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/VisibleVec Server Returns whether or not the supplied vector is within the entities PVS
Vector pos: The position to check for visibility

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/WaterLevel Shared Returns an integer that represents the "water level" describing how much the entity is interacting with water. Return values: 0 - not in the water at all. 1 - slightly submerged in water. 2 - majority of entity in water. 3 - completely underwater.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/WorldSpaceAABB Shared Returns two vectors representing the minimum and maximum extent of the entity's bounding box.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/WorldSpaceCenter Shared Returns the center of the entity according to its collision model.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Entity/WorldToLocal Shared Converts a worldspace vector into a vector local to an entity
Vector wpos: The world vector

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/ents/Create Server Starts creating an entity.
WARNING: Do not use before InitPostEntity has been called, otherwise the server will crash!
If you need to perform entity creation when the game starts, create a hook for InitPostEntity and do it there! string class: The classname of the entity to create

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/ents/CreateClientProp Client Creates a clientside only prop
string model: The model of ent to create.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/ents/FindByClass Shared Gets all entities with the given class, supports wildcards.
string class: The class of the entities to find.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/ents/FindByClassAndParent Shared Finds all entities that are of given class and are children of given entity.
string class: The class of entities to search for
Entity parent: Parent of entities that are being searched for

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/ents/FindByModel Shared Gets all entities with the given model, supports wildcards.
string model: The model of the entities to find.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/ents/FindByName Shared Gets all entities with the given hammer targetname
string name: The targetname to look for

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/ents/FindInBox Shared Gets all entities within the specified box.
Vector boxMins: The box maximum.
Vector boxMaxs: The box minimum.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/ents/FindInCone Shared Gets all entities within the specified cone.
Vector origin: The "tip" of the cone.
Vector normal: Direction of the code.
number radius: Height of the cone.
number angle: The angle of the cone.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/ents/FindInSphere Shared Gets all entities within the specified sphere.
Vector origin: Center of the sphere.
number radius: Radius of the sphere.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/ents/FireTargets Server Fires a use event.
string target: Name of the target entity
Entity activator: Activator of the event
Entity caller: Caller of the event.
number usetype: Use type, see [[Enums/USE|USE_]] enumerations.
number unknown: unknown
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/ents/GetAll Shared Returns a table of all existing entities.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/ents/GetByIndex Shared Gets an entity by its index.
number entIdx: The index of the entity.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/ents/GetMapCreatedEntity Server Returns entity that has given {{ClassFunction|Entity|MapCreationID}}.
number id: Entity's creation id

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/file/Append Shared Appends a file relative to the ''data'' folder.
string name: The file's name.
string content: The content which should be appended to the file.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/file/CreateDir Shared Creates a directory that is relative to the ''data'' folder.
string name: The directory's name.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/file/Delete Shared Deletes a file that is relative to the ''data'' folder.
string name: The file's name.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/file/Exists Shared Returns a boolean of whether the file or directory exists or not.
string name: The file or directory's name.
string path: The path of where to look for the file. * "GAME" Structured like base folder (garrysmod/), searches all the mounted content (main folder, addons, mounted games etc) * "LUA" or "lsv" - All Lua folders (lua/) including gamesmodes and addons * "DATA" Data folder (garrysmod/data) * "MOD" Strictly the game folder (garrysmod/), ignores mounting.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/file/Find Shared Returns a table of files and directories.
string name: The directories/files to search for.
string path: The path to look for the files and directories in. * "GAME" Structured like base folder (garrysmod/), searches all the mounted content (main folder, addons, mounted games etc) * "LUA" or "lsv" - All Lua folders (lua/) including gamesmodes and addons * "DATA" Data folder (garrysmod/data) * "MOD" Strictly the game folder (garrysmod/), ignores mounting.
string sorting: The sorting to be used, optional. * "nameasc" sort the files ascending by name * "namedesc" sort the files descending by name * "dateasc" sort the files ascending by date * "datedesc" sort the files descending by date

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/file/IsDir Shared Returns if the given file is a directory.
string fileName: The file or directory's name.
string path: The path type.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/file/Open Shared Attempts to open a file with the given mode.
string fileName: The files name.
string fileMode: The mode to open the file in, use this page for reference of what modes are possible http ://lua-users.org/wiki/IoLibraryTutorial.
string path: The path type. * "GAME" Structured like base folder (garrysmod/), searches all the mounted content (main folder, addons, mounted games etc) * "LUA" or "lsv" - All Lua folders (lua/) including gamesmodes and addons * "DATA" Data folder (garrysmod/data) * "MOD" Strictly the game folder (garrysmod/), ignores mounting.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/file/Read Shared Returns the content of a file.
string fileName: The name of the file.
string path: The path used to look up the file. * "GAME" Structured like base folder (garrysmod/), searches all the mounted content (main folder, addons, mounted games etc) * "LUA" or "lsv" - All Lua folders (lua/) including gamesmodes and addons * "DATA" Data folder (garrysmod/data) * "MOD" Strictly the game folder (garrysmod/), ignores mounting.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/file/Size Shared Returns the file's size in bytes. If the file is not found, returns -1.
string fileName: The file's name.
string path: The path type. * "GAME" Structured like base folder (garrysmod/), searches all the mounted content (main folder, addons, mounted games etc) * "LUA" or "lsv" - All Lua folders (lua/) including gamesmodes and addons * "DATA" Data folder (garrysmod/data) * "MOD" Strictly the game folder (garrysmod/), ignores mounting.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/file/Time Shared Returns when the file was lasted modified in Unix time.
string fileName: The name of the file.
string path: The game path to be used. * "GAME" Structured like base folder (garrysmod/), searches all the mounted content (main folder, addons, mounted games etc) * "LUA" or "lsv" - All Lua folders (lua/) including gamesmodes and addons * "DATA" Data folder (garrysmod/data) * "MOD" Strictly the game folder (garrysmod/), ignores mounting.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/file/Write Shared Writes the given string to a file. Erases all previous data in the file. To add data without deleting previous data, use {{LibraryFunction|file|Append}}.
string fileName: The name of the file being written into.
string content: The content that will be written into the file.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/File/Close Shared Dumps the file changes to disk and closes the file handle which makes the handle useless.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/File/Flush Shared Dumps the file changes to disk and saves the file.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/File/Read Shared Reads the specified amount of chars and returns them as a binary string.
number length: Reads the specified amount of chars.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/File/ReadBool Shared Reads one byte of the file and returns whenever that byte was not null.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/File/ReadByte Shared Reads one byte of the file and returns the decimal ASCII value.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/File/ReadDouble Shared Reads 8 bytes from the file converts them to a double and returns them.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/File/ReadFloat Shared Reads 4 bytes from the file converts them to a float and returns them.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/File/ReadLong Shared Reads 4 bytes from the file converts them to a long and returns them.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/File/ReadShort Shared Reads 2 bytes from the file converts them to a short and returns them.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/File/Seek Shared Sets the file pointer to the specified position.
number pos: Pointer position.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/File/Size Shared Returns the size of the file in bytes.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/File/Skip Shared Moves the file pointer by the specified amount of chars.
number amount: The amount of chars to skip, can be negative to skip backwards.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/File/Tell Shared Returns the current position of the file pointer.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/File/Write Shared Writes the given string into the file.
string data: Binary data to write to the file.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/File/WriteBool Shared Writes on byte, representing the a Boolean to the file.
boolean bool: The bool to be written to the file.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/File/WriteByte Shared Writes a byte to the file.
number byte: The byte to be written to the file.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/File/WriteDouble Shared Writes a 8byte floating point double to the file.
number double: The double to be written to the file.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/File/WriteFloat Shared Writes a 4byte float to the file.
number float: The float to be written to the file.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/File/WriteLong Shared Writes a 4byte integer to the file.
number int: The integer to be written to the file.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/File/WriteShort Shared Writes a 2 byte integer to the file.
number short: The short to be written to the file.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/frame_blend/IsActive Client Returns whether frame blend post processing effect is enabled or not.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/frame_blend/ShouldSkipFrame Client Returns whether we should skip frame or not

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/game/AddAmmoType Shared Adds a new ammo type to the game.
table ammoData: The attributes of the ammo. See [[Structures/AmmoData|AmmoData]] table structure.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/game/AddDecal Shared Adds a new decal.
string decalName: The name of the decal.
string fileName: The file name of the decal.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/game/AddParticles Client Loads a particle file.
string particleFileName: The path of the file to add.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/game/BuildAmmoTypes Shared Returns a table containing all ammo types added via {{LibraryFunction|game|AddAmmoType}} sorted by it's name value.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/game/CleanUpMap Shared If called serverside it will remove ALL entities which were not created by the map(not players or weapons held by players). On the client it will ONLY remove entities created via {{LibraryFunction|ents|CreateClientProp}}.
boolean dontSendToClients: Notify clients of map cleanup.
table ExtraFilters: Entity classes not to reset during cleanup.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/game/ConsoleCommand Server Runs a console command. Make sure to add a newline ("\n") at the end of the command.
string stringCommand: String containing the command and arguments to be ran.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/game/GetMap Shared Returns the name of the current map.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/game/GetMapNext Server Returns the next map that would be loaded according to the file that is set by the mapcyclefile convar.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/game/GetMapVersion Shared Returns the VBSP version of the current map.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/game/GetTimeScale Shared Returns the timescale of the game
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/game/GetWorld Server Returns Entity[0] worldspawn
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/game/IsDedicated Shared Returns whenever the server or the server we are connected to is a dedicated server.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/game/LoadNextMap Server Loads the next map according to the file that is set by the mapcyclefile convar.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/game/MapLoadType Server Returns the map load type of the current map.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/game/MaxPlayers Shared Returns the maximum number of players for this server.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/game/RemoveRagdolls Shared Removes all the clientside ragdolls.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/game/SetTimeScale Server Sets the time scale of the game.
number timeScale: The new timescale.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/game/SinglePlayer Shared Returns whenever the current session is a single player game.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/game/StartSpot Shared Returns position the player should start from, this is not the same thing as spawn points, it is used to properly transit the player between maps.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/gameevent/Listen Shared Add a game event listener. string eventName: The event to listen to, travels through hooks with eventName as event.
[[Gameevents| '''Valid Events''']]

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/gamemode/Call Shared Called by the engine to call a hook within the loaded gamemode. * The supplied event 'name' must exist as a GAMEMODE function. Otherwise, every hook created with hook.Add will not be called. IE: gamemode.Call( "PlayerLoadout" ) must have a function GAMEMODE:PlayerLoadout(). * This is similiar to hook.Call( name, game.GetGamemode(), ... ) except hook.Call will call hooks created with hook.Add even if there is no GAMEMODE function with the event name
string name: The name of the hook to call.
any arg: The arguements

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/gamemode/Get Shared This returns the internally stored gamemode table. This is mainly an internal function. You should have no business calling it.
string name: The name of the gamemode you want to get

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/gamemode/Register Shared Used to register your gamemode with the engine
table gm: Your GM table
string name: Name of your gamemode, lowercase, no spaces.
string derived: The gamemode name that your gamemode is derived from

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/AccessorFunc Shared Adds simple Get/Set accessor functions on the specified table.
Can also force the value to be set to a number, bool or string. table tab: The table to add the accessor functions too. any key: The key of the table to be get/set. string name: The name of the functions (will be prefixed with Get and Set). number iForce: The type the setter should force to (uses {{Enum|FORCE}}).

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/AccessorFuncNW Shared {{Deprecated|This function no longer works. Use [http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Networking_Entities this] instead.}} Throws the error "[AccessorFuncNW] is depreciated. Look up 'SetupDataTables'. Sorry :("

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/Add_NPC_Class Shared Creates a CLASS_ Enum and assigns it as a global variable with a automatic value so as to prevent collisions with
string name: The name of the ENUM/new global variable.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/AddConsoleCommand Shared Tells the engine to register a console command. If the command was ran, the engine calls {{LibraryFunction|concommand|Run}}. If you want to add a console command use {{LibraryFunction|concommand|Add}}.
string name: The name of the console command to add.
string helpText: The help text.
number flags: Concommand flags using {{Enum|FCVAR}}

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/AddCSLuaFile Server Marks a Lua file to be sent to clients when they join the server. Note: The file path is relative to the script it is ran from. For example, if your script is in lua/myfolder/stuff.lua, doing AddCSLuaFile("otherstuff.lua") and AddCSLuaFile("myfolder/otherstuff.lua") is the same thing.
string file: The name/path (relative to the garrysmod/lua folder) to the Lua file that should be sent. If no parameter is specified, it sends the current file.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/AddonMaterial Client Loads the specified material from the /cache folder, usually used in combination {{LibraryFunction|steamworks|Download}}.
string name: The name of the file.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/AddOriginToPVS Server Adds the specified vector to the PVS which is currently building. This allows all objects in visleafs visible from that vector to be drawn.
Vector position: The origin to add.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/Angle Shared Creates an {{Type|Angle}} object.
number pitch: The pitch value of the angle.
number yaw: The yaw value of the angle.
number roll: The roll value of the angle.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/AngleRand Shared Returns a angle with a randomized pitch, yaw and roll, each between -180 and 180 degrees.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/assert Shared Throws an error if the first argument evaluates to false, the second argument can be used to specify the error, otherwise "assertion failed". Otherwise returns all argument passed to the function
any expression: If evaluated to false, the function will throw an error.
string errorMessage: If the specified, and the expression evaluates to false, this will be used as error message, otherwise returnd.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/BroadcastLua Server Sends the specified Lua code to all connected clients and executes it.
string code: The code to be executed. Capped at length of 254 characters.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/BuildNetworkedVarsTable Shared Dumps the networked variables of all entities into one table and returns it.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/ChangeTooltip Client Automatically called by the engine when a panel is hovered over with the mouse
Panel panel: Panel that has been hovered over

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/ClientsideModel Client Creates a non physical entity that only exists on the client.
string model: The file path to the model.
number renderGroup: The rendergroup of the entity, see {{Enum|RENDERGROUP}}.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/ClientsideRagdoll Client Creates a physical entity that only exists on the client.
string model: The file path to the model.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/ClientsideScene Client Creates a scene entity based on the scene name and the entity.
string name: The name of the scene.
Entity targetEnt: The entity to play the scene on.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/CloseDermaMenus Client Closes all Derma menus that have been passed to [[Global/RegisterDermaMenuForClose|RegisterDermaMenuForClose]] and calls {{HookFunction|GM|CloseDermaMenus}}

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/collectgarbage Shared Executes the specified action on the garbage collector.
string action: The action to run.
number arg: The argument of the specified action, not always required.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/Color Shared Creates a {{Type|Color}} object.
number r: An integer from 0-255 describing the red value of the color.
number g: An integer from 0-255 describing the green value of the color.
number b: An integer from 0-255 describing the blue value of the color.
number a: An integer from 0-255 describing the alpha (transparency) of the color.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/ColorAlpha Shared Returns a new {{Type|Color}} with the RGB components of the given {{Type|Color}} and the alpha value specified.
Color color: The color from which to take RGB values. This color will not be modified.
number alpha: The new alpha value, a number between 0 and 1. Values above 1 will be clamped.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/ColorToHSV Shared Converts a [[Structures/Color|Color]] object into HSV color space.
Color color: The color object.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/CompileFile Shared Compiles the file, and returns a function
string path: Path to the file.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/CompileString Shared This function will compile the code argument as lua code and return a function that will execute that code. Please note that this function will not automatically execute the given code after compiling it.
string code: The code to compile.
string identifier: An identifier in case an error is thrown. (The same identifier can be used multiple times)
boolean HandleError: If false this function will return an error string instead of throwing an error.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/ConVarExists Shared Returns whenever a convar with the given name exists
string name: Name of the convar.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/CreateClientConVar Client Makes a clientside-only console variable
string name: Name of the ConVar to be created and able to be accessed.
number default: Default value of the ConVar.
