boolean shouldsave: Should the ConVar be saved across sessions
boolean userdata: Should the ConVar and its containing data be sent to the server when it has changed

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/CreateConVar Shared Creates a console variable (ConVar), in general these are for things like gamemode/server settings.
string name: Name of the convar.
string value: Default value of the convar.
number flags: Flags of the convar, see {{Enum|FCVAR}}, either as bitflag or as table.
string helptext: The help text to show in the console.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/CreateMaterial Client Creates a new material with the specified name and shader.
string name: The material name.
string shader: The shader.
table materialData: Key-value table that contains shader parameters and proxies. *See: https://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/Category:List_of_Shader_Parameters

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/CreateSound Shared Returns a sound parented to the specified entity.
Entity targetEnt: The target entity.
string soundName: The sound to play.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/CreateSprite Client Returns a new DSprite element with the supplied material
any material: Material to draw on the element

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/CurTime Shared Returns the uptime of the server in seconds (to at least 4 decimal places) Note: this is a synchronised value and affected by various factors such as host_timescale and the server being paused - either by sv_pausable or all players disconnecting. You should use this function for timing in-game events but not for real-world events. See Also: {{LibraryFunction|Global|RealTime}}, {{LibraryFunction|Global|SysTime}}
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/DamageInfo Shared Creates an empty damage info.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/DeriveGamemode Shared Retrieves data from the base gamemode.
string Text: Gamemode base name.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/Derma_Anim Client Returns a new [[:Category:DermaAnimation|DermaAnimation]] object
string name: Name of the animation to create
Panel panel: Panel to run the animation on
function func: Function to call to processing the animation

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/Derma_DrawBackgroundBlur Client Draws background blur around the given panel.
Panel panel: Panel to draw the background blur around
number startTime: Time that the blur began being painted

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/Derma_Hook Client Creates panel method that calls the supplied Derma skin hook via [[derma/SkinHook]]
Panel panel: Panel to add the hook to
string functionName: Name of panel function to create
string hookName: Name of Derma skin hook to call within the function
string typeName: Type of element to call Derma skin hook for

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/Derma_Install_Convar_Functions Client Makes the panel (usually an input of sorts) respond to changes in console variables by adding the functions [[Panel/SetConVar|SetConVar]], [[Panel/ConVarChanged|ConVarChanged]], [[Panel/ConVarStringThink|ConVarStringThink]] and [[Panel/ConVarNumberThink|ConVarNumberThink]] to the panel. The console variable value is saved in the im_strConVar property of the panel. The panel should call [[Panel/ConVarStringThink|ConVarStringThink]] or [[Panel/ConVarNumberThink|ConVarNumberThink]] in it's [[Panel/Think|Think]] hook and should call [[Panel/ConVarChanged|ConVarChanged]] when the panel's value has changed. Panel target: The panel the functions should be added to.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/Derma_Message Client Creates a derma window to display information
string Text: The text within the created panel.
string Title: The title of the created panel.
string Button: The text of the button to close the panel.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/Derma_Query Client Shows a message box in the middle of the screen, with up to 4 buttons they can press.
string text: The message to display.
string title: The title to give the message box.
string btn1text: The text to display on the first button.
function btn1func: The function to run if the user clicks the first button.
string btn2text: The text to display on the second button.
function btn2func: The function to run if the user clicks the second button.
string btn3text: The text to display on the third button
function btn3func: The function to run if the user clicks the third button.
string btn4text: The text to display on the third button
function btn4func: The function to run if the user clicks the fourth button.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/Derma_StringRequest Client Creates a derma window asking players to input a string.
string title: The title of the created panel.
string subtitle: The text above the input box
string default: The default text for the input box.
function confirm: The function to be called once the user has confirmed their input.
function cancel: The function to be called once the user has cancelled their input
string confirmText: Allows you to override text of the "OK" button
string cancelText: Allows you to override text of the "Cancel" button

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/DermaMenu Client Creates a DMenu similar to a contextmenu and closes any current menus
Panel parent: The panel to parent the created menu to.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/DisableClipping Client Sets whether rendering should be limited to being inside a panel or not
boolean disable: Whether or not clipping should be disabled
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/DOF_Kill Client Cancels current DOF post-process effect started with [[Global/DOF_Start]]
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/DOF_Start Client Begins the DOF post-process effect
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/DOFModeHack Client A hacky method used to fix some bugs regarding DoF.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/DrawBloom Client Draws the bloom shader, which creates a glowing effect from bright objects.
number Darken: Determines how much to darken the effect. A lower number will make the glow come from lower light levels. A value of 1 will make the bloom effect unnoticeable. Negative values will make even pitch black areas glow.
number Multiply: Will affect how bright the glowing spots are. A value of 0 will make the bloom effect unnoticeable.
number SizeX: The size of the bloom effect along the horizontal axis.
number SizeY: The size of the bloom effect along the vertical axis.
number Passes: Determines how much to exaggerate the effect.
number ColorMultiply: Will multiply the colors of the glowing spots, making them more vivid.
number Red: How much red to multiply with the glowing color. Should be between 0 and 1
number Green: How much green to multiply with the glowing color. Should be between 0 and 1
number Blue: How much blue to multiply with the glowing color. Should be between 0 and 1

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/DrawColorModify Client Draws the Color Modify shader, which can be used to adjust colors on screen.
table modifyParameters: Color modification parameters. See {{Struct|ColorModifyData}}

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/DrawMaterialOverlay Client Draws a material overlay on the screen.
string Material: This will be the material that is drawn onto the screen.
number RefractAmount: This will adjust how much the material will refract your screen.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/DrawMotionBlur Client Creates a motion blur effect by drawing your screen multiple times.
number AddAlpha: How much alpha to change per frame.
number DrawAlpha: How much alpha the frames will have. A value of 0 will not render the motion blur effect.
number Delay: Determines the amount of time between frames to capture.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/DrawSharpen Client Draws the sharpen shader, which creates more contrast.
number Contrast: How much contrast to create.
number Distance: How large the contrast effect will be.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/DrawSobel Client Draws the sobel shader, which detects edges and draws a black border.
number Threshold: Determines the threshold of edges. A value of 0 will make your screen completely black.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/DrawSunbeams Client Renders the post-processing effect of beams of light originating from the map's sun. Utilises the "pp/sunbeams" material
number darken: $darken property for sunbeams material
number multiplier: $multiply property for sunbeams material
number sunSize: $sunsize property for sunbeams material
number sunX: $sunx property for sunbeams material
number sunY: $suny property for sunbeams material

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/DrawTexturize Client Draws the texturize shader, which replaces each pixel on your screen with a different part of the texture depending on its brightness. See [[Misc/Shaders/g_texturize|g_textureize]] for information on making the texture.
number Scale: Scale of the texture. A smaller number creates a larger texture.
number BaseTexture: This will be the texture to use in the effect. Make sure you use [[Global/Material|Material]] to get the texture number

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/DrawToyTown Client Draws the toy town shader, which blurs the top and bottom of your screen. This can make very large objects look like toys, hence the name.
number Passes: An integer determining how many times to draw the effect. A higher number creates more blur.
number Height: The amount of screen which should be blurred on the top and bottom.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/DropEntityIfHeld Shared Drops the specified entity if with the physcannon by any player.
Entity ent: The entity to drop.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/DynamicLight Client Creates or replaces a dynamic light with the given id.
number index: Usually an entity index is used here.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/EffectData Shared Creates a new [[:Category:CEffectData|CEffectData]] object to be used with {{LibraryFunction|util|Effect}}.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/Either Shared An 'if then else'
any truevar: If condition is true, Either returns this variable
any falsevar: Otherwise, Either returns this variable

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/EmitSound Shared Emits the specified sound at the specified position.
string soundName: The sound to play.
Vector position: The position to play at.
Entity entity: The entity to apply the sound to.
number channel: The sound channel using {{Enum|CHAN}}.
number volume: The volume of the sound.
number soundLevel: The sound level of the sound.
number soundFlags: The sound flags of the sound.
number pitch: The pitch of the sound.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/EndTooltip Client Removes the currently active tool tip from the screen.
Panel panel: This is the panel that has a tool tip.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/Entity Shared Returns the entity with the matching ent index or NULL.
number entityIndex: The entity index.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/Error Shared Throws a Lua error and breaks out of the current call stack.
vararg arguments: Converts all arguments to strings and prints them with no spacing.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/error Shared Sends the specified Lua code to all connected clients and executes it.
string message: The error message to throw.
number errorLevel: The level to throw the error at.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/ErrorNoHalt Shared Throws a Lua error but does not break out of the current call stack.
vararg arguments: Converts all arguments to strings and prints them with no spacing.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/EyeAngles Client Returns the angles of the players view calculated by {{HookFunction|GM|CalcView}}.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/EyePos Shared Returns the position of the players view point calculated by {{HookFunction|GM|CalcView}}.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/EyeVector Client Returns the normal of the players view calculated by {{HookFunction|GM|CalcView}} similar to [[Global/EyeAngles|EyeAngles]].

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/FindMetaTable Shared Returns the meta table for the class with the matching name.
string metaName: The name of the meta table.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/FindTooltip Client Returns the tool-tip text and tool-tip-panel (if any) of the given panel as well as itself
Panel panel: Panel to find tool-tip of
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/FrameNumber Client Returns the number of frames rendered since the game was launched.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/FrameTime Client Returns the time in second it took to render the last frame.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/gcinfo Shared Returns the current floored dynamic memory usage of Lua in kilobytes.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/GetConVar Shared Gets the ConVar with the specified name.
string name: Name of the ConVar to get

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/GetConVarNumber Shared Gets the numeric value ConVar with the specified name.
string name: Name of the ConVar to get.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/GetConVarString Shared Gets the string value ConVar with the specified name.
string name: Name of the ConVar to get.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/getfenv Shared Returns the environment table of either the stack level or the function specified.
function location: The object to get the enviroment from. Can also be a number that specifies the function at that stack level: Level 1 is the function calling getfenv.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/GetGlobalAngle Shared Returns an angle that is shared between the server and all clients.
string Index: The unique index to identify the global value with.
Angle Default: The value to return if the global value is not set.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/GetGlobalBool Shared Returns a boolean that is shared between the server and all clients.
string Index: The unique index to identify the global value with.
boolean Default: The value to return if the global value is not set.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/GetGlobalEntity Shared Returns an entity that is shared between the server and all clients.
string Index: The unique index to identify the global value with.
Entity Default: The value to return if the global value is not set.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/GetGlobalFloat Shared Returns a float that is shared between the server and all clients.
string Index: The unique index to identify the global value with.
number Default: The value to return if the global value is not set.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/GetGlobalInt Shared Returns an integer that is shared between the server and all clients.
string Index: The unique index to identify the global value with.
number Default: The value to return if the global value is not set.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/GetGlobalString Shared Returns a string that is shared between the server and all clients.
string Index: The unique index to identify the global value with.
string Default: The value to return if the global value is not set.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/GetGlobalVar Shared Returns a variable that is shared between the server and all clients.
string Index: The unique index to identify the global value with.
any Default: The value to return if the global value is not set.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/GetGlobalVector Shared Returns a vector that is shared between the server and all clients.
string Index: The unique index to identify the global value with.
Vector Default: The value to return if the global value is not set.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/GetHostName Shared Returns the name of the current server.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/GetHUDPanel Client Returns the panel that is used as a wrapper for the HUD.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/getmetatable Shared Gets a table's metatable.
table Tab: The table who's metatable to attempt to return.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/GetRenderTarget Client Creates or gets the rendertarget with the given name.
string name: The internal name of the render target.
number width: The width of the render target, must be power of 2.
number height: The height of the render target, must be power of 2.
boolean additive: Sets whenever the rt should be additive.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/GetRenderTargetEx Client Creates or gets the rendertarget with the given name, this function allows to adjust the creation of a rendertarget more than {{GlobalFunction|GetRenderTarget}}
string name: The internal name of the render target.
number width: The width of the render target, must be power of 2.
number height: The height of the render target, must be power of 2.
number sizeMode: Bitflag that influences the sizing of the render target, see {{Enum|RT_SIZE}}.
number depthMode: Bitflag that determines the depth buffer usage of the render target {{Enum|MATERIAL_RT_DEPTH}}.
number textureFlags: Bitflag that configurates the texture, see {{Enum|TEXTURE}}.
number rtFlags: Flags that controll the HDR behaviour of the render target, see {{Enum|CREATERENDERTARGETFLAGS}}.
number imageFormat: Image format, see {{Enum|IMAGE_FORMAT}}.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/GetViewEntity Client Returns the entity the client is using to see from (such as the player itself, the camera, or another entity).

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/HSVToColor Shared Converts a color from HSV color space into RGB color space and returns a color object.
number hue: Hue in degrees.
number saturation: Saturation from 0 - 1.
number value: Value from 0 - 1.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/HTTP Shared Launches a threaded http request with the given parameters
table parameters: The request parameters. See {{Struct|HTTPRequest}}.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/include Shared Executes a Lua script either relative to the current file, or absolute(relative to the /lua/ folder).
string fileName: The name of the script to be executed.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/IncludeCS Shared {{Deprecated|To send the target file to the client simply call AddCSLuaFile() in the target file itself.}} This function works exactly the same as [[Global/include]] both clientside and serverside. The only difference is that on the serverside it also calls AddCSLuaFile on the filename, so that it gets sent to the client.
string filename: The filename of the Lua file you want to include.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/InjectCommandAutocomplete Shared Alias of [[concommand/AutoComplete]] used by the engine for console command auto-completion.
string command: Name of command
string arguments: arguments given to the command

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/InjectConsoleCommand Shared Alias of [[concommand/Run]] used by the engine to call Lua-defined console commands
Player player: player who is running the command
string command: command that is being run
table arguments: table of arguments send to the command
string argumentString: string of all arguments sent to the command

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/ipairs Shared Returns an iterator function for a for loop that will return the values of the specified sequential numerical table in order.
table tab: The table to iterate over

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/isangle Shared Returns if the passed object is an angle.
any variable: The variable to perform the type check for.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/isbool Shared Returns if the passed object is a boolean.
any variable: The variable to perform the type check for.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/IsBullshitBone Shared Returns true if the bonename is in a list of bones that the bone editor does not like to modify.
string bonename: The bonename to look up.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/IsEnemyEntityName Shared Returns if the given NPC class name is an enemy
string className: Class name of the entity to check

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/isentity Shared Returns if the passed object is an entity.
any variable: The variable to perform the type check for.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/IsEntity Shared Returns if the passed object is an entity.
any variable: The variable to check.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/IsFirstTimePredicted Shared Returns if this is the first time being predicted. This is useful for one-time logic in your SWEPs PrimaryAttack, SecondaryAttack and Reload (to prevent those hooks from being called rapidly in succession). It's also useful in a Move hook for when the client predicts movement.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/IsFriendEntityName Shared Returns if the given NPC class name is a friend
string className: Class name of the entity to check

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/isfunction Shared Returns if the passed object is a function.
any variable: The variable to perform the type check for.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/IsMounted Shared Checks whether or not a game is currently mounted.
string game: The game string/app ID to check.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/isnumber Shared Returns if the passed object is a number.
any variable: The variable to perform the type check for.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/ispanel Shared Returns if the passed object is a panel.
any variable: The variable to perform the type check for.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/isstring Shared Returns if the passed object is a string.
any variable: The variable to perform the type check for.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/istable Shared Returns if the passed object is a table.
any variable: The variable to perform the type check for.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/IsTableOfEntitiesValid Shared Returns whether or not every element within a table is a valid entity
table table: Table containing entities to check

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/IsValid Shared Checks if a table or class is valid
Checks that an object is not nil, has an IsValid method and if this method returns true. any toBeValidated: The table or class to be validated.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/isvector Shared Returns if the passed object is a vector.
any variable: The variable to perform the type check for.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/JS_Language Client Adds javascript function 'language' to an HTML panel as a method to call Lua's [[language/GetPhrase]] function
Panel htmlPanel: Panel to add javascript function 'language' to

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/Label Client Convenience function that creates a DLabel, sets the text, and returns it
string text: The string to set the label's text to

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/Lerp Shared Performs a linear interpolation from the start number to the end number.
number delta: The fraction for finding the result. This number is clamped between 0 and 1.
number from: The starting number. The result will be equal to this if delta is 0.
number to: The ending number. The result will be equal to this if delta is 1.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/LerpAngle Shared Returns point between first and second angle using given fraction and linear interpolation
number ratio: Ratio of progress through values
Angle angleStart: Angle to begin from
Angle angleEnd: Angle to end at

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/LerpVector Shared Linear interpolation between two vectors. It is commonly used to smooth movement between two vectors.
number percent: Percentage ranging from 0 to 1
Vector from: The initial Vector
Vector to: The desired Vector
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/LoadPresets Client Loads all preset settings for the [[presets]] module and returns them in a table

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/Localize Client Returns a localisation for the given token, if none is found it will return the default(second) parameter.
string localisationToken: The token to find a translation for.
string default: The default value to be returned if no translation was found.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/LocalPlayer Client Returns the player object of the current client. LocalPlayer() will return NULL until all entities have been initialized. See [[GM/InitPostEntity|InitPostEntity]].

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/LocalToWorld Shared Translates the specified position and angle from the specified coordinate system into worldspace coordinates
Vector localPos: The position that should be translated from specified system to world coordinates
Angle localAng: The angle that should be translated from specified system to world angles
Vector originPos: The origin of the system to translate from
Angle originAngle: The angles of the system to translate from

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/Material Shared Either returns the material with the given name, or loads the material interpreting the first argument as the path.
string materialName: The material name/path.
string pngParameters: A string containing keywords which will used to add material parameters.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/Matrix Shared Returns an empty matrix object.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/Mesh Client Returns a new mesh object.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/Model Shared Runs {{LibraryFunction|util|PrecacheModel}} and returns the string
string model: The model to precache

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/module Shared Creates a table with the specified module name and sets the function environment for said table, calls all additional loaders as the table as argument.
string name: The name of the module.
vararg loaders: Calls any function passed with the new table as argument.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/Msg Shared Writes every given argument to the console.
Automatically attempts to convert each argument to a string. (See {{GlobalFunction|tostring}})
Unlike {{GlobalFunction|print}}, arguments are not separated by anything. They are simply concatenated.
The text is colored depending on the realm where the function is called from (see the notes below). vararg args: List of values to print.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/MsgAll Shared Works exactly like {{GlobalFunction|Msg}} except that, if called on the server, will print to all players consoles plus the server console.
vararg args: List of values to print.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/MsgC Shared Just like [[Global/Msg| Msg]], except the text color is decided by the first argument.
Color color: The color of the text.
vararg args: List of values to print.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/MsgN Shared Just like {{GlobalFunction|Msg}}, except it adds a newline (''"\n"'') at the end.
vararg args: List of values to print.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/NamedColor Client Returns named color defined in resource/ClientScheme.res.
string name: Name of color

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/next Shared Returns the next key and value pair in a table
table tab: The table
any prevKey: The key previous to the keyvaluepair returned by this function

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/NumModelSkins Client Returns the amount of skins the specified model has
string modelName: Model to return amount of skins of

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/OnModelLoaded Client Called by the engine when a model has been loaded
string modelName: Name of the model
number numPostParams: Number of pose parameters the model has
number numSeq: Number of sequences the model has
number numAttachments: Number of attachments the model has
number numBoneControllers: Number of bone controllers the model has
number numSkins: Number of skins that the model has
number size: Size of the model

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/OrderVectors Shared Modifies the given vectors so that all of vector2's axis are larger than vector1's by switching them around. Also known as ordering vectors
Vector vector1: Bounding box min resultant
Vector vector2: Bounding box max resultant

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/pairs Shared Returns an iterator function({{GlobalFunction|next}}) for a for loop that will return the values of the specified table in an arbitrary order. For alphabetical order use {{GlobalFunction|SortedPairs}}.
table tab: The table to iterate over

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/ParticleEffect Shared Creates a particle effect.
string particleName: The name of the particle effect.
Vector position: The start position of the effect.
Angle angles: The orientation of the effect.
Entity parent: If set, the particle will be parented to the entity.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/ParticleEffectAttach Shared Creates a particle effect with specialized parameters.
string particleName: The name of the particle effect.
number attachType: Attachment type using {{Enum|PATTACH}}.
Entity entity: The entity to be used in the way specified by the attachType.
number attachmentID: The id of the attachment to be used in the way specified by the attachType.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/ParticleEmitter Shared Creates a new [http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Category:CLuaEmitter particle emitter].
Vector position: The start position of the emitter.
boolean use3D: Whenever to render the particles in 2D or 3D mode.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/Path Server Creates a path for the bot to follow
string type: The name of the path to create. This is going to be "Follower" right now.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/pcall Shared Calls a function and catches an error that can be thrown while the execution of the call.
function func: Function to be executed and of which the errors should be caught of
number arguments: Arguments to call the function with.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/Player Shared Returns the player with the matching player index.
number playerIndex: The player index.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/PositionSpawnIcon Client Moves the given model to the given position and returns view information based on its properties
Entity model: Model that is being rendered to the spawn icon
Vector position: Position that the model is being rendered at

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/PrecacheParticleSystem Shared Precaches the particle the the specified name.
string particleSystemName: The name of the particle system.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/print Shared Writes every given argument to the console.
Automatically attempts to convert each argument to a string. (See [[Global/tostring| tostring]])
Separates arguments with a tab character (''"\t"''). vararg args: List of values to print.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/PrintMessage Server Displays a message in the chat, console, or center of screen of every player.
number type: Which type of message should be sent to the players
string message: Message to be sent to the players

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/PrintTable Shared Recursively prints the contents of a table to the console.
table tableToPrint: The table to be printed
number indent: Internal argument, you shouldn't normally change this. It sets the indentation of the string printed for when there's a table within a table.
table done: Internal argument, you shouldn't normally change this. This checks if there is a table within a table.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/ProtectedCall Shared Runs a function without stopping whole script on error.
function func: Function to run

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/RandomPairs Shared Returns an iterator function that can be used to loop through a table in random order
table table: Table to create iterator for
boolean descending: Whether the iterator should iterate descending or not

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/rawequal Shared Compares the first and the second argument without calling their __eq operator.
any arg1: The first argument to compare.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/rawget Shared Gets the value with the specified key from the table without calling the __index method.
table table: Table to get the value from.
any index: The index to get the value from.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/rawset Shared Sets the value with the specified key from the table without calling the __newindex method.
table table: Table to get the value from.
any index: The index to get the value from.
any value: The value to set for the specified key.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/RealFrameTime Client Returns the real frame-time which is unaffected by host_timescale. To be used for GUI effects (for example)

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/RealTime Shared Returns the uptime of the game/server in seconds (to at least 4 decimal places) Note: this is '''not''' synchronised or affected by the game. You should use this function (or SysTime) for timing real-world events such as user interaction, but not for timing game events such as animations. See Also: {{LibraryFunction|Global|CurTime}}, {{LibraryFunction|Global|SysTime}}
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/RecipientFilter Server Creates a new recipient filter object.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/RegisterDermaMenuForClose Client Registers a Derma element to be closed the next time [[Global/CloseDermaMenus]] is called
Panel menu: Menu to be registered for closure
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/RememberCursorPosition Shared Saves position of your cursor on screen. You can restore it by using [[Global/RestoreCursorPosition|RestoreCursorPosition]].
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/RenderAngles Client Returns the angle that the clients view is being rendered at

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/RenderDoF Client Renders a Depth of Field effect
Vector origin: Origin to render the effect at
Angle angle: Angle to render the effect at
Vector usableFocusPoint: Point to focus the effect at
number angleSize: Angle size of the effect
number radialSteps: Amount of radial steps to render the effect with
number passes: Amount of render passes
boolean spin: Whether to cycle the frame or not
table inView: Table of view data
number fov: FOV to render the effect with

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/RenderStereoscopy Client Renders the stereoscopic post-process effect
Vector viewOrigin: Origin to render the effect at
Angle viewAngles: Angles to render the effect at

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/RenderSuperDoF Client Renders the Super Depth of Field post-process effect
Vector viewOrigin: Origin to render the effect at
Angle viewAngles: Angles to render the effect at
number viewFOV: Field of View to render the effect at

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/require Shared First tries to load a binary module with the given name, if unsuccesfull, it tries to load a lua module with the given name.
string name: The name of the module to be loaded.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/RestoreCursorPosition Shared Restores position of your cursor on screen. You can save it by using [[Global/RememberCursorPosition|RememberCursorPosition]].

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/RunConsoleCommand Shared Executes the given console command with the parameters.
string command: The command to be executed.
vararg arguments: The arguments. Note, that unlike {{ClassFunction|Player|ConCommand}}, you must pass each argument as a new string, not separating them with a space.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/RunString Shared Evaluates and executes the given code, will throw an error on failure.
string code: The code to execute.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/RunStringEx Shared The difference between this function and {{GlobalFunction|RunString}} is that this one lets you pic a custom identifier which will be shown in the error instead of "lua_run".
string code: The code to execute.
string identifier: The identifier.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/SafeRemoveEntity Shared Removes the given entity unless it is a player or the world entity
Entity ent: Entity to safely remove.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/SafeRemoveEntityDelayed Shared Removes entity after delay using [[Global/SafeRemoveEntity]]
Entity entity: Entity to be removed
number delay: Delay for entity removal in seconds

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/SavePresets Client Overwrites all presets with the supplied table. Used by the preset module for preset saving
table presets: Presets to be saved

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/ScreenScale Client Returns a number based on the Size argument and your screen's width.
number Size: The number you want to scale.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/ScrH Client Returns the height of the screen (in pixels).
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/ScrW Client Gets the width of the screen (in pixels).

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/select Shared Used to select single values from a vararg or get the count of values in it.
string parameter: If a string and the first char of the string equals #, the function will return the amount of values in the vararg. In case of a number it will return all values starting from the given index, if the number is negative, it will return the amount specified from the end instead of the beginning.
any vararg: The vararg.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/SendUserMessage Shared Send a usermessage
string Name: The name of the usermessage
any Recipient: Can be a RecipientFilter, table or player object
any VarArg: Data to send in the usermessage

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/ServerLog Server Prints "ServerLog: PARAM" without a newline, to the server log and console.
string parameter: The value to be printed to console.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/SetClipboardText Client Adds the given string to the computers clipboard, which can then be pasted in or outside of GMod with Ctrl + V.
string text: The text to add to the clipboard.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/setfenv Shared Sets the enviroment for a function or a stack level, if a function is passed, the return value will be the function, otherwise nil.
function location: The function to set the enviroment for or a number representing stack level.
table enviroment: Table to be used as enviroment.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/SetGlobalAngle Shared Defines an angle to be automatically networked to clients
any index: Index to identify the global angle with
Angle angle: Angle to be networked

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/SetGlobalBool Shared Defined a boolean to be automatically networked to clients
any index: Index to identify the global boolean with
boolean bool: Boolean to be networked

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/SetGlobalEntity Shared Defines an entity to be automatically networked to clients
any index: Index to identify the global entity with
Entity ent: Entity to be networked

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/SetGlobalFloat Shared Defines a floating point number to be automatically networked to clients
any index: Index to identify the global angle with
number float: Float to be networked

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/SetGlobalInt Shared Sets an integer that is shared between the server and all clients.
string Index: The unique index to identify the global value with.
number Value: The value to set the global value to

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/SetGlobalString Shared Defines a string to be automatically networked to clients
any index: Index to identify the global string with
string string: String to be networked

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/SetGlobalVar Shared Define a variable to be automatically networked to clients
any index: Index to identify the global variable with
any var: Variable to be networked

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/SetGlobalVector Shared Defines a vector to be automatically networked to clients
any index: Index to identify the global vector with
Vector vec: Vector to be networked

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/setmetatable Shared Sets, changes or removes a table's metatable. Returns Tab (first argument). table Tab: The table who's metatable to change. table Metatable: The metatable to assign.
If it's nil, the metatable will be removed.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/SetPhysConstraintSystem Shared Called by the engine to set which constraint system [https://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/Phys_constraintsystem] the next created constraints should use
Entity constraintSystem: Constraint system to use

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/SortedPairs Shared This function can be used in a for loop instead of {{GlobalFunction|pairs}}. It sorts all elements alphabetically.
table table: The table to sort

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/SortedPairsByMemberValue Shared Returns an iterator function that can be used to loop through a table in order of member values
table table: Table to create iterator for
string memberName: Name of member to order iteration by
boolean descending: Whether the iterator should iterate in descending order or not

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/SortedPairsByValue Shared Returns an iterator function that can be used to loop through a table in order of value
table table: Table to create iterator for
boolean descending: Whether the iterator should iterate in descending order or not

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/Sound Shared Runs {{LibraryFunction|util|PrecacheSound}} and returns the string
string soundPath: The soundpath to precache

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/SoundDuration Shared Returns the duration of the sound specified in seconds.
string soundName: The sound name.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/SQLStr Shared Returns the input value in an escaped form so that it can safely be used inside of queries. The returned value is surrounded by quotes unless noQuotes is true. Alias of [[sql/SQLStr]]
string input: String to be escaped
boolean noQuotes: Whether the returned value should be surrounded in quotes or not

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/SScale Client Returns a number based on the Size argument and your screen's width.
number Size: The number you want to scale.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/STNDRD Shared Returns ordinal suffix of given number
number value: value to return ordinal suffix of

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/SuppressHostEvents Server Suppress any networking from the server to the specified player.
Player suppressPlayer: The player to suppress any networking to.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/SysTime Shared Returns a highly accurate time since the start up, ideal for benchmarking.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/TauntCamera Shared Returns a TauntCamera object
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/TextEntryLoseFocus Client Clears focus from any text entries player may have focused.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/TimedCos Shared Returns a cosine value that fluctuates based on the current time
number frequency: The frequency of fluctuation
number min: Minimum value
number max: Maxmimum value
number offset: Offset variable that doesn't affect the rate of change, but causes the returned value to be offset by time

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/TimedSin Shared Returns a sine value that fluctuates based on the current time
number frequency: The frequency of fluctuation
number min: Minimum value
number max: Maxmimum value
number offset: Offset variable that doesn't affect the rate of change, but causes the returned value to be offset by time

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/tobool Shared Attempts to return an appropriate boolean for the given value
any val: The object to be converted to a boolean

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/tonumber Shared Converts the string to a number with the given base, returns nil on failure.
string string: The string containing a number
number base: The number base, must range from 2 to 37, will throw an error otherwise.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/tostring Shared Attempts to convert an object to a string, if defined, it will call the [[Using_Metatables#tostring| __tostring]] method for the given object's metatable, [[Global/print| print]] also uses this functionality.
any Var: The object to be converted to a string.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/type Shared Returns a string representing the name of the type of the passed object.
any Var: The object to get the type of.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/TypeID Shared Gets the associated type id of the variable.
any variable: The variable to get the type id of.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/unpack Shared This function takes a numeric indexed table and return all the members as a vararg, if specified it will start at the given index to the if specified end index.
table tbl: The table to generate the vararg from.
number startIndex: Additional start index.
number endIndex: Additional start index.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/UnPredictedCurTime Shared Returns the current asynchronous in-game time.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/UpdateRenderTarget Server Renders the rt material with the current angles and position of the given entity.
Entity ent: Given entity

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/UTIL_IsUselessModel Shared Returns whether or not a model is useless by checking that the file path is that of a proper model.
string modelName: The model name to be checked

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/ValidPanel Client Returns if a panel is safe to use.
Panel panel: The panel to validate.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/Vector Shared Creates a [[:Category:Vector|Vector]] object.
number x: The x component of the vector.
number y: The y component of the vector.
number z: The z component of the vector.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/VectorRand Shared Returns a random vector whose components are each between -1 and 1
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/VGUIFrameTime Client Returns the time in seconds it took to render the VGUI.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/VGUIRect Client Returns a DShape Derma element with the given dimensions
number x: X position of the created element
number y: Y position of the created element
number w: Width of the created element
number h: Height of the created element

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/VisualizeLayout Client Briefly displays layout details of the given panel on-screen
Panel panel: Panel to display layout details of

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/WorkshopFileBase Client Returns a new WorkshopFileBase element
string namespace: Namespace for the file base
table requiredTags: Tags required for a Workshop submission to be interacted with by the filebase

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/WorldToLocal Shared Translates the specified position and angle into the specified coordinate system.
Vector position: The position that should be translated from the current to the new system.
Angle angle: The angles that should be translated from the current to the new system.
Vector newSystemOrigin: The origin of the system to translate to.
Angle newSystemAngles: The angles of the system to translate to.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Global/xpcall Shared Attempts to call the first function, if the execution fails, the second function is called with the error message, unlike in {{GlobalFunction|pcall}} the stack is not unwinded and can therefore be used to stack analyses using {{LibraryFunction|debug|getinfo}}, the disadvantage of this function is, that it does not allow passing argument to the to be called function.
function func: Numbers to get the largest from
function errorCallback: Function to be called on error, error message passed as parameter
vararg arguments: Arguments to call the function with

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/AddDeathNotice Client Adds an death notice entry
string victim: The name of the victim
number victimTeam: The team of the victim
string inflictor: Name of the killicon to use
string attacker: Name of the attacker
number attackerTeam: Team of the attacker

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/AdjustMouseSensitivity Client Allows you to adjust the mouse sensitivity
number defaultSensitivity: The old sensitivity

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/AllowPlayerPickup Server Called when a player tries to pick up something using the "use" key, return to override.
Player ply: The player trying to pick up something.
Entity ent: The Entity the player attempted to pick up.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/CalcMainActivity Shared This hook is used to calculate animations for player.
Entity ply: The player to apply the animation.
Vector vel: The velocity of the player.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/CalcVehicleThirdPersonView Client Called when player is in 3rd person mode driving a vehicle.
Vehicle veh: The vehicle player is driving
Player ply: The driver
table view: The view data containing players FOV, view position and angles, see {{Struct|CamData}}

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/CalcVehicleView Client Allows override of vehicle view.
Vehicle veh: The vehicle being driven
Player ply: The vehicle driver
table view: View data table. See {{Struct|CamData}}

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/CalcView Client Allows override of the default view.
Player ply: The local player.
Vector pos: The player's view position.
Angle ang: The player's view angles.
number fov: Field of view.
number nearZ: Distance to near clipping plane.
number farZ: Distance to far clipping plane.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/CalcViewModelView Client Called to set the view models position.
Weapon wep: The weapon entity
Entity vm: The view model entity
Vector oldPos: Old eye position
Angle oldAng: Old eye angles
Vector pos: New eye position
Angle ang: New eye angles

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/CanEditVariable Server Called when a variable is edited on an Entity (called by Edit Properties... menu), to determine if the edit should be permitted
Entity ent: The entity being edited
Player ply: The player doing the editing
string key: The name of the variable
string val: The new value, as a string which will later be converted to its appropriate type

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/CanExitVehicle Server Determines if the player can exit the vehicle
Vehicle veh: The vehicle entity
Player ply: The player

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/CanPlayerEnterVehicle Shared Determines whether or not the player can enter the vehicle
Player player: The player
Vehicle vehicle: The vehicle
string sRole: Not sure what the point of this is

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/CanPlayerSuicide Server Determines if the player can kill themselves using the concommands "kill" or "explode"
Player player: The player

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/CanPlayerUnfreeze Server Determines if the player can unfreeze the entity
Player player: The player
Entity entity: The entity
PhysObj phys: The physics object of the entity

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/ChatText Client Called when a message is printed to the chat box. Note, that this isn't working with player messages even though there are arguments for it.
number iIndex: The index of the player.
string sName: The name of the player.
string sText: The text that is being send.
string sType: Chat filter type.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/ChatTextChanged Client Called whenever the content of the user's chat input box is changed.
string text: The new contents of the input box

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/CheckPassword Server Called when a non local player connects to allow the Lua system to check the password. The default behaviour in the base gamemodes emulates what would normally happen. If sv_password is set and its value matches the password passed in by the client - then they are allowed to join. If it isn't set it lets them in too.
string steamID: The 64bit Steam ID of the joining player
string ipAddress: The IP of the connecting client
string svPassword: The current value of sv_password (the password set by the server)
string clPassword: The password provided by the client
string name: The name of the joining player
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/CloseDermaMenus Client Called when derma menus are closed with [[Global/CloseDermaMenus|CloseDermaMenus]].
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/ContextMenuOpen Client Called when the context menu is trying to be opened. Return false to disallow it

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/CreateClientsideRagdoll Client Called whenever an entity becomes a clientside ragdoll.
Entity entity: The Entity that created the ragdoll
Entity ragdoll: The ragdoll being created.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/CreateEntityRagdoll Server Called when a ragdoll of an entity has been created
Entity owner: Entity that owns the ragdoll
Entity ragdoll: The ragdoll entity

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/CreateMove Client Allows you to change the players movements before they're sent to the server.
CUserCmd cmd: Command data
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/CreateTeams Shared Teams are created within this hook using [[team/SetUp]]

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/DoPlayerDeath Server Handles the player's death
Player ply: The player
Player attacker: The person that killed the player
CTakeDamageInfo dmg: Damage info

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/DrawDeathNotice Client This hook is called every frame to draw all of the current death notices.
number x: X position to draw death notices as a ratio
number y: Y position to draw death notices as a ratio
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/DrawOverlay Client Called after all other 2D draw hooks are called. Draws over all VGUI Panels and HUDs.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/DrawPhysgunBeam Client Allows you to override physgun beam drawing.
Player ply: Physgun owner
Weapon physgun: The physgun
boolean enabled: Is the beam enabled
Entity target: Entity we are aiming at
number bone: ID of the bone we are aiming at
Vector hitPos: Beam hit position

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/EndEntityDriving Shared Called right before an entity stops driving. Overriding this hook will cause it to not call {{LibraryFunction|drive|End}} and the player will not stop driving.
Entity ent: The entity being driven
Player ply: The player driving the entity

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/EntityKeyValue Shared Called when a keyvalue is set on an entity. Return a string to override the value
Entity ent: Entity that the keyvalue is being set on
string key: Key of the key/value pair
string value: Value of the key/value pair

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/EntityRemoved Shared Called right before the removal of an entity.
Entity ent: Entity being removed

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/EntityTakeDamage Server Called when an entity takes damage.
Entity target: The entity taking damage
CTakeDamageInfo dmg: Damage info

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/FindUseEntity Shared This hook polls the entity the player use action should be applied to.
Player ply: The player who initiated the use action.
Entity defaultEnt: The entity that was choosen by the engine.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/FinishChat Client Runs when user cancels/finishes typing.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/FinishMove Shared Called after {{HookFunction|GM|Move}}.
Player ply: Player
CMoveData mv: Movement data
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/ForceDermaSkin Client Returns the Derma skin to be used for panels by default. If nothing is returned the default skin will be used

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/GetFallDamage Server Called when a player takes damage from falling, allows to override the damage.
Player ply: The player
number speed: The fall speed
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/GetGameDescription Shared Returns the text to be shown in the server browser as the game

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/GetMotionBlurValues Client Allows you to modify the Source Engine's motion blur shaders.
number horizontal: The amount of horizontal blur.
number vertical: The amount of vertical blur.
number forward: The amount of forward/radial blur.
number rotational: The amount of rotational blur.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/GetTeamColor Client Returns the color for the given entity's team. This is used in chat and deathnotice text
Entity ent: Entity

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/GetTeamNumColor Client Returns the team color for the given team index
number team: Team index
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/GetVehicles Client Returns a table of vehicles.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/GrabEarAnimation Shared Override this hook to disable/change ear-grabbing in your gamemode
Player ply: Player

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/GravGunOnDropped Server Called when an entity is released by a gravity gun
Player ply: Player who is wielding the gravity gun
Entity ent: The entity that has been dropped

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/GravGunOnPickedUp Server Called when an entity is picked up by a gravity gun
Player ply: The player wielding the gravity gun
Entity ent: The entity that has been picked up by the phys gun

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/GravGunPickupAllowed Shared Returns whether or not a player is allowed to pick up an entity with the gravity gun. Return true to allow
Player ply: The player wielding the gravity gun
Entity ent: The entity the player is attempting to pick up

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/GravGunPunt Shared Called when an entity is about to be punted with the gravity gun (primary fire). Return true to allow and false to disallow
Player ply: The player wielding the gravity gun
Entity ent: The entity the player is attempting to punt

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/GUIMousePressed Client Called whenever a players presses a mouse key.
number mouseCode: The key that the player pressed using {{Enum|MOUSE}}.
Vector aimVector: A normalised direction vector local to the camera, similar to gui.ScreenToVector( gui.MousePos() ).

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/HandlePlayerDriving Shared Allows to override player driving animations.
Player ply: Player to process

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/HandlePlayerDucking Shared Allows to override player crouch animations.
Player ply: The player
number velocity: Players velocity

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/HandlePlayerJumping Shared Allows to override player jumping animations.
Player ply: The player
number velocity: Players velocity

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/HandlePlayerLanding Shared Allows to override player landing animations.
Player ply: The player
number velocity: Players velocity
boolean onGround: Was the player on ground?

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/HandlePlayerNoClipping Shared Allows to override player noclip animations.
Player ply: The player
number velocity: Players velocity

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/HandlePlayerSwimming Shared Allows to override player swimming animations.
Player ply: The player
number velocity: Players velocity

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/HandlePlayerVaulting Shared Allows to override player flying ( in mid-air, not noclipping ) animations.
Player ply: The player
number velocity: Players velocity
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/HideTeam Client Hides the team selection panel

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/HUDAmmoPickedUp Client Called when the client has picked up ammo. Override to disable default HUD notification
string itemName: Name of the item (ammo) picked up
number amount: Amount of the item (ammo) picked up
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/HUDDrawPickupHistory Client Renders the HUD pick-up history. Override to hide default or draw your own HUD
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/HUDDrawScoreBoard Client Called every frame to render the scoreboard. It is recommended to use Derma and VGUI for this job
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/HUDDrawTargetID Client Return false to not draw the player's name while looking at them.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/HUDItemPickedUp Client Called when an item has been picked up. Override to disable the default HUD notification
string itemName: Name of the picked up item
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/HUDPaint Client Called whenever the HUD should be drawn.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/HUDPaintBackground Client Called whenever the HUD background is being drawn.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/HUDShouldDraw Client Called when the Gamemodes draws the Heads up Display also known as HUD
string name: The name of the HUD element

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/HUDWeaponPickedUp Client Called when a weapon has been picked up. Override to disable the default HUD notification
Weapon weapon: The picked up weapon
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/Initialize Shared Called after the gamemode loads and starts.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/InitPostEntity Shared Called after all the entities are initialized.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/InputMouseApply Client Allows you to modify the supplied User Command with mouse input. This could be used to make moving the mouse do funky things to view angles
CUserCmd cmd: User command
number x: The amount of mouse movement across the X axis this frame
number y: The amount of mouse movement across the Y axis this frame
Angle ang: The current view angle

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/IsSpawnpointSuitable Server Check if a player can spawn at a certain spawnpoint
Player ply: The player who is spawned
Entity spawnpoint: The spawnpoint entity (on the map)
boolean makeSuitable: If this is true, it'll kill any players blocking the spawnpoint

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/KeyPress Shared Called whenever a player pressed a key included within the IN keys.
Player ply: The player pressing the key
number key: The key that the player pressed using {{Enum|IN}}.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/KeyRelease Shared Runs when a IN key was released by a player.
Entity ply: The player releasing the key
number key: The key that the player released using {{Enum|IN}}.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/MouthMoveAnimation Shared Override this gamemode function to disable mouth movement when talking on voice chat
Player ply: Player in question

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/Move Shared The Move hook is called for you to manipulate the player's MoveData. You shouldn't adjust the player's position in any way in the move hook. This is because due to prediction errors, the netcode might run the move hook multiple times as packets arrive late. Therefore you should only adjust the movedata construct in this hook. Generally you shouldn't have to use this hook - if you want to make a custom move type you should look at the drive system.
Player ply: Player
CMoveData cmd: Movement information
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/NeedsDepthPass Client Returning true in this hook will cause it to render depth buffers defined with {{LibraryFunction|render|GetResolvedFullFrameDepth}}.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/NetworkEntityCreated Client Called when an entity has been created over the network
Entity ent: Created entity

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/NetworkIDValidated Server Called when a player has been validated by Steam
string name: Player name
string steamID: Player SteamID

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/OnAchievementAchieved Client Called when a player has achieved an achievement. You can get the name and other information from an achievement ID with the {{Type|achievements}} library
Player ply: The player that earned the achievement
number achievement: The index of the achievement

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/OnChatTab Client Called when the local player presses TAB while having their chatbox opened.
string text: The currently typed into chatbox text
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/OnContextMenuClose Client Called when the context menu was closed.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/OnContextMenuOpen Client Called when the context menu was opened.

Player ply: Player who has been hurt

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/OnEntityCreated Shared Called right after the Entity has been made visible to Lua.
Entity entity: The entity
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/OnGamemodeLoaded Shared Called when the gamemode is loaded.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/OnNPCKilled Server Called whenever an NPC is killed.
NPC npc: The killed NPC
Entity attacker: The NPCs Attacker
Entity inflictor: Kill inflictor. Not necessarily is a weapon.

Player ply: The player who tried to freeze the entity.

Weapon physgun: The physgun in question
Player ply: The player wielding the physgun

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/OnPlayerChangedTeam Server Called when a player has changed team

Entity ply: The player

number speed: The speed at which the player hit the ground
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/OnReloaded Shared Called when gamemode has been reloaded by auto refresh.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/OnSpawnMenuClose Client Called when a player closes the spawn menu.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/OnSpawnMenuOpen Client Called when a player opens the Spawn Menu.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/OnTextEntryGetFocus Client Called when DTextEntry gets focus.
Panel panel: The panel that got focus

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/OnTextEntryLoseFocus Client Called when DTextEntry loses focus.
Panel panel: The panel that lost focus

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/OnViewModelChanged Shared Called when the player changes their weapon to another one - and their viewmodel model changes
Entity viewmodel: The viewmodel that is changing
string oldModel: The old model
string newModel: The new model

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/PhysgunDrop Shared Called when a player drops an entity with the Physgun.
Player ply: The player who dropped an entitiy

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/PhysgunPickup Shared Called whenever a player picks up an entity with the Physgun.
Player player: The player that is picking up using the phys gun.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/PlayerAuthed Server Commands to run once a player is authenticated
Player ply: The player

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/PlayerBindPress Client Runs when a bind has been pressed. Allows to block commands.
Player ply: The player who used the command
string bind: The bind command
boolean pressed: If the bind was activated or deactivated

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/PlayerCanHearPlayersVoice Server Polls if a player can be heard by another player.
Player listener: The listening player.
Player talker: The talking player.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/PlayerCanJoinTeam Server Returns whether or not a player is allowed to join a team
Player ply: Player attempting to switch teams

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/PlayerCanPickupItem Server Returns whether or not a player is allowed to pick an item up
Player ply: Player attempting to pick up

string text: The chat text

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/PlayerConnect Shared Executes when a player connects to the server.
string name: Players name
string ip: Players IP Address

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/PlayerDeath Server Called when a player dies.
Player victim: The player who died

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/PlayerDeathThink Server Called every think while the player is dead.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/PlayerDisconnected Server Called when a player leaves the server
Player ply: the player

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/PlayerDriveAnimate Shared Called to update the player's animation during a drive
Player ply: The driving player

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/PlayerEndVoice Client Called when player stops using voice chat.
Player ply: Player who stopped talking

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/PlayerEnteredVehicle Shared Called when a player enters a vehicle. Note: although this hook is defined in the base gamemode as shared, it doesn't appear to be called clientside.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/PlayerFootstep Shared Called whenever a player steps. Return true to mute the normal sound
Player ply: The stepping player

Player ply: Player who has frozen an object

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/PlayerHurt Shared Called when a player gets hurt.
Player victim: Victim

number healthRemaining: Remaining Health
number damageTaken: Damage Taken

Player ply: Player to force
number team: The team to put player into

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/PlayerLeaveVehicle Server Called when a player leaves a vehicle.
Player ply: Player who left a vehicle.
Vehicle veh: Vehicle the player left.

Player ply: The person who entered/exited noclip

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/PlayerSay Server Called when a player dispatched a chat message.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/PlayerSelectSpawn Server Called whenever a player dies and needs to respawn.

Player player: The player who spawned.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/PlayerSpray Server Called whenever a player sprayed his logo, return true to prevent the spray.

Player ply: The player who is taunting

number type: The type of footsteps, see {{Enum|STEPSOUNDTIME}}

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/PlayerTick Shared Runs for every player's tick.
Entity player: The player

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/PopulateMenuBar Client Called when it's time to populate the context menu menu bar at the top.
Panel menubar: The menu bar itself
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/PopulateSTOOLMenu Client Called to populate the Scripted Tool menu.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/PostCleanupMap Shared Called right after the map has cleaned up (usually because {{LibraryFunction|game|CleanUpMap}} was called)
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/PostDraw2DSkyBox Client Called right after the 2D skybox has been drawn - allowing you to draw over it.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/PostDrawEffects Client Called after rendering effects. This is where halos are drawn.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/PostDrawHUD Client Called after {{HookFunction|GM|PreDrawHUD}}, {{HookFunction|GM|HUDPaintBackground}} and {{HookFunction|GM|HUDPaint}} but before {{HookFunction|GM|DrawOverlay}}.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/PostDrawOpaqueRenderables Client Called after drawing opaque entities.
boolean bDrawingDepth: Unknown
boolean bDrawingSkybox: True if we are drawing skybox
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/PostDrawSkyBox Client Called after drawing the skybox.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/PostDrawTranslucentRenderables Client Called after all translucent entites are drawn.
boolean bDrawingDepth: Unknown
boolean bDrawingSkybox: True if we are drawing skybox

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/PostDrawViewModel Client Called after view model is drawn.
Entity viewmodel: Players view model
Player player: The owner of the weapon/view model
Weapon weapon: The weapon the player is currently holding
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/PostGamemodeLoaded Shared Called after the gamemode has loaded.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/PostPlayerDraw Client Called after the player was drawn.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/PostProcessPermitted Client Allows you to suppress post processing effect drawing
string ppeffect: The classname of Post Processing effect

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/PostRenderVGUI Client Called after the VGUI has been drawn.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/PreCleanupMap Shared Called right before the map cleans up (usually because {{LibraryFunction|game|CleanUpMap}} was called)
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/PreDrawEffects Client Called before rendering effects.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/PreDrawHUD Client Called before any of 2D drawing functions. Drawing anything in it seems to work incorrectly.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/PreDrawOpaqueRenderables Client Called before all opaque entities are drawn.
boolean isDrawingDepth: Whether the current draw is writing depth.
boolean isDrawSkybox: Whether the current draw is drawing the skybow.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/PreDrawSkyBox Client Called before the sky box is drawn.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/PreDrawTranslucentRenderables Client Called before all the translucent entities are drawn.
boolean isDrawingDepth: Whether the current draw is writing depth.
boolean isDrawSkybox: Whether the current draw is drawing the skybow.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/PreDrawViewModel Client Called before the view model has been drawn. This hook by default also calls this on weapons, so you can use {{HookFunction|WEAPON|PreDrawViewModel}}
Entity vm: This is the view model entity before it is drawn. On server-side, this entity is the predicted view model.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/PreGamemodeLoaded Shared Called before the gamemode is loaded.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/PrePlayerDraw Client Called before the player is drawn.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/PreReloadToolsMenu Client Called right before the Lua Loaded tool menus are reloaded.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/PreRender Client Called before the renderer is about to start rendering the next frame.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/GM/PreventScreenClicks Client This will prevent IN_ATTACK from sending to server when player tries to shoot from C menu.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/jit/attach Shared You can attach callbacks to a number of compiler events with jit.attach. The callback can be called: *when a function has been compiled to bytecode ("bc"); *when trace recording starts or stops ("trace"); *as a trace is being recorded ("record"); *or when a trace exits through a side exit ("texit"). Set a callback with jit.attach(callback, "event") and clear the same callback with jit.attach(callback) Note: This function isn't officially documented on LuJIT wiki, use it at your own risk. function callback: The callback function. The arguments passed to the callback depend on the event being reported: *"bc": {{FuncArg|function|func|The function that's just been recorded}}
*"trace": {{FuncArg|string|what|description of the trace event: "flush", "start", "stop", "abort". Available for all events.}}
{{FuncArg|number|tr|The trace number. Not available for flush.}}
{{FuncArg|function|func|The function being traced. Available for start and abort.}}
{{FuncArg|number|pc|The program counter - the bytecode number of the function being recorded (if this a Lua function). Available for start and abort.}}
{{FuncArg|number|otr|start: the parent trace number if this is a side trace, abort: abort code}}
{{FuncArg|string|oex|start: the exit number for the parent trace, abort: abort reason (string)}}
*"record": {{FuncArg|number|tr|The trace number. Not available for flush.}}
{{FuncArg|function|func|The function being traced. Available for start and abort.}}
{{FuncArg|number|pc|The program counter - the bytecode number of the function being recorded (if this a Lua function). Available for start and abort.}}
{{FuncArg|number|depth |The depth of the inlining of the current bytecode.}}
*"texit": {{FuncArg|number|tr|The trace number. Not available for flush.}}
{{FuncArg|number|ex|The exit number}}
{{FuncArg|number|ngpr|The number of general-purpose and floating point registers that are active at the exit.}}
{{FuncArg|number|nfpr|The number of general-purpose and floating point registers that are active at the exit.}} string event: The event to hook into.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/jit/flush Shared Flushes the whole cache of compiled code.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/jit/off Shared Disables LuaJIT Lua compilation.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/jit/on Shared Enables LuaJIT Lua compilation.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/jit/status Shared Returns the status of the JIT compiler and the current optimizations enabled.
