http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Locomotion/GetVelocity Server Returns the current movement velocity as a vector
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Locomotion/IsAttemptingToMove Server Returns true if we're trying to move
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Locomotion/IsClimbingOrJumping Server Returns true of the locomotion engine is jumping or climbing
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Locomotion/IsStuck Server Returns true if we're stuck
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Locomotion/Jump Server Makes the bot jump

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Locomotion/SetAcceleration Server Sets the acceleration
number speed: Speed (default is 400)

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Locomotion/SetDeathDropHeight Server Sets the height the bot is scared to fall from
number height: Height (default is 200)

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Locomotion/SetDeceleration Server Sets the acceleration
number speed: Speed (default is 400)

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Locomotion/SetDesiredSpeed Server Sets movement speed
number speed: desired speed

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Locomotion/SetJumpHeight Server Sets the height of the bot's jump
number height: Height (default is 58)

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Locomotion/SetStepHeight Server Sets the max height the bot can step up
number height: Height (default is 18)

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/markup/Parse Client Parses markup into a {{Type| MarkupObject}}.
string markup: The markup to be parsed.
number maxwidth: The max width of the output

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/math/abs Shared Calculates the absolute value of a number (effectively removes any negative sign).
number x: The number to get the absolute value of.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/math/acos Shared Returns the arc cosine of the given number.
number normal: Value in range of -1 - 1.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/math/AngleDifference Shared Calculates the difference between two angles
number a: The first angle
number b: The second angle

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/math/Approach Shared Increments a value from a start point by the given amount, up to a given upper limit.
number start: The number to start with.
number end: The max value, this function will never return a number greater than this.
number amount: The amount to increment the starting number by.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/math/ApproachAngle Shared Increments an angle towards another by specified rate
number currentAngle: The current angle to increase
number targetAngle: The angle to increase towards
number rate: The amount to approach the target angle by

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/math/asin Shared Returns the arc sine of the given number.
number normal: Value in range of -1 - 1.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/math/atan Shared Returns the arc tangents of the given number.
number normal: Value in range of -1 - 1.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/math/atan2 Shared Returns the atan2 of the specified values.
number y: Y coordinate.
number x: X coordinate.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/math/BinToInt Shared Converts a binary string into a number.
string string: Binary string to convert

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/math/BSplinePoint Shared Basic code for Bezier-Spline algorithm.
table tPoints: A table of {{GlobalFunction|Vector}}s
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/math/calcBSplineN Shared Basic code for Bezier-Spline algorithm.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/math/ceil Shared Ceils or rounds a number up.
number number: The number to be rounded up.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/math/Clamp Shared Clamps a number between a minimum and maximum value
number input: The number to clamp.
number min: The minimum value, this function will never return a number less than this.
number max: The maximum value, this function will never return a number greater than this.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/math/cos Shared Returns cosine of given angle.
number number: Angle in radians

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/math/cosh Shared Returns hyperbolic cosine of the given number.
number number: Value in radians.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/math/deg Shared Converts radians to degrees.
number radians: Value to be converted to degrees.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/math/Dist Shared Returns the difference between two points in 2D space
number x1: X position of first point
number y1: Y position of first point
number x2: X position of second point
number y2: Y position of second point

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/math/Distance Shared Returns the difference between two points in 2D space. Alias of [[math/Dist]]
number x1: X position of first point
number y1: Y position of first point
number x2: X position of second point
number y2: Y position of second point

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/math/EaseInOut Shared Calculates the progress of a value fraction, taking in to account given easing fractions
number progress: Fraction of the progress to ease
number easeIn: Fraction of how much easing to begin with
number easeOut: Fraction of how much easing to end with

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/math/exp Shared Returns the x power of the euler constant.
number exponent: The exponent for the function.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/math/floor Shared Floors or rounds a number down.
number number: The number to be rounded down.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/math/fmod Shared Returns the modulus of the specified values.
number lhs: The base value.
number rhs: Modulator.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/math/frexp Shared used to split the number value into a normalized fraction and an exponent. Two values are returned: the first is a value always in the range 1/2 (inclusive) to 1 (exclusive) and the second is an exponent.
number inputValue: The value to get the normalized fraction and the exponent from.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/math/IntToBin Shared Converts an integer to a binary (base-2) string
number number: Number to be converted

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/math/ldexp Shared Takes a normalised number and returns the floating point representation.
number normalizedFraction: The value to get the normalized fraction and the exponent from.
number exponent: The value to get the normalized fraction and the exponent from.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/math/log Shared Returns the the given exponent for the base e.
number value: The value to get the base from exponent from.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/math/log10 Shared Returns the the given exponent for the base 10.
number value: The value to get the base from exponent from.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/math/max Shared Returns the largest value of all arguments.
vararg numbers: Numbers to get the largest from

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/math/min Shared Returns the smallest value of all arguments.
vararg numbers: Numbers to get the smallest from.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/math/mod Shared Returns the modulus of the specified values. Same as {{LibraryFunction|math|fmod}}.
number base: The base value
number modulator: Modulator

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/math/modf Shared Returns the integral and fractional component of the modulo operation.
number base: The base value.
number modulator: Modulator.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/math/NormalizeAngle Shared Normalizes angle, so it takes value between -180 and 180.
number angle: The angle to normalize.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/math/pow Shared Returns the y power of x.
number x: Base.
number y: Exponent.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/math/rad Shared Converts an angle in degrees to it's equivalent in radians.
number degrees: The angle measured in degrees.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/math/Rand Shared Returns a random float between min and max
number min: The minimum value
number max: The maximum value

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/math/random Shared If no value is specified, a random float value between 0-1 will be returned, if the first value is specified, a integer value between 1 and the specified value will be returned, if both values are specified, a integer value between the first and the second value will be returned, all inputs are rounded. If the first value is larger as the second value an error like: '''bad argument #2 to 'random' (interval is empty)''' will be thrown.
number limitOrLimitStart: Limit or begin of limit.
number limit: End of limit.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/math/randomseed Shared Seeds the "seed" for the random generator, which will cause {{LibraryFunction|math|random}} to return the same sequence of numbers.
number seed: The new seed.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/math/Remap Shared Remaps the value from one range to another
number value: The value
number inMin: The minimum of the initial range
number inMax: The maximum of the initial range
number outMin: The minimum of new range
number outMax: The maximum of new range

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/math/Round Shared Rounds the given value to the nearest whole number or to the given decimal places.
number value: The value to round.
number decimals: The decimal places to round to.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/math/sin Shared Returns sine of given angle.
number number: Angle in radians

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/math/sinh Shared Returns hyperbolic sine of the given number.
number number: Value in radians.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/math/sqrt Shared Returns the square root of the number.
number value: Value to get the square root from.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/math/tan Shared Returns tangents of given angle.
number value: Angle in radians

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/math/tanh Shared Returns hyperbolic tangents of the given number.
number number: Value in radians.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/math/TimeFraction Shared Returns the fraction of where the current time is relative to the start and end times
number start: Start time in seconds
number end: End time in seconds
number current: Current time in seconds

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/matproxy/Add Client Adds a material proxy.
table MatProxyData: The information about the proxy. See {{Struct|MatProxyData}}
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/matproxy/Call Client Called by the engine from OnBind
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/matproxy/Init Client Called by the engine from OnBind

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/matproxy/ShouldOverrideProxy Client Called by engine, returns true if we're overriding a proxy
string name: The name of proxy in question
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/menu/RecordFrame Client Used by "Demo to Video" to record the frame.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/menubar/Init Client Creates the menu bar ( The bar at the top of the screen when holding C or Q in sandbox ) and docks it to the top of the screen. It will not appear.
Calling this multiple times will '''NOT''' remove previous panel.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/menubar/IsParent Client Checks if the supplied panel is parent to the menubar
Panel pnl: The panel to check

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/menubar/ParentTo Client Parents the menubar to the panel and displays the menubar.
Panel pnl: The panel to parent to
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/mesh/AdvanceVertex Client Pushes the new vertex data onto the render stack.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/mesh/Begin Client Starts a new dynamic mesh.
number primitiveType: Primitive type, see {{Enum|MATERIAL}}.
number primiteCount: The amount of primitives.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/mesh/Color Client Sets the color to be used for the next vertex.
number r: Red component.
number g: Green component.
number b: Blue component.
number a: Alpha component.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/mesh/End Client Ends the mesh and renders it.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/mesh/Normal Client Sets the normal to be used for the next vertex.
Vector normal: The normal of the vertex.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/mesh/Position Client Sets the position to be used for the next vertex.
Vector position: The position of the vertex.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/mesh/Quad Client Draws a quad using 4 vertices.
Vector vertex1: The first vertex.
Vector vertex2: The second vertex.
Vector vertex3: The third vertex.
Vector vertex4: The fourth vertex.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/mesh/QuadEasy Client Draws a quad using a position, a normal and the size.
Vector position: The center of the quad.
Vector normal: The normal of the quad.
number sizeX: X size in pixels.
number sizeY: Y size in pixels.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/mesh/Specular Client Sets the specular map values.
number r: The red channel multiplier of the specular map.
number g: The green channel multiplier of the specular map.
number b: The blue channel multiplier of the specular map.
number a: The alpha channel multiplier of the specular map.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/mesh/TangentS Client Sets the s tangent to be used.
Vector sTanger: The s tangent.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/mesh/TangentT Client Sets the T tangent to be used.
Vector tTanger: The t tangent.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/mesh/TexCoord Client Sets the texture coordinates for the next vertex.
number stage: The stage of the texture coordinate.
number u: U coordinate.
number v: V coordinate.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/mesh/VertexCount Client Returns the amount of vertex that have yet been pushes.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/motionsensor/ChooseBuilderFromEntity Shared
Entity ent: Entity to choose builder for
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/motionsensor/GetColourMaterial Client Returns the depth map material.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/motionsensor/IsActive Client Return whether a kinect is connected - and active (ie - Start has been called).
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/motionsensor/IsAvailable Client Returns true if we have detected that there's a kinect connected to the PC
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/motionsensor/Start Client This starts access to the kinect sensor. Note that this usually freezes the game for a couple of seconds.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/motionsensor/Stop Client Stops the motion capture.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/NavArea/DrawSpots Server Debugoverlay's the hiding spots. This includes sniper/exposed spots too!
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/NavArea/GetExposedSpots Server Returns a table of very bad hiding spots in this area
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/NavArea/GetHidingSpots Server Returns a table of good hiding spots in this area
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/NavArea/GetID Server Returns this area's unique ID

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/navmesh/Find Server Returns a bunch of areas within distance, used to find hiding spots by {{Type|NextBot}}s for example.
Vector pos: The position to search around
number radius: Radius to search within
number stepdown: Maximum stepdown( fall distance ) allowed
number stepup: Maximum stepup( jump height ) allowed

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/navmesh/FindSurroundingAreas Server Returns a table of found surrounding areas
Vector pos: The position you want to 'start from'
number maxdist: The maximum distance you want to travel from arg1
number stepheight: The maximum step height you can get up
number dropheight: The maximum drop height you can get down
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/navmesh/GetMap Server This function does not appear to do anything.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/net/Broadcast Server Sends the currently build net message to all connected players
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/net/BytesWritten Shared Returns the size of the current message in bytes.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/net/Incoming Shared Function called by the engine to tell the lua state a message arrived, you should not modify this function.
number length: message length in bits.
Entity client: Serverside, this will be the client that send the message, on the clientside this will be nil.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/net/ReadAngle Shared Reads an angle from the received net message.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/net/ReadBit Shared Reads a boolean from the received net message.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/net/ReadData Shared Reads pure binary data from the message.
number length: The length of the data to be read.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/net/ReadDouble Shared Reads a double precious number from the received net message.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/net/ReadEntity Shared Reads an entity from the received net message. You should always check if the specified entity exists as it may have been removed and therefor NULL if it is outside of the players PVS or was already removed.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/net/ReadFloat Shared Reads a floating point number from the received net message.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/net/ReadHeader Shared Returns the "header" of the message which contains a short which can be converted to the corresponding message name via {{LibraryFunction|util|NetworkIDToString}}.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/net/ReadInt Shared Reads an integer from the received net message.
number bitCount: The amount of bits to be read, should be power of 2.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/net/ReadNormal Shared Reads a normal vector from the net message.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/net/ReadString Shared Reads a null terminated string from the net stream.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/net/ReadTable Shared Reads a table from the received net message.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/net/ReadType Shared Reads a value from the usermessage with the specified type.
number TypeID: The type of value to be read, using {{Enum|TYPE}}.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/net/ReadUInt Shared Reads an unsigned integer with the specified number of bits from the received net message.
number numberOfBits: The size of the integer to be read, in bits.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/net/ReadVector Shared Reads a vector from the received net message. Vectors sent by this function are compressed, which may result in precision loss. See [[net/WriteVector]] for more information.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/net/Receive Shared Adds a net message handler.
string messageName: The message name to hook to.
function callback: The function to be called if the specified message was received. See the example for the arguments.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/net/Send Server Sends the current message to the specified player, or to all players listed in the table.
any ply: The player(s) to send the message to. Can be a table of players

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/net/SendOmit Server Sends the current message to all except the specified, or to all except all players in the table.
Player ply: The player(s) to NOT send the message to. Can be a table of players

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/net/SendPAS Server Sends the message to all players that are in the same potentially audible set(PAS) as the position, or simply said, it adds all players that can potentially hear sounds from this position.
Vector position: PAS position.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/net/SendPVS Server Sends the message to all players that are in the same potentially visibility set(PVS) as the position, or simply said, it adds all players that can potentially be seen from this position.
Vector position: PVS position.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/net/SendToServer Client Sends the current message to the server.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/net/Start Shared Begins a new net message. Don't forget to pool the messageName with {{LibraryFunction|util|AddNetworkString}}!
string messageName: The name of the message to send

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/net/WriteAngle Shared Writes an angle to the current net message.
Angle angle: The angle to be sent.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/net/WriteBit Shared Appends a boolean to the current net message.
boolean boolean: T

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/net/WriteData Shared Writes a chunk of binary data to the message.
string binaryData: The binary data to be send.
number length: The length of the binary data to be send.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/net/WriteDouble Shared Appends a double (a big number) to the current net message.
number double: The double to be sent

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/net/WriteEntity Shared Appends an entity to the current net message.
Entity entity: The entity to be sent.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/net/WriteFloat Shared Appends a float (number with decimals) to the current net message.
number float: The float to be sent.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/net/WriteInt Shared Appends an integer (number without decimals) to the current net message.
number integer: The integer to be sent.
number bitCount: The amount of bits the number consists of.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/net/WriteNormal Shared Writes a normal vector to the net message.
Vector normal: The normal vector to be send.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/net/WriteString Shared Appends a string to the current net message.
string string: The string to be sent.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/net/WriteTable Shared Appends a table to the current net message.
table table: The table to be sent.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/net/WriteType Shared Appends any type of value to the usermessage.
any Data: The data to be sent. A UInt(8) indicating the type will automatically be written to the packet before the value, in order to facilitate reading with net.ReadType.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/net/WriteUInt Shared Appends an unsigned integer with the specified number of bits to the current net message.
number unsignedInteger: The unsigned integer to be sent.
number numberOfBits: The size of the integer to be sent, in bits. Acceptable values range from 1 to 32. Other values will cause undefined behaviour.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/net/WriteVector Shared Appends a vector to the current net message. Vectors sent by this function are compressed, which may result in precision loss. XYZ components greater than 16384 or less than -16384 are irrecoverably altered (most significant bits are trimmed) and precision after the decimal point is low.
Vector vector: The vector to be sent.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/NextBot/BecomeRagdoll Server Become a ragdoll and remove the entity.
CTakeDamageInfo info: Damage info passed from an onkilled event

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/NEXTBOT/BehaveStart Server Called to initialize the behaviour. You shouldn't override this - it's used to kick off the coroutine that runs the bot's behaviour. This is called automatically when the NPC is created, there should be no need to call it manually.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/NEXTBOT/BehaveUpdate Server Called to update the bot's behaviour
number interval: How long since the last update

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/NextBot/BodyMoveXY Server Should only be called in BodyUpdate. This sets the move_x and move_y pose parameters of the bot to fit how they're currently moving, sets the animation speed to suit the ground speed and calls FrameAdvance.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/NEXTBOT/BodyUpdate Server Called to update the bot's animation

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/NextBot/FindSpot Server Like FindSpots but only returns a vector
string type: Either "random", "near", "far"
table options: A table containing a bunch of tweakable options. See the function definition for more details

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/NextBot/FindSpots Server Returns a table of hiding spots. table specs: This table should contain the search info.

{{FuncArg|string|type|The type (either 'hiding')}}
{{FuncArg|Vector|pos|the position to search.}}
{{FuncArg|number|radius|the radius to search.}}
{{FuncArg|number|stepup|the highest step to step up.}}
{{FuncArg|number|stepdown|the highest we can step down without being hurt.}}
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/NextBot/GetActivity Server Returns the currently running activity

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/NextBot/GetRangeSquaredTo Server Returns the distance to an entity or position. It is supposed to return a squared distance, however.
Vector to: Position to measure distance to. Can be an entity.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/NextBot/GetRangeTo Server Returns the distance to an entity or position
Vector to: Either an entity or a Vector position

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/NextBot/HandleStuck Server Called from Lua when the NPC is stuck. This should only be called from the behaviour coroutine - so if you want to override this function and do something special that yields - then go for it. You should always call self.loco:ClearStuck() in this function to reset the stuck status - so it knows it's unstuck.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/NextBot/MoveToPos Server To be called in the behaviour coroutine only! Will yield until the bot has reached the goal or is stuck
Vector pos: The position we want to get to
table options: A table containing a bunch of tweakable options. See the function definition for more details

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/NEXTBOT/OnInjured Server Called when the bot gets hurt
CTakeDamageInfo info: The damage info

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/NEXTBOT/OnKilled Server Called when the bot gets killed
CTakeDamageInfo info: The damage info
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/NEXTBOT/OnLandOnGround Server Called when the bot's feet return to the ground
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/NEXTBOT/OnLeaveGround Server Called when the bot's feet leave the ground - for whatever reason

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/NEXTBOT/OnOtherKilled Server Called when someone else or something else has been killed
CTakeDamageInfo info: The damage info
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/NEXTBOT/OnStuck Server Called when the bot thinks it is stuck
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/NEXTBOT/OnUnStuck Server Called when the bot thinks it is un-stuck

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/NextBot/PlayScene Server Returns the currently running activity
string SceneName: The name of the scene you want to play

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/NextBot/PlaySequenceAndWait Server To be called in the behaviour coroutine only! Plays an animation sequence and waits for it to end before returning.
string name: The sequence name
number speed: Playback Rate of that sequence

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/NextBot/StartActivity Server Start doing an activity (animation)
number Activity: One of the ACT_ enums (ACT_RANGE_ATTACK1 etc)
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/NEXTBOT/Think Server Called every tick

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/NEXTBOT/Use Server Called when a player 'uses' the entity
Entity activator: The entity that activated the use
Entity called: The entity that called the use
number type: The type of use, see {{Enum|USE}}
number value: Any passed value

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/notification/AddLegacy Client Adds a standard notification to your screen.
string Text: The string to display
number Type: Determines the method for displaying the notification. See the [[Enums/NOTIFY|NOTIFY_ Enums]]
number Length: The number of seconds to display the notification for

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/notification/AddProgress Client Adds a notification with an animated progress bar.
any id: Can be any type. It's used as an index.
string strText: The text to show

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/notification/Die Client {{Deprecated|Function doesn't seem to be doing anything useful}} Prints supplied arguments to console.
string uid: Notification unique ID
number delay: Delay

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/notification/Kill Client Removes the notification.
string uid: The unique ID of the notification

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/NPC/AddEntityRelationship Server Makes the NPC like, hate, feel neutral towards, or fear the entity in question.
Entity target: The entity for the relationship to be applied to.
number disposition: A {{Enum|D}} representing the relationship type.
number priority: How strong the relationship is.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/NPC/AddRelationship Server Changes how an NPC feels towards another NPC.
string relationstring: A string representing how the relationship should be set up. Should be formatted as "npc_class {{Enum|D}} numberPriority".

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/NPC/CapabilitiesAdd Server Adds a capability to the NPC
number capabilities: Capabilities to add, see {{Enum|CAP}}
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/NPC/Classify Server Returns the NPC class. Do not confuse with {{ClassFunction|Entity|GetClass}}!
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/NPC/GetHullType Server Returns NPCs hull type set by {{ClassFunction|NPC|SetHullType}}.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/NPC/Give Server Used to give a weapon to an already spawned NPC.
string weapon: Class name of the weapon to equip to the NPC.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/NPC/IsNPC Shared Checks if the entity is a NPC or not.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/NPC/SetEnemy Server Sets the target for an NPC.
Entity enemy: The enemy that the NPC should target

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/NPC/SetHullType Server Sets the hull type for the NPC.
number hullType: Hull type. See {{Enum|HULL}}

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/NPC/SetNPCState Server Sets the state the NPC is in to help it decide on a ideal schedule.
number state: New NPC state, see {{Enum|NPC}}

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/numpad/Activate Server Activates numpad key owned by the player
Player ply: The player whose numpad should be simulated
number key: The key to press, see {{Enum|KEY}}
boolean isButton: Should this keypress pretend to be a from a gmod_button? (causes {{LibraryFunction|numpad|FromButton}} to return true)

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/numpad/Deactivate Server Deactivates numpad key owned by the player
Player ply: The player whose numpad should be simulated
number key: The key to press, corresponding to {{Enum|KEY}}
boolean isButton: Should this keypress pretend to be a from a gmod_button? (causes {{LibraryFunction|numpad|FromButton}} to return true)
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/os/clock Shared Returns the approximate cpu time the application ran.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/os/date Shared Returns the the date formatted in a string or a table, in order to receive a table the string must contain *t, any formatting will cause *t to be ignored eg. getting formatted into the string, if the string starts with an ! the date will be using UCT time. See http://www.mkssoftware.com/docs/man3/strftime.3.asp for format flags.
string format: Identifier of the timer.
number time: Time to use for the format.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/os/difftime Shared Subtracts the second of the first value and rounds the result.
number timeA: The first value.
number timeB: The value to subtract.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/os/time Shared Returns the system time in seconds past the unix epoch. If a table is supplied, the function attempts to build a system time with the specified table members.
table dateData: Table to generate the time from. This table's data is interpreted as being in the local timezone. See {{Struct|DateData}}

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/package/seeall Shared Sets the __index member of the passed table to _G.
table table: The table to set its __index.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PANEL/ActionSignal Client Called whenever receives a signal from one of its childs.
string signalName: The name of the signal, usually the sender of the signal.
string signalValue: The value of the signal, usually a command.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/Add Client Adds the specified object to the panel.
Panel object: The panel to be added. ( Parented ) Can also be: string - creates panel with the specified name and adds it to the panel. PANEL table - creates a panel from table and adds it to the panel.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/AlignBottom Client Aligns the panel on the bottom of its parent with the specified offset.
number offset: The align offset.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/AlignLeft Client Aligns the panel on the left of its parent with the specified offset.
number offset: The align offset.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/AlignRight Client Aligns the panel on the right of its parent with the specified offset.
number offset: The align offset.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/AlignTop Client Aligns the panel on the top of its parent with the specified offset.
number offset: The align offset.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/AlphaTo Client Transitions the current alpha of a panel, to the new alpha over a set period of time after a specified delay.
number alpha: The alpha to approach
number duration: How long time it should take to reach the alpha
number delay: How long it should take before it starts to approach the alpha
function finished: The function that is called when it has reached the alpha

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PANEL/AnimationThink Client Called every frame if animation is enabled. Note, that if you want to disable this hook, you must call {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetAnimationEnabled}} after defining this function. Overriding this function will break some panel functions like {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetTerm}} or any other panel animation function.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/AnimTail Client Returns time when all panel animations will end.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PANEL/ApplySchemeSettings Client Called whenever the panel should apply its scheme(style).
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/Center Client Centers the panel on its parent.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/CenterHorizontal Client Centers the panel horizontally with specified fraction.
number fraction: The center fraction.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/CenterVertical Client Centers the panel vertically with specified fraction.
number fraction: The center fraction.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/ChildCount Client Returns the amount of children of the of panel.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/Clear Client Marks all of the panel's children for deletion.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/ColorTo Client Fades panels color to specified one. It won't work unless panel has SetColor function.
table color: The color to fade to
number length: Length of the animation
number delay: Delay before start fading
function callback: Function to execute when finished

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/ConVarNumberThink Client A think hook for [[Panel|panels]] using ConVars as a value. Call it in the Think hook. Sets the panel's value should the convar change. This function is best for: checkboxes, sliders, number wangs For a string alternative, see [[Panel/ConVarStringThink|Panel.ConVarStringThink]]. ''Important'': Make sure your Panel has a SetValue function, else you may get errors.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/ConVarStringThink Client A think hook for [[Panel|panels]] using ConVars as a value. Call it in the Think hook. Sets the panel's value should the convar change. This function is best for: text inputs, read-only inputs, dropdown selects For a string alternative, see [[Panel/ConVarNumberThink|Panel.ConVarNumberThink]]. ''Important'': Make sure your Panel has a SetValue function, else you may get errors.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/CopyBounds Client Copies position and size of the panel.
Panel base: The panel to copy size and position from.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/CopyHeight Client Copies the height of the panel.
Panel base: Panel to copy the height from.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/CopyPos Client Copies the position of the panel.
Panel base: Panel to position the width from.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/CopyWidth Client Copies the width of the panel.
Panel base: Panel to copy the width from.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/CursorPos Client Returns the cursor position relative to the panels origin.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/Dock Client Sets the dock type of the panel.
number dockType: Dock type using {{Enum|DOCK}}.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/DockMargin Client Sets the dock margin of the panel.
number marginLeft: The left margin to the parent.
number marginTop: The top margin to the parent.
number marginRight: The right margin to the parent.
number marginBottom: The bottom margin to the parent.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/DockPadding Client Sets the dock padding of the panel.
number paddingLeft: The left padding to the parent.
number paddingTop: The top padding to the parent.
number paddingRight: The right padding to the parent.
number paddingBottom: The bottom padding to the parent.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/DoModal Client Makes the panel "lock" the screen until it is removed.
boolean doModal: Sets whenever to lock or unlock.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/Droppable Client Makes this panel dropable. This is used with {{ClassFunction|Panel|Receiver}} to create drag and drop events.
string name: Name of your dropable panel

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/Find Client Finds a panel in its children(and sub children) with the given name.
string panelName: The name of the panel that should be found.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PANEL/FinishedURL Client Called by HTML panels when the page has finished loading. Currently broken.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/FocusNext Client Focuses the next panel in the focus queue.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/FocusPrevious Client Focuses the previous panel in the focus queue.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/GetAlpha Client Returns the alpha multiplier for this panel.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/GetBounds Client Returns position and size of the panel.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/GetChild Client Gets a child by its index.
number childIndex: The index of the child to get.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/GetChildren Client Returns a table with all the child panels of the panel.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/GetClassName Client Returns the class name of the panel.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/GetDock Client Returns a dock enum for the panel's current docking type.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/GetName Client Returns the internal name of the panel.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/GetParent Client Returns the parent of the panel, returns nil if there is no parent.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/GetPos Client Returns the position of the panel relative to its parent.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/GetSize Client Returns the size of the panel.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/GetTable Client Returns the internal Lua table of the panel.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/GetTall Client Returns the height of the panel.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/GetValue Client Returns the value the panel holds.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/GetWide Client Returns the width of the panel.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/HasChildren Client Returns whenever the panel has child panels.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/HasFocus Client Returns if the panel is focused.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/HasHierarchicalFocus Client Returns if the panel or any of its children(sub children and so on) has the focus.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/HasParent Client Returns if the panel has a parent.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/Hide Client Makes a panel invisible.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PANEL/Init Client Called when the panel is created.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/InvalidateLayout Client Causes the panel to re-layout in the next frame.
boolean layoutNow: If true the panel will re-layout instantly and not wait for the next frame.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/IsHovered Client Returns true if the mouse cursor is over this panel.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/IsKeyboardInputEnabled Client Returns true if the panel can receive keyboard input.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/IsMarkedForDeletion Client Returns if the panel is going to be deleted in the next frame.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/IsMouseInputEnabled Client Returns true if the panel can receive mouse input.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/IsValid Client Returns if the panel is valid and not marked for deletion.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/IsVisible Client Returns if the panel is visible.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/KillFocus Client Remove the focus from the panel.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/LocalToScreen Client Gets the absolute screen position of the position specified relative to the panel.
number posX: The x coordinate of the position to translate.
number posY: The y coordinate of the position to translate.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/MakePopup Client Focuses the panel and enables it to receive input.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/MouseCapture Client Allows the panel to receive mouse input even if the mouse cursor is outside the bounds of the panel.
boolean doCapture: Set to true to enable, set to false to disable.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/MoveAbove Client Places the panel above the passed panel with the specified offset.
Panel panel: Panel to position relatively to.
number offset: The align offset.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/MoveBelow Client Places the panel below the passed panel with the specified offset.
Panel panel: Panel to position relatively to.
number offset: The align offset.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/MoveLeftOf Client Places the panel left to the passed panel with the specified offset.
Panel panel: Panel to position relatively to.
number offset: The align offset.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/MoveRightOf Client Places the panel right to the passed panel with the specified offset.
Panel panel: Panel to position relatively to.
number offset: The align offset.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/MoveTo Client Moves the panel to the specified position.
number posX: The target x coordinate of the panel.
number posY: The target y coordinate of the panel.
number time: The to perform the animation in.
number delay: The delay before the animation starts.
number ease: Easing of the start and end speed of the animation.
function callback: Function to be called on animation finish, first parameter is the panel, second is the animation.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/NewAnimation Client Creates a new animation for the panel
number length: Length of animation in seconds
number delay: Delay between function call and animation start
number ease: Unknown
function callback: Function to be called when the animation ends

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/NoClipping Client Sets whenever all child drawings should be clipped within the panels bounds.
boolean clip: Whenever to clip or not.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PANEL/OnChildAdded Client Called whenever a child was parented to the panel.
Panel child: The child which was added.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PANEL/OnChildRemoved Client Called whenever a child of the panel is about to removed.
Panel child: The child which is about to be removed.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PANEL/OnCursorEntered Client Called whenever the cursor entered the panels bounds.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PANEL/OnCursorExited Client Called whenever the cursor left the panels bounds.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PANEL/OnCursorMoved Client Called whenever the cursor was moved with the panels bounds.
number cursorX: The new x position of the cursor relative to the panels origin.
number cursorY: The new y position of the cursor relative to the panels origin.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PANEL/OnDeletion Client Called when the panel is about to be removed.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PANEL/OnFocusChanged Client Called whenever the panel gained or lost focus.
boolean gained: Is the focus was gained ( true ) or lost ( false )

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PANEL/OnKeyCodePressed Client Called whenever a keyboard key was pressed while the panel is focused.
number keyCode: They key code of the key pressed, see {{Enum|KEY}}.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PANEL/OnMousePressed Client Called whenever a mouse key was pressed while the panel is focused.
number keyCode: They key code of the key pressed, see {{Enum|MOUSE}}.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PANEL/OnMouseReleased Client Called whenever a mouse key was released while the panel is focused.
number keyCode: They key code of the key released, see {{Enum|MOUSE}}.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PANEL/OnMouseWheeled Client Called whenever the mouse wheel was used.
number scrollDeta: The scroll delta, indicating how much the user turned the mouse wheel.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PANEL/OpeningURL Client Called by HTML panels when the page has started to load. Currently broken.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PANEL/PageTitleChanged Client Called by HTML panels when the title of the page has changed. Currently broken.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PANEL/Paint Client Called whenever the panel should be drawn, return true to override the default drawing.
number width: The panels current width.
number height: The panels current height.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/PaintAt Client Paints a ghost copy of the panel at the given position with the given size.
number posX: The x coordinate to draw the panel from.
number posY: The y coordinate to draw the panel from.
number width: The width of the panel image to be drawn.
number height: The height of the panel image to be drawn.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/PaintManual Client Paints the panel at its current position.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PANEL/PaintOver Client Called whenever the panel and all its children were drawn, return true to override the default drawing.
number width: The panels current width.
number height: The panels current height.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/ParentToHUD Client Parents the panel to the HUD.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PANEL/PerformLayout Client Called whenever the panels layout was invalidated, all children are moved to 0,0 by default and need to re positioned.
number width: The panels current width.
number height: The panels current height.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/PostMessage Client Sends a command to the panel.
string messageName: The name of the message.
string valueType: The type of the variable to post.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/Queue Client Enables queue for panel animations. If enabled, all newly animations will start as soon as all current animations are ended.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/Receiver Client Allows the panel to receive drag and drop events.
string name: Name of DnD panels to receive. This is set by {{ClassFunction|Panel|Droppable}}
function func: This function is called whenever a panel with valid name is hovering above and dropped on this panel. It has next arguments: * [[:Category:Panel|Panel]] Panel - The receiver panel * [[:Category:table|table]] table - A table of panels dropped onto receiver panel * [[:Category:boolean|boolean]] dropped - False if hovering over, true if dropped onto * [[:Category:number|number]] menuIndex - Index of clicked menu item from third argument of {{ClassFunction|Panel|Receiver}} * [[:Category:number|number]] x - Cursor pos, relative to the receiver * [[:Category:number|number]] y - Cursor pos, relative to the receiver
table menu: A table of strings that will act as a menu if drag'n'drop was performed with a right click
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/Remove Client Marks a panel for deletion so it will be deleted the next frame.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/ScreenToLocal Client Translates global screen coordinate to coordinates relative to the panel.
number screenX: The x coordinate of the screen position to be translated.
number screenY: The y coordinate of the screed position be to translated.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/SetAllowNonAsciiCharacters Client Configures a text input to allow user to type characters that are not included in the US-ASCII (7-bit ASCII) character set. Characters not included in US-ASCII are multi-byte characters in UTF-8. They can be accented characters, non-Latin characters and special characters.
boolean allowed: Set to true in order not to restrict input characters.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/SetAlpha Client Sets the alpha multiplier for the panel
number alpha: The alpha value in the range of 0-255.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/SetAnimationEnabled Client Enables or disables the ability animate panels.
boolean enable: To enable or to disable

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/SetAutoDelete Client Sets whenever the panel should be removed if the parent was removed.
boolean autoDelete: Whenever to delete if the parent was removed or not.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/SetBGColor Client Sets the background color of the panel.
number r or color: The red channel of the color, or {{GlobalFunction|Color}}.
number g: The green channel of the color.
number b: The blue channel of the color.
number a: The alpha channel of the color.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/SetBGColorEx Client Sets the background color of the panel.
number r: The red channel of the color.
number g: The green channel of the color.
number b: The blue channel of the color.
number a: The alpha channel of the color.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/SetCaretPos Client Sets the position of the caret in a Text Entry control
number offset: Caret position/offset

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/SetContentAlignment Client Alignment of the contents
number Alignment: The direction is based of the number pad, 5 is middle, 7 is top left, 6 is right middle etc.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/SetConVar Client Sets this panel's convar. When the convar changes this panel will update automatically. For developer implementation, see [[Global/Derma_Install_Convar_Functions|Derma_Install_Convar_Functions]].
string convar: The console variable to check.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/SetCursor Client Sets the appearance of the cursor.
string cursor: The cursor to be set. Can be one of the following: * user * none * arrow * beam * hourglass * waitarrow * crosshair * up * sizenwse * sizenesw * sizewe * sizens * sizeall * no * hand * blank * last

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/SetExpensiveShadow Client Adds a shadow falling to the bottom left corner of the panel.
number distance: The distance of the shadow from the panel.
Color Color: The color of the shadow

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/SetFGColor Client Sets the foreground color of the panel.
number r: The red channel of the color, or {{GlobalFunction|Color}}.
number g: The green channel of the color.
number b: The blue channel of the color.
number a: The alpha channel of the color.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/SetFGColorEx Client Sets the foreground color of the panel.
number r: The red channel channel.
number g: The green channel of the color.
number b: The blue channel of the color.
number a: The alpha channel of the color.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/SetHeight Client Sets the height of the panel.
number height: The height to be set.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/SetHTML Client Allows you to set HTML code within a panel.
string HTML code: The code to set.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/SetKeyBoardInputEnabled Client Enables or disables the keyboard input for the panel.
boolean keyboardInput: Whether to enable or disable keyboard input.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/SetMouseInputEnabled Client Enables or disables the mouse input for the panel.
boolean mouseInput: Whenever to enable or disable mouse input.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/SetName Client Sets the internal name of the panel.
string name: The new name of the panel.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/SetPaintBackgroundEnabled Client Sets whenever all the default background of the panel should be drawn or ot.
boolean paintBackground: Whenever to draw the background or not.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/SetPaintBorderEnabled Client Sets whenever all the default border of the panel should be drawn or ot.
boolean paintBorder: Whenever to draw the border or not.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/SetPaintedManually Client Sets if the panel was painted manually.
boolean paintedManually: Whenever the panel was painted manually or not.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/SetParent Client Sets the parent of the panel.
Panel parent: The new parent of the panel.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/SetPos Client Sets the position of the panel.
number posX: The x coordinate of the position.
number posY: The y coordinate of the position.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/SetRenderInScreenshots Client Sets whenever the panel should be rendered in the next screenshot.
boolean renderInScreenshot: Whenever to render or not.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/SetSize Client Sets the size of the panel.
number width: The width of the panel.
number height: The height of the panel.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/SetTall Client Sets height of a panel. An alias of {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetHeight}}.
number height: Desired height to set

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/SetTerm Client Removes the panel after given time. Note that this function will not work if [[PANEL/AnimationThink|PANEL/AnimationThink]] is defined for the panel. Disabling the animation using {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetAnimationEnabled}} will fix that.
number delay: Delay after which the panel should be removed.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/SetVisible Client Sets the "visibility" of the panel.
boolean visible: The visibility of the panel.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/SetWide Client Sets width of a panel. An alias of {{ClassFunction|Panel|SetWidth}}.
number width: Desired width to set

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/SetWidth Client Sets the width of the panel.
number width: The width of the panel.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/SetZPos Client Sets the panels z position which determines the rendering order.
number zIndex: The z position of the panel.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/Show Client Makes a panel visible.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/SizeTo Client Sizes the panel to the specified size.
number sizeW: The target width of the panel.
number sizeH: The target height of the panel.
number time: The to perform the animation in.
number delay: The delay before the animation starts.
number ease: Easing of the start and end speed of the animation.
function callback: Function to be called on animation finish, first parameter is the panel, second is the animation.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/SizeToChildren Client Resizes the panel to fit the bounds of its children.
boolean sizeW: Resize with width of the panel.
boolean sizeH: Resize the height of the panel.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/SizeToContents Client Resizes the panel so that it's width and height fit all of the child controls inside.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/SlideDown Client Slides the panel in from above.
number Length: Time to complete the animation.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/SlideUp Client Slides the panel out to the top.
number Length: Time to complete the animation.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PANEL/StatusChanged Client Called by HTML panels when the current status has changed. Currently broken.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/Stop Client Stops all panel animations

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/StretchToParent Client Sets the dimensions of the panel to fill its parent. It will only stretch in directions that aren't nil.
number offsetLeft: The left offset to the parent.
number offsetTop: The top offset to the parent.
number offsetRight: The right offset to the parent.
number offsetBottom: The bottom offset to the parent.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PANEL/Think Client Called whenever the panel should think.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Panel/Valid Client Returns if a given panel is valid or not.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/physenv/AddSurfaceData Shared Loads the given surface properties as a string, follows the file format.
string properties: The properties to add.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/physenv/GetAirDensity Shared Returns the air density.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/physenv/GetGravity Shared Gets the global gravity.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/physenv/GetPerformanceSettings Shared Gets the current performance settings in table form.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/physenv/SetAirDensity Shared Sets the air density.
number airDensity: The new air density.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/physenv/SetGravity Shared Sets the directional gravity, does not work on players.
Vector gravity: The new gravity.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/physenv/SetPerformanceSettings Shared Sets the performance settings.
table performanceSettings: The new performance settings. See {{Struct|PhysEnvPerformanceSettings}}

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PhysObj/AddAngleVelocity Shared Adds the specified velocity to the current.
Vector angularVelocity: Additional velocity.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PhysObj/AddGameFlag Shared Adds one or more bit bit flags.
number flags: Bitflag, see {{Enum|FVPHYSICS}}.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PhysObj/AddVelocity Shared Adds the specified velocity to the current.
Vector velocity: Additional velocity.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PhysObj/AlignAngles Shared Rotates the object so that it's angles are aligned to the ones inputed.
Angle from: Unknown.
Angle to: Unknown.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PhysObj/ApplyForceCenter Shared Applies the specified force to the physics object.
Vector force: The force to be applied.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PhysObj/ApplyForceOffset Shared Applies the specified force with an offset where the force is applied from.
Vector force: The force to be applied.
Vector offset: The offset of the force.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PhysObj/ClearGameFlag Shared Removes one of more specified flags.
number flags: Bitflag, see {{Enum|FVPHYSICS}}.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PhysObj/EnableCollisions Shared Sets whenever the physics object should not collide with anything.
boolean enable: True to enable, false to disable.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PhysObj/EnableDrag Shared Sets whenever the physics object should be affected by drag.
boolean enable: True to enable, false to disable.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PhysObj/EnableGravity Shared Sets whenever the physobject should be affected by gravity
boolean enable: True to enable, false to disable.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PhysObj/EnableMotion Shared Sets whenever the physobject should be able to move or not. By calling PhysObj:EnableMotion(false), the physobject will no longer be able to move. However, when the physobject is clicked by physics gun, the object will be able to move again.
boolean enable: True to enable, false to disable.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PhysObj/GetAABB Shared Returns the mins and max of the physics object.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PhysObj/GetAngles Shared Returns the angles of the physobject.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PhysObj/GetAngleVelocity Shared Gets the angular velocity of the object.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PhysObj/GetDamping Shared Returns the linear and angular damping of the physics object.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PhysObj/GetEnergy Shared Returns the kinetic energy of the physobject.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PhysObj/GetEntity Shared Returns the parent entity of the physics object.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PhysObj/GetInertia Shared Returns the directional inertia of the physics object.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PhysObj/GetInvInertia Shared Returns the inverted inertia.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PhysObj/GetInvMass Shared Returns 1 divided by the entities mass.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PhysObj/GetMass Shared Returns the mass of the physics object.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PhysObj/GetMassCenter Shared Returns the mass center of the physobject.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PhysObj/GetMaterial Shared Returns the physical material of the physobject.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PhysObj/GetMesh Shared Returns a table of {{Type| MeshVertex}}es where each 3 vertexes represent a triangle.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PhysObj/GetPos Shared Returns the position of the physobject.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PhysObj/GetRotDamping Shared Returns the rotation damping of the physics object.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PhysObj/GetSpeedDamping Shared Returns the speed damping of the physics object.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PhysObj/GetStress Server Returns the stress of the entity.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PhysObj/GetSurfaceArea Shared Returns the surface area of the physics object in source-units.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PhysObj/GetVelocity Shared Returns the absolute directional velocity of the physobject.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PhysObj/GetVolume Shared Returns the volume in source units.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PhysObj/HasGameFlag Shared Returns whenever the specified flag(s) is/are set.
number flags: Bitflag, see {{Enum|FVPHYSICS}}.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PhysObj/IsAsleep Shared Returns whenever the physics object is sleeping eg. not active.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PhysObj/IsCollisionEnabled Shared Returns whenever the entity is able to collide or not.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PhysObj/IsDragEnabled Shared Returns whenever the entity is affected by drag.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PhysObj/IsGravityEnabled Shared Returns whenever the entity is affected by gravity.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PhysObj/IsMotionEnabled Shared Returns if the physics object can move itself (by velocity, acceleration)
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PhysObj/IsMoveable Shared Returns whenever the entity is able to move.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PhysObj/IsPenetrating Shared Returns whenever the entity is penetrating another physics object.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PhysObj/IsValid Shared Returns if the physics object is valid/not NULL.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PhysObj/LocalToWorld Shared Mapping a vector in local frame of the physics object to world frame. Note: this function does translation and rotation, with translation done first.
Vector LocalVec: A vector in the physics object's local frame
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PhysObj/OutputDebugInfo Shared Prints debug info about the state of the physics object.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PhysObj/SetAngles Shared Sets the angles of the physobject.
Angle angles: The new angles of the physobject.

number buoyancy: Buoyancy from 0 to 1.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PhysObj/SetDamping Shared Sets the linear and angular damping of the physics object.
number linearDamping: Linear damping.
number angularDamping: Angular damping.

A value of Vector(0,0,0) makes the physobject go invalid.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PhysObj/SetMass Shared Sets the mass of the physobject.
number mass: The the mass of the physobject.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PhysObj/SetMaterial Shared Sets the material of the physobject.
string materialName: The name of the phys material to use.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PhysObj/SetPos Shared Sets the position of the physobject.
Vector position: The new position of the physobject.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PhysObj/SetVelocity Shared Sets the velocity of the physics object for the next iteration.
Vector velocity: The new velocity of the phyiscs object.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PhysObj/SetVelocityInstantaneous Shared Sets the velocity of the physics object.
Vector velocity: The new velocity of the phyiscs object.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PhysObj/Wake Shared Wakes the physics object.

Vector LocalVec: A vector in the physics object's local frame

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Player/AddPlayerOption Client Sets up the voting system for the player. This is a really barebone system. By calling this a vote gets started, when the player presses 0-9 the callback function gets called along with the key the player pressed. Use the draw callback to draw the vote panel.
string name: Name of the vote
number timeout: Time until the vote expires
function vote callback: The function to be run when the player presses 0-9 while a vote is active.
function draw callback: Used to draw the vote panel.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Player/AllowFlashlight Shared Sets if the player can toggle his flashlight. Function exists on both the server and client but has no effect when ran on the client.

boolean loop: If the animation should not loop. true = stops the animation, false = the animation keeps playing

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Player/SetJumpPower Shared Sets the jump power, eg. the velocity the player will applied to when he jumps.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Player/SetMaxSpeed Shared Sets the maximum speed which the player can move at.
number walkSpeed: The maximum speed.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Player/SetMuted Client Sets if the player should be muted locally.
boolean mute: Mute or unmute.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Player/SetNoCollideWithTeammates Server Sets whenever the player should not collide with their teammates.
boolean shouldNotCollide: True to disable, false to enable collission.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Player/SetNoTarget Server Sets the players visibility towards NPCs.
boolean visibility: The visibility.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Player/SetObserverMode Shared Sets the players observer mode.
number observeMode: Observe mode using {{Enum|OBS_MODE}}.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Player/SetPData Server Sets a player's PData from the server's database
any key: name of the PData key
any value: value to write to the key

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Player/SetPlayerColor Shared Sets the player model's color. The part of the model that is colored is determined by the model itself, and is different for each model.
Vector Color: This is the color to be set. The format is Vector(r,g,b), and each color should be between 0 and 1.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Player/SetRunSpeed Shared Sets the run speed eg. the speed when sprinting.
number runSpeed: The new run speed.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Player/SetStepSize Shared Sets the maximum height a player can step up.
number stepHeight: Maximum height the player can step

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Player/SetSuppressPickupNotices Shared Sets whenever to suppress the pickup notification for the player.
boolean doSuppress: Whenever to suppress the notice or not.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Player/SetTeam Server Sets the player to the chosen team.
number Team: The team that the player is being set to.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PLAYER/SetupDataTables Shared Set up the network table accessors

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Player/SetUserGroup Server Sets the usergroup of the player.
string groupName: The user group of the player.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Player/SetViewEntity Server Attaches the players view to the position and angles of the specified entity.
Entity viewEntity: The entity to attach the player view to.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Player/SetViewOffset Shared Sets the view offset which equals the difference between the players actual position and their view.
Vector viewOffset: The new view offset.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Player/SetViewOffsetDucked Shared Sets the view offset of the player which equals the difference between the players actual position and their view when ducked.
Vector viewOffset: The new view offset.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Player/SetWalkSpeed Shared Sets the walk speed eg. the speed when normally walking.
number walkSpeed: The new walk speed.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Player/SetWeaponColor Shared Sets the player weapon's color. The part of the model that is colored is determined by the model itself, and is different for each model.
Vector Color: This is the color to be set. The format is Vector(r,g,b), and each color should be between 0 and 1.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Player/ShouldDrawLocalPlayer Server Polls the engine to request if the player should be drawn at the time the function is called.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Player/ShouldDropWeapon Server Sets whenever the players weapon should drop on death.
boolean walkSpeed: Whenever to drop the weapon or not.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Player/ShowProfile Client Opens the player steam profile page in the steam overlay browser.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PLAYER/Spawn Server Called when the player spawns

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Player/Spectate Server Sets the spectate mode of the player.
number spectateMode: Spectate mode, see {{Enum|OBS_MODE}}.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Player/SpectateEntity Server Makes the player spectate the entity
Entity entity: Entity to spectate.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Player/SprayDecal Server Makes a player spray their decal.
Vector sprayOrigin: The location to spray from
Vector sprayNormal: The direction to spray in
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Player/SprintDisable Server Disables the sprint on the player
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Player/SprintEnable Server Enables the sprint on the player
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Player/SteamID Shared Returns the player SteamID.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Player/SteamID64 Shared Returns the players 64bit SteamID.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Player/StopZooming Server Turns off the zoom mode of the player.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Player/StripAmmo Server Removes all ammo from the player.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Player/StripWeapon Server Removes the specified weapon class from a certain player
string weapon: The weapon to remove.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Player/StripWeapons Server Removes all weapons from a certain player

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Player/SuppressHint Server Prevents a hint from showing up.
NOTE: This function is only available in Sandbox and its derivatives. string name: Hint name/class/index to prevent from showing up

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Player/SwitchToDefaultWeapon Server Attempts to switch the player weapon to the one specified in the "cl_defaultweapon" convar, if the player does not own the specified weapon nothing will happen.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Player/Team Shared Returns the player's team ID
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Player/TimeConnected Server Returns the time in second since the player connected.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Player/TraceHullAttack Server Performs a trace hull and applies damage to the entities hit, returns the first entity hit.
Vector startPos: The start position of the hull trace.
Vector endPos: The end position of the hull trace.
Vector mins: The minimum coordinates of the hull.
Vector maxs: The maximum coordinates of the hull.
number damage: The damage to be applied.
Vector damageFlags: Bitflag specifying the damage type, see {{Enum|DMG}}.
number damageForce: The force to be applied to the hit object.
boolean damageAllNPCs: Whether to apply damage to all hit NPCs or not.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Player/UniqueID Shared Returns the player's UniqueID
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Player/UniqueIDTable Shared Returns a table that will stay allocated for the specific player between connects until the server shuts down.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Player/UnLock Server Unlocks the player movement if locked previously.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Player/UnSpectate Server Stops the player from spectating another entity.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Player/UserID Shared Returns the player's ID

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/PLAYER/ViewModelChanged Client Called when the player changes their weapon to another one causing their viewmodel model to change
Entity viewmodel: The viewmodel that is changing
string old: The old model
string new: The new model

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Player/ViewPunch Shared Simulates a push on the client's screen.
Angle PunchAngle: The angle in which to push the player's screen.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Player/ViewPunchReset Shared Resets the player's view punch ( {{ClassFunction|Player|ViewPunch}} ) effect back to normal.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Player/VoiceVolume Client Returns the players voice volume as a normal number.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/player_manager/AddValidModel Shared Associates a simplified name with a path to a valid player model.
Only used internally. string name: Simplified name string model: Valid PlayerModel path
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/player_manager/AllValidModels Shared Returns the entire list of valid player models.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/player_manager/ClearPlayerClass Shared Clears a player's class association by setting their ClassID to 0
Player ply: Player to clear class from

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/player_manager/GetPlayerClass Shared Gets a players class
Player ply: Player to get class

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/player_manager/OnPlayerSpawn Shared Applies basic class variables when the player spawns.
Called from {{HookFunction|GM|PlayerSpawn}} in the base gamemode. Player ply: Player to setup

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/player_manager/RegisterClass Shared Register a class metatable to be assigned to players later
string name: Class name
table table: Class metatable
string base: Base class name

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/player_manager/SetPlayerClass Shared Sets a player's class
Player ply: Player to set class
string classname: Name of class to set

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/player_manager/TranslatePlayerModel Shared Returns the valid model path for a simplified name.
string shortName: The short name of the model

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/presets/Add Client Adds preset to a preset group.
string groupname: The preset group name, usually it's tool class name.
string name: Preset name, must be unique.
table values: A table of preset console commands.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/presets/GetTable Client Returns a table with preset names and values from a single preset group.
string groupname: Preset group name.

string groupname: Preset group to remove from

string groupname: Preset group name
string oldname: Old preset name
string newname: New preset name

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/properties/Add Shared Add properties to the properties module
string name: A unique name used to identify the property
table propertyData: A table that defines the property
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/properties/HaloThink Client Draws halo around hovered entity.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/properties/OnScreenClick Shared Checks if player hovers over any entities and open a properties menu for it.
Vector eyepos: The eye pos of a player

Entity ent: The entity to open menu for
table tr: The trace that is passed as second argument to Action callback of a property

number r: Red component to clear to.
number g: Green component to clear to.
number b: Blue component to clear to.
number a: Alpha component to clear to.
boolean clearDepth: Clear the depth.
boolean clearStencil: Clear the stencil.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/render/ClearBuffersObeyStencil Client Clears the current rendertarget for obeying the current stencil buffer conditions.
number r: Value of the red channel to clear the current rt with.
number g: Value of the green channel to clear the current rt with.
number b: Value of the blue channel to clear the current rt with.
number a: Value of the alpha channel to clear the current rt with.
boolean depth: Clear the depth buffer.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/render/ClearDepth Client Resets the depth buffer.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/render/ClearStencil Client Resets all values in the stencil buffer to zero.

number originX: X origin of the rectangle.
number originY: Y origin of the rectangle.
number endX: The end X coordinate of the rectangle.
number endY: The end Y coordinate of the rectangle.
number stencilValue: Value to set cleared stencil buffer to.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/render/ComputeDynamicLighting Client Calculates the lighting caused by dynamic lights for the specified surface.

Vector normal: The normal of the surface.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/render/ComputeLighting Client Calculates the light color of a certain surface.
Vector position: The position of the surface to get the light from.

number size: The size of the sphere.

number segments: The number of segments
table [color]: The color of the box.
boolean [writeZ]: End position of the box.

number maxDensity: The maximum density of the fog.

number fogMode: Fog mode, see {{Enum|MATERIAL_FOG}}.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/render/FogStart Client Sets the distance at which the fog starts showing up.
number fogStart: The distance at which the fog starts showing up.

table settings: This wan

number y: Y position for the HUD draw origin.

number h: Height of the HUD draw.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/resource/AddFile Server Adds the specified and all related files to the files the client should download. For convenience, this function will automatically add any other files that are related to the selected one, and throw an error if it can't find them. For example, a .vmt file will automatically add the .vtf with the same name, and a .mdl file will automatically add all .vvd, .ani, .dx80.vtx, .dx90.vtx, .sw.vtx, .phy and .jpg files with the same name, with a separate error for each missing file. If you do not want it to do this, use [[resource/AddSingleFile|resource.AddSingleFile]].
string path: Path of the file to be added, relative to garrysmod/

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/resource/AddSingleFile Shared Adds the specified file to the files the client should download.
string path: Path of the file to be added, relative to garrysmod/

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/resource/AddWorkshop Server Adds a workshop addon for the client to download before entering the server. You should try to only add addons that the server is currently using. For example - don't make the client download 20 maps - just make them download the current map. Gamemodes that are workshop enabled are automatically added to this list - so there's no need to add them.
string workshopid: The workshop id of the file. This cannot be a collection right now.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/SANDBOX/AddGamemodeToolMenuCategories Client {{Internal}} This hook is used to add default categories to spawnmenu tool tabs. Do not override or hook this function, use {{HookFunction|SANDBOX|AddToolMenuCategories}}!

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/SANDBOX/AddGamemodeToolMenuTabs Client {{Internal}} This hook is used to add default tool tabs to spawnmenu. Do not override or hook this function, use {{HookFunction|SANDBOX|AddToolMenuTabs}}!
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/SANDBOX/AddToolMenuCategories Client This hook is used to add new categories to spawnmenu tool tabs.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/SANDBOX/AddToolMenuTabs Client This hook is used to add new tool tabs to spawnmenu.
