Player ply: The player who attempted to use Prop Drive.
Entity ent: The entity the player is attempting to drive

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/SANDBOX/CanProperty Shared Controls if a property can be used or not.
Player ply: Player, that tried to use the property
string property: Class of the propery that is tried to use, for example - bonemanipulate
Entity ent: The entity, on which property is tried to be used on

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/SANDBOX/CanTool Shared Called when a player attempts to fire their tool gun. Return true to specifically allow the attempt, false to block it.
Player ply: The player who attempted to use their toolgun.
table tr: A trace from the players eye to where in the world their crosshair/cursor is pointing. See {{Struct|TraceResult}}
string tool: The tool mode the player currently has selected.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/SANDBOX/ContentSidebarSelection Client Called when player selects an item on the spawnmenu sidebar at the left.
Panel parent: The panel that holds spawnicons and the sidebar of spawnmenu
Panel node: The item player selected
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/SANDBOX/PersistenceLoad Server Called when persistent props are loaded.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/SANDBOX/PersistenceSave Server Called when persistent props are saved.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/SANDBOX/PlayerGiveSWEP Server Called when a player attempts to give themselves a weapon from the Q menu. ( Left mouse clicks on an icon )
Player ply: The player who attempted to give themselves a weapon.
string weapon: Class name of the weapon the player tried to give themselves.
table swep: The swep table of this weapon, see {{Struct|SWEP}}

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/SANDBOX/PlayerSpawnedEffect Server Called after the player spawned an effect.
Player ply: The player that spawned the effect
string model: The model of spawned effect
Entity ent: The spawned effect itself

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/SANDBOX/PlayerSpawnedNPC Server Called after the player spawned an NPC.
Player ply: The player that spawned the NPC
Entity ent: The spawned NPC itself

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/SANDBOX/PlayerSpawnedProp Server Called when a player has successfully spawned a prop from the Q menu.
Player ply: The player who spawned a prop.
string model: Path to the model of the prop the player is attempting to spawn.
Entity entity: The entity that was spawned.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/SANDBOX/PlayerSpawnedRagdoll Server Called after the player spawned a ragdoll.
Player ply: The player that spawned the ragdoll
string model: The ragdoll model that player wants to spawn
Entity ent: The spawned ragdoll itself

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/SANDBOX/PlayerSpawnedSENT Server Called after the player has spawned a scripted entity.
Player ply: The player that spawned the SENT
Entity ent: The spawned SENT

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/SANDBOX/PlayerSpawnedSWEP Server Called after the player has spawned a scripted weapon.
Player ply: The player that spawned the SWEP
Entity ent: The SWEP itself

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/SANDBOX/PlayerSpawnedVehicle Server Called after the player spawned a vehicle.
Player ply: The player that spawned the vehicle
Entity ent: The vehicle itself

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/SANDBOX/PlayerSpawnEffect Server Called to ask if player allowed to spawn a particular effect or not.
Player ply: The player that wants to spawn an effect
string model: The effect model that player wants to spawn

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/SANDBOX/PlayerSpawnNPC Server Called to ask if player allowed to spawn a particular NPC or not.
Player ply: The player that wants to spawn that NPC
string npc_type: The npc type that player is trying to spawn
string weapon: The weapon of that NPC

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/SANDBOX/PlayerSpawnObject Server Called to ask whether player is allowed to spawn any objects.
Player ply: The player in question
string model: Modelname
number skin: Skin number

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/SANDBOX/PlayerSpawnProp Server Called when a player attempts to spawn a prop from the Q menu.
Player ply: The player who attempted to spawn a prop.
string model: Path to the model of the prop the player is attempting to spawn.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/SANDBOX/PlayerSpawnRagdoll Server Called when a player attempts to spawn a ragdoll from the Q menu.
Player ply: The player who attempted to spawn a ragdoll.
string model: Path to the model of the ragdoll the player is attempting to spawn.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/SANDBOX/PlayerSpawnSENT Server Called when a player attempts to spawn an Entity from the Q menu.
Player ply: The player who attempted to spawn the entity.
string class: Class name of the entity the player tried to spawn.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/SANDBOX/PlayerSpawnSWEP Server Called when a player attempts to spawn a weapon from the Q menu. ( Mouse wheel clicks on an icon )
Player ply: The player who attempted to spawn a weapon.
string weapon: Class name of the weapon the player tried to spawn.
number info: Information about the weapon the player is trying to spawn.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/SANDBOX/PlayerSpawnVehicle Server Called to ask if player allowed to spawn a particular vehicle or not.
Player ply: The player that wants to spawn that vehicle
string model: The vehicle model that player wants to spawn
string name: Vehicle name
table table: Table of that vehicle, containing info about it
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/SANDBOX/PopulatePropMenu Client This function makes the engine load the spawn menu text files. You can use this hook to add categories to your tabs.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/SANDBOX/SpawnMenuEnabled Client If false is returned then the spawn menu is never created. This saves load times if your mod doesn't actually use the spawn menu for any reason.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/SANDBOX/SpawnMenuOpen Client Called when spawnmenu is trying to be opened.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/scripted ents/GetMember Shared Retrieves a member of entity's table.
string class: Entity's class name
string name: Name of member to retrieve

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/scripted_ents/Alias Shared Defines an alias string that can be used to refer to another classname
string alias: A new string which can be used to refer to another classname
string classname: The classname the alias should refer to

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/scripted_ents/Get Shared Returns a copy of the ENT table for a class, including functions defined by the base class
string classname: The classname of the ENT table to return, can be an alias
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/scripted_ents/GetList Shared Returns a copy of the list of all ENT tables registered
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/scripted_ents/GetSpawnable Shared Returns a list of all ENT tables which contain either ENT.Spawnable or ENT.AdminSpawnable

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/scripted_ents/GetStored Shared Returns the actual ENT table for a class. Modifying functions/variables in this table will change newly spawned entities
string classname: The classname of the ENT table to return

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/scripted_ents/GetType Shared Returns the 'type' of a class, this will one of the following: 'anim', 'ai', 'brush', 'point'.
string classname: The classname to check
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/scripted_ents/OnLoaded Shared Runs {{LibraryFunction|baseclass|Set}} on every ENT in {{LibraryFunction|scripted_ents|GetList}}.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/scripted_ents/Register Shared Registers an ENT table with a classname. Reregistering an existing classname will automatically update the functions of all existing entities of that class.
table ENT: The ENT table to register
string classname: The classname to register

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/search/AddProvider Client Adds a search result provider. For examples, see gamemodes/sandbox/gamemode/cl_search_models.lua
function provider: Provider function. It has one argument: [[:Category:string|string]] searchQuery You must return a list of tables structured like this: * [[:Category:string|string]] text - Text to "Copy to clipboard" * [[:Category:string|function]] func - Function to use/spawn the item * [[:Category:string|Panel]] icon - A panel to add to spawnmenu * [[:Category:string|table]] words - A table of words?

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/search/GetResults Client Retrieves search results.
string query: Search query

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/sound/Add Shared Creates a sound script. It can also override sounds, which seems to only work when set on the server.
table soundData: The sounds properties. See {{Struct|SoundData}}

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/sound/AddSoundOverrides Shared Overrides sounds defined inside of a txt file; typically used for adding map-specific sounds.
string filepath: Path to the script file to load.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/sound/Play Shared Plays a sound from the specified position in the world.
string Name: A string path to the sound.
Vector Pos: A vector describing where the sound should play.
number Level: Sound level in decibels. 75 is normal. Ranges from 20 to 180, where 180 is super loud. This affects how far away the sound will be heard.
number Pitch: An integer describing the sound pitch. Range is from 0 to 255. 100 is normal pitch.
number Volume: A float ranging from 0-1 describing the output volume of the sound.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/sound/PlayURL Client Allows you to play external sound files, as well as online radio streams.
string url: The URL of the sound to play
string options: Options for the sound. Can be one or more of following, separated by a space (" "): * 3d - Makes the sound 3D, so you can set its position * mono - Forces the sound to have only one channel * loop - Plays the sound as soon as it ends * noplay - Forces the sound not to play as soon as this function is called
function callback: Callback function that is called as soon as the function is called. It has one argument, [[:Category:IGModAudioChannel|soundchannel]].

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/spawnmenu/AddCreationTab Client Inserts a new tab into the CreationMenus table, which will be used by the creation menu to generate its tabs (Spawnlists, Weapons, Entities, etc.)
string strName: What text will appear on the tab (I.E Spawnlists).
function pFunction: The function called to generate the content of the tab.
string pMaterial: Path to the material that will be used as an icon on the tab.
number iOrder: The order in which this tab should be shown relative to the other tabs on the creation menu.
string strTooltip: The tooltip to be shown for this tab.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/spawnmenu/AddToolMenuOption Client Adds an option to the right side of the spawnmenu
string tab: The tab to add into
string category: The category to add into
string class: Name of item to add, must be unique
string name: The nice name of item
string cmd: Command to execute when the item is selected
string config: Config name ( Unknown purpose )
function cpanel: A function to build the C panel

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/spawnmenu/AddToolTab Client Used to create a new Utility tab inside of the spawnmenu to place more content into. You must call from from {{HookFunction|SANDBOX|AddToolMenuTabs}} for it to add work correctly. ''(Note: This is ONLY used to create Utility tabs which are found on the right of the spawnmenu where you find your tools lists and such.)''
string tab: The name of the tab in creation
string name: The 'Unique' tab name (Tip: {{LibraryFunction|language|Add}})
string icon: (Optional) Directory to tab image
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/spawnmenu/GetCreationTabs Client Gets the CreationMenus table, which was filled with creation menu tabs from {{LibraryFunction|spawnmenu|AddCreationTab}}.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/spawnmenu/GetTools Client Gets a table of tools on the client.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/sql/Begin Shared Tells the engine a set of queries is coming. Will wait until {{LibraryFunction|sql|Commit}} is called to run them.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/sql/Commit Shared Tells the engine to execute a series of queries queued for execution.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/sql/LastError Shared Returns the last error from a SQLite query.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/sql/Query Shared Performs a query on the local SQLite database, returns a table as result set, nil if result is empty and false on error.
string query: The query to execute.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/sql/SQLStr Shared Escapes dangerous characters and symbols from user input used in a SQL Query.
string string: string to be escaped.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/sql/TableExists Shared Returns if the table with the specified name exists.
string tableName: The name of the table to check.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Stack/Pop Shared Pop an item from the stack
number amount: Optional amount of items you want to pop (defaults to 1)

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Stack/Push Shared Push an item onto the stack
any object: The item you want to push
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Stack/Size Shared Returns the size of the stack
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Stack/Top Shared Get the item at the top of the stack
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/steamworks/ApplyAddons Menu Updates the client's addons. Returns nothing. This is an internal function. It only works in the main menu.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/steamworks/Download Client Downloads preview image of supplied addon and saves it as a .cache file in garrysmod/cache folder.
string workshopPreviewID: The Preview ID of workshop item.
boolean unknown: Changing this argument did nothing in my tests.
function resultCallback: The function to process retrieved data. The first and only argument is a string, containing path to the saved file.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/steamworks/FileInfo Client Retrieves info about supplied Steam Workshop addon.
string workshopItemID: The ID of Steam Workshop item.
function resultCallback: The function to process retrieved data. The first and only argument is a table, containing all the info.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/steamworks/GetList Client Retrieves a customized list of Steam Workshop addons.
string type: The type of items to retrieve.
table tags: A table of tags to match.
number offset: How much of results to skip from first one. Mainly used for pages.
number numRetrieve: How much addons to retrieve.
number unknown: Unknown. Probably sorting method.
string userID: "0" to retrieve all addons, "1" to retrieve addons only published by you.
function resultCallback: The function to process retrieved data. The first and only argument is a table, containing all the info.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/steamworks/GetPlayerName Client Retrieves players name by his 64bit SteamID.
string SteamID64: The 64bit Steam ID of player.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/steamworks/IsSubscribed Client Returns whenever the client is subscribed to the specified Steam Workshop item.
string workshopItemID: The ID of the Steam Workshop item.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/steamworks/OpenWorkshop Client Opens the workshop website in the steam overlay browser.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/steamworks/RequestPlayerInfo Client Requests player info by his 64bit SteamID?
string SteamID64: The 64bit Steam ID of player.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/steamworks/SetShouldMountAddon Menu Sets if an addon should be enabled or disabled. Call [[steamworks/ApplyAddons|steamworks.ApplyAddons]] afterwards to update. This is an internal function, it currently only seems to work in the main menu.
string workshopItemID: The ID of the Steam Workshop item we should enable/disable
boolean shouldMount: If the addon should mount, true to do so, false not to do so.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/steamworks/ShouldMountAddon Client Returns whenever the specified Steam Workshop addon should be mounted or not.
string workshopItemID: The ID of the Steam Workshop

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/steamworks/Subscribe Menu Subscribes to the specified workshop addon. Call [[steamworks/ApplyAddons|steamworks.ApplyAddons]] afterwards to update. This function only works in the main menu. This is an internal function. Although you can use it to mount required content, it's strongly discouraged and should ''never'' be done without a users consent.
string workshopItemID: The ID of the Steam Workshop item we should subscribe to

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/steamworks/Unsubscribe Menu Unsubscribes to the specified workshop addon. Call [[steamworks/ApplyAddons|steamworks.ApplyAddons]] afterwards to update. This function only works in the main menu. This is an internal function. Use of this is strongly discouraged. This function should ''never'' be called without a user's consent and should not be called if the addon is currently in use (aka: the user is not in the main menu) as it may result in unexpected behaviour.
string workshopItemID: The ID of the Steam Workshop item we should unsubscribe from.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/steamworks/ViewFile Client Opens the workshop website for specified Steam Workshop addon in the Steam overlay browser.
string workshopItemID: The ID of workshop item.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/steamworks/Vote Menu Makes the user vote for the specified addon This is an internal function, it currently only seems to work in the main menu.
string workshopItemID: The ID of workshop item.
boolean upOrDown: Sets if the user should vote up/down. True makes them upvote, false down

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/steamworks/VoteInfo Client Retrieves vote info of supplied addon.
string workshopItemID: The ID of workshop item.
function resultCallback: The function to process retrieved data. The first and only argument is a table, containing all the info.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/string/byte Shared Returns the the chars in their ASCII representation.
string string: The string to get the chars from.
number startPos: The byte to extract, if the second parameter is specified, this will be used as start position.
number endPos: The endPos of in the string to get the bytes from.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/string/char Shared Takes the given bytes and converts them to a string.
vararg bytes: The bytes to get the string from.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/string/Comma Shared Inserts commas for every third digit.
number InputNumber: The input number to commafy

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/string/dump Shared Returns the binary bytecode of function.
function func: The function to get the bytecode of
boolean stripDebugInfo: True to strip the debug data, false to keep it

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/string/EndsWith Shared Returns weather the varg matches the end of the string provided.
string str: The string that your looking to find.
string varg: The argument you intend to use to compared to.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/string/Explode Shared Splits a string up wherever it finds the given separator.
string separator: The string will be separated wherever this sequence is found.
string str: The string to split up.
boolean use_patterns: Set this to true if your separator is a pattern.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/string/find Shared Attempts to find the specified substring in a string, uses patterns by default.
string haystack: The string to search in.
string needle: The string to find, can contain patterns if enabled.
number startPos: The position to start the search from, can be negative start position will be relative to the end position.
boolean noPatterns: Disable patterns.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/string/format Shared Formats the specified values into the string given.
string format: The string to be formatted.
vararg formatParameters: Values to be formatted into the string.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/string/FormattedTime Shared Returns formated string of the argument supplied.
number float: Time in seconds you wish to format.
string format: Weather you like to format the time manually.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/string/FromColor Shared Creates a string from a Color variable.
table color: The color to put in the string.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/string/GetChar Shared Returns char value from the specified index in the supplied string.
string str: The string that you will be searching with the supplied index.
number index: The index's value of the string to be returned.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/string/GetExtensionFromFilename Shared Returns extension of the file.
string file: String eg. file-path to get the file extensions from.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/string/GetFileFromFilename Shared Returns file name and extension.
string pathString: The string eg. file-path to get the file-name from.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/string/GetPathFromFilename Shared Returns the path only from a file's path.
string Inputstring: String to get path from.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/string/gfind Shared Returns an iterator function that is called for every complete match of the pattern, all sub matches will be passed as to the loop.
string data: The string to search in
string pattern: The pattern to search for

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/string/gmatch Shared Returns an iterator which will return either 1 value if no groupings are defined, or the group matches.
string hayStack: The string to search in.
string pattern: The pattern to match for.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/string/gsub Shared This functions main purpose is to replace certain character sequences in a string.
string string: String which should be modified.
string pattern: The pattern that defines what should be matched and eventually be replaced.
string or table or function replacement: In case of a string the matches sequence will be replaced with it. In case of a table, the matched sequence will be used as key and the table will tested for the key, if a value exists it will be used as replacement. In case of a function all matches will be passed as parameters to the function, the return value(s) of the function will then be used as replacement.
number maxReplaces: Maximum number of replacements to be made.

Param.name: string or table or function replacement

Overload.descr:
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/string/Implode Shared Joins all values of pieces together to a single string.
string seperator: The string will be used to join values in the table
table pieces: The elements to concatenate.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/string/JavascriptSafe Shared Replaces lua special characters with javascript special characters.
string str: The string that should have it's special characters replaced.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/string/Left Shared Returns everything left of supplied place of that string.
string str: The string to extract from.
number num: Amount of chars relative to the beginning.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/string/len Shared Counts the number of characters in the string (length).
string str: The string to find the length of.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/string/lower Shared Changes any upper-case characters in a string to lower-case.
string str: The string to convert.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/string/match Shared Finds a pattern in a string.
string string: String which should be searched in for matches.
string pattern: The pattern that defines what should be matched.
number startPosition: The start index to start the matching from, can be negative to start the match from a position relative to the end.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/string/NiceSize Shared Converts supplied number into bytes.
number num: The number to convert into bytes.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/string/NiceTime Shared Converts supplied number into string.
number num: The number to convert into string.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/string/rep Shared Repeats a string by the given value.
string str: The string to convert.
number repetitions: Timer to repeat, this values gets rounded internally.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/string/Replace Shared Replaces all occurrences of the supplied second string.
string str: The string we are seeking to replace an occurrence(s).
string find: What we are seeking to replace.
string replace: What to replace find with.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/string/reverse Shared Reverses a string.
string str: The string to be reversed.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/string/Right Shared Returns the last n-th characters of the string.
string str: The string to extract from.
number num: Amount of chars relative to the end.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/string/SetChar Shared Sets the character at the specific index of the string.
string InputString: The input string
number Index: The character index, 1 is the first from left.
string ReplacementChar: String to replace with.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/string/Split Shared Splits the string into a table of strings, separated by the second argument.
string Inputstring: String to split
string Separator: Character(s) to split with.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/string/StartWith Shared Returns if the first argument starts with the second argument.
string Inputstring: String to check.
string Start: String to check with.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/string/StripExtension Shared Removes the extension of a path.
string Inputstring: The path to change.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/string/sub Shared Returns a sub-string, starting from the character at position ''StartPos'' of the string (inclusive), and optionally ending at the character at position ''EndPos'' of the string (also inclusive). If EndPos is not given, the rest of the string is returned.
string string: The string you'll take a sub-string out of.
number StartPos: The position of the first character that will be included in the sub-string.
number EndPos: The position of the last character to be included in the sub-string.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/string/ToColor Shared Fetches a Color type from a string.
string Inputstring: The string to convert from.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/string/ToMinutesSeconds Shared Returns given time in "MM:SS" format.
number time: Time in seconds

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/string/ToMinutesSecondsMilliseconds Shared Returns given time in "MM:SS:MS" format.
number time: Time in seconds

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/string/ToTable Shared Splits the string into characters and creates a sequential table.
string string: The string you'll turn into a table.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/string/Trim Shared Removes leading and trailing matches of a string.
string Inputstring: The string to trim.
string Char: String to match.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/string/TrimLeft Shared Removes leading spaces/characters from a string.
string str: String to trim
string char: Custom character to remove

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/string/TrimRight Shared Removes trailing spaces/passed character from a string.
string str: String to remove from
string char: Custom character to remove, default is a space

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/string/upper Shared Changes any lower-case characters in a string to upper-case.
string str: The string to convert.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/surface/CreateFont Client Creates a new font.
string fontName: The new font name
table fontData: The font properties, see [[Structures/FontData|FontData]] structure.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/surface/DisableClipping Client Enables or disables the clipping used by the VGUI that limits the drawing operations to a panels bounds.
boolean disable: True to disable, false to enable the clipping

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/surface/DrawCircle Client Draws a hollow circle, made of dots.
number originX: The center x coordinate.
number originY: The center y coordinate.
number radius: The radius of the circle.
Color color: The color of the circle.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/surface/DrawLine Client Draws a line from one point to another.
number startX: The start x coordinate.
number startY: The start y coordinate.
number endX: The end x coordinate.
number endY: The end y coordinate.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/surface/DrawOutlinedRect Client Draws a hollow box with a border width of 1 px.
number x: The start x coordinate.
number y: The start y coordinate.
number w: The width.
number h: The height.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/surface/DrawPoly Client Draws a polygon with a maximum of 256 vertices. Only works properly with convex polygons. Attempting to render concave polygon may result in unexpected results.
table vertices: A table containing vertices. See [[Structures/PolygonVertex|PolygonVertex]] structure

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/surface/DrawRect Client Draws a solid rectangle on the screen.
number x: The X co-ordinate.
number y: The Y co-ordinate.
number width: The width of the rectangle.
number height: The height of the rectangle.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/surface/DrawText Client Draw the specified text on the screen, using the previously set position.
string text: The text to be rendered.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/surface/DrawTexturedRect Client Draw a textured rectangle with the given position and dimensions on the screen, using the current active texture.
number x: The X co-ordinate.
number y: The Y co-ordinate.
number width: The width of the rectangle.
number height: The height of the rectangle.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/surface/DrawTexturedRectRotated Client Draw a textured rotated rectangle with the given position and dimensions and angle on the screen, using the current active texture.
number x: The X co-ordinate, representing the center of the cube.
number y: The Y co-ordinate, representing the center of the cube.
number width: The width of the rectangle.
number height: The height of the rectangle.
number rotation: The rotation of the rectangle, in degrees.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/surface/DrawTexturedRectUV Client Draws a textured rectangle with a repeated or partial texture. U and V refer to texture coordinates. 0,0 is the bottom left corner of the texture, 1,0 is the bottom right, 1,1 is the top right and 0,1 is the top left.

If you are using a .png image, you must supply "noclamp" as second parameter for [[Global/Material|Material]]. number x: The X coordinate. number y: The Y coordinate. number width: The width of the rectangle. number height: The height of the rectangle. number startU: The U texture mapping of the rect origin. number startV: The V texture mapping of the rect origin. number endU: The U texture mapping of the rect end. number endV: The V texture mapping of the rect end.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/surface/GetHUDTexture Client Gets the HUD texture with the specified name.
string name: The name of the texture.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/surface/GetTextSize Client Returns the width and height (in pixels) of the given text, but only if the font has been set with {{LibraryFunction|surface|SetFont}}.
string text: The string to check the size of.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/surface/GetTextureID Client Returns the texture id of the texture with the given name/path.
string name/path: Name or path of the texture.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/surface/GetTextureSize Client Returns the size of the texture with the associated texture id.
number textureID: The texture id.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/surface/PlaySound Client Play a sound file directly on the client (such as UI sounds, etc).
string soundfile: The path to the sound file.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/surface/ScreenHeight Client Returns the height of the current client's screen.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/surface/ScreenWidth Client Returns the width of the current client's screen.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/surface/SetAlphaMultiplier Client Sets a multiplier that will influence all upcoming drawing operations.
number multiplier: The multiplier ranging from 0 to 1.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/surface/SetDrawColor Client Set the color of any future shapes to be drawn, can be set by either using r, g, b, a as separate values or by a {{Type|Color}} object, using a color object is not recommended to be created procedurally.
number r: The red value of color, or {{GlobalFunction|Color}}.
number g: The green value of color
number b: The blue value of color
number a: The alpha value of color

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/surface/SetFont Client Set the current font to be used for text operations later.
string fontName: The name of the font to use.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/surface/SetMaterial Client Sets the material to be used in all upcoming surface draw operations.
IMaterial material: The material to be used.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/surface/SetTextColor Client Set the color of any future text to be drawn, can be set by either using r, g, b, a as separate values or by a {{Type|Color}} object, using a color object is not recommended to be created procedurally.
number r: The red value of color, or {{GlobalFunction|Color}}.
number g: The green value of color
number b: The blue value of color
number a: The alpha value of color

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/surface/SetTextPos Client Set the position to draw any future text.
number x: The X co-ordinate.
number y: The Y co-ordinate.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/surface/SetTexture Client Sets the texture to be used in all upcoming surface draw operations.
number textureID: The id of the texture to draw with.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/system/IsLinux Shared Returns whether the current OS is Linux.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/system/IsOSX Shared Returns whether the current OS is OSX.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/system/IsWindows Shared Returns whether the current OS is Windows.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/system/SteamTime Shared Returns the synchronized steam time.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/system/UpTime Shared Returns the total uptime of operating system.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/table/Add Shared Adds the contents from one table to another
table Destination Table: The table to insert the new values to
table Source Table: The table to retrieve the values from

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/table/ClearKeys Shared Changes all keys to integers
table Original Table: The table to modify.
boolean Save Keys: Save the keys. This will insert a new field __key into each value, and should not be used if the table contains non-table values.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/table/CollapseKeyValue Shared Collapses a table with keyvalue structure
table input: Input table

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/table/concat Shared Concatenates the contents of a table to a string.
table tbl: The table to concatenate.
string concatenator: A seperator to insert between strings
number startPos: The key to start at
number endPos: The key to end at

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/table/Copy Shared Copies and returns an identical table.
table originalTable: The table to be copied.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/table/CopyFromTo Shared Erases all values from a table, and copies the values from another table to it.
table Source Table: The table to copy from.
table Destination Table: The table to write to.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/table/Count Shared Counts the amount of keys in a table.
table value: The table we wish to count the keys of

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/table/DeSanitise Shared Converts a table that has been sanitised with [[table/Sanitise]] back to its original form
table table: Table to be de-sanitised

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/table/Empty Shared Removes all values from a table
table Table: The table to empty.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/table/FindNext Shared Returns the value positioned after the supplied value in a table. If it isn't found then the first element in the table is returned
table table: Table to search
any value: Value to return element after

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/table/FindPrev Shared Returns the value positioned before the supplied value in a table. If it isn't found then the last element in the table is returned
table table: Table to search
any value: Value to return element before

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/table/ForceInsert Shared Inserts a value in to the given table even if the table is non-existent
table tab: Table to insert value in to
any value: Value to insert

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/table/foreach Shared Iterates for each pair in the table, calling the function with the key and value of the pair.
table Table: The table to iterate over.
function Function: The function to run for each key and value.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/table/ForEach Shared Iterates over a table and calls the given function for each key and element found
table tab: Table to iterate
function callback: Function to call for every key, value. Given the arguments: key, value

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/table/foreachi Shared Iterates for each numeric index in the table.
table table: The table to iterate over.
function func: The function to run for each index.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/table/GetFirstKey Shared Returns the first key found in the given table
table tab: Table to retrieve key from

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/table/GetFirstValue Shared Returns the first value found in the given table
table tab: Table to retrieve value from

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/table/GetLastKey Shared Returns the last key found in the given table
table tab: Table to retrieve key from

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/table/GetLastValue Shared Returns the last value found in the given table
table tab: Table to retrieve value from
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/table/getn Shared Returns the highest sequential index starting from 1.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/table/GetWinningKey Shared Returns a key of the supplied table with the highest number value.
table inputTable: The table to search in.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/table/HasValue Shared Checks if a table has a value
table tbl: Table to check
any value: Value to search for

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/table/Inherit Shared Copies any missing data from base to target
table target: Table to copy data to
table base: Table to copy data from

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/table/insert Shared Inserts a value into a table at the end of the table or at the given position.
table table: The table to insert the variable into.
number position: The position in the table to insert the variable.
any value: The variable to insert into the table.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/table/IsSequential Shared Returns whether or not the table's keys are sequential
table tab: Table to check

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/table/KeyFromValue Shared Returns the first key found to be containing the supplied value
table tab: Table to search
any value: Value to search for

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/table/KeysFromValue Shared Returns a table of keys containing the supplied value
table tab: Table to search
any value: Value to search for

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/table/LowerKeyNames Shared Returns a copy of the input table with all keys converted to be lowercase recursively
table table: Table to convert
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/table/maxn Shared Returns the highest numeric index.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/table/Merge Shared Merges the content of the second table with the content in the first one
table destination: The table you want the source table to merge with

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/table/Random Shared Returns a random value from the supplied table.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/table/remove Shared Removes a value from a table and shifts any other variables down to fill the gap.
table table: The table to remove the variable from.

table tbl: The table that will be searched.
any val: The value to find within the table.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/table/Reverse Shared Reverse a table.
table table: Table to reverse.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/table/Sanitise Shared Converts types: [[:Category:Vector|Vector]], [[:Category:Angle|Angle]] and booleans to be able to be converted to and from key-values. {{LibraryFunction|table|DeSanitise}} does the opposite

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/table/SortByKey Shared Sorts a table with key/value associations by its keys. For sorting a table with letters instead of numbers as keys, see [[Global/SortedPairs|SortedPairs]].

number entityIndex: Entity index of the emitting entity.
boolean doWhiz: Play the hit miss(whiz) sound.
number attachmentIndex: Attachment index to be used as origin.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/util/PixelVisible Client Returns the visibility of the PixVis with the specified parameters, visibility ranges from 0-1.
Vector position: The PixVis position.
number radius: The radius of the PixVis.
pixelvis_handle_t PixVis: The PixVis handle.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/util/PointContents Shared Returns the contents of the position specified.
Vector position: Position to get the contents sample from.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/util/PrecacheModel Shared Precaches a model for later use. Model is cached after being loaded once.
string modelName: The model to precache.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/util/PrecacheSound Shared Precaches a sound for later use. Sound is cached after being loaded once.
string soundName: The sound to precache.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/util/QuickTrace Shared Performs a trace with the given origin, direction and filter.
Vector origin: The origin of the trace.
Vector direction: The direction of the trace.
Entity filter: Entity which should be ignored. Can also be a table of entities.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/util/RelativePathToFull Shared Returns the absolute system path the file relative to /garrysmod/.
string file: The file to get the absolute path of.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/util/RemovePData Shared Removes PData of offline player using his SteamID
string steamID: SteamID of the player
string name: Variable name to remove

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/util/ScreenShake Shared Makes the screen shake
Vector pos: The origin of the effect
number amplitude: The strength of the effect
number frequency: The frequency of the effect in hz
number duration: The duration of the effect in seconds
number radius: The size of the effect in Garries

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/util/SetPData Shared Gets PData of offline player using his SteamID
string steamID: SteamID of the player
string name: Variable name to get value of
string default: The default value in case there's nothing stored

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/util/SetPData Shared Sets PData for offline player using his SteamID
string steamID: SteamID of the player
string name: Variable name to store the value in
string value: The value to store

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/util/SpriteTrail Server Adds a trail to the specified entity.
Entity ent: Entity to attach trail to
number attachmentID: Attachment ID of the entitiys model to attach trail to. If you are not sure, set this to 0
table color: Color of the trail, use {{LibraryFunction|Global|Color}}
boolean additive: Should the trail be additive or not
number startWidth: Start width of the trail
number endWidth: End width of the trail
number lifetime: How long it takes to transition from startWidth to endWidth
number textureRes: The resolution of trails texture. A good value can be calculated using this formula: 1 / ( startWidth + endWidth ) * 0.5
string texture: Path to the texture to use as a trail. Note that you should also include the ".vmt" or the game WILL crash!
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/util/Stack Shared Returns a new [[:Category:Stack|Stack]] object

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/util/SteamIDFrom64 Shared Given a 64bit SteamID will return a STEAM_0: style Steam ID
string id: The 64 bit Steam ID

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/util/SteamIDTo64 Shared Given a STEAM_0 style Steam ID will return a 64bit Steam ID
string id: The STEAM_0 style id

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/util/StringToType Shared Convert a string to a certain type
string str: The string to convert
string typename: The type to attempt to convert the string to ('vector','angle','float','bool','string'), case insensitive

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/util/TableToJSON Shared Converts a table to a JSON string.
table table: Table to convert.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/util/TableToKeyValues Shared Converts the given table into a key value string.
table table: The table to convert.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/util/TimerCycle Shared Returns the time since this function has been last called

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/util/tobool Shared Converts string or a number to a bool, if possible. Alias of {{LibraryFunction|Global|tobool}}.
any input: A string or a number to convert

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/util/TraceEntityHull Shared {{Deprecated|This function is broken and returns the same values all the time}} Traces from one entity to another.
Entity ent1: The first entity to trace from
Entity ent2: The second entity to trace to

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/util/TraceHull Shared Performs a hull trace with the given trace data.
table TraceData: The trace data to use. See {{Struct|HullTrace}}

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/util/TraceLine Shared Performs a trace with the given trace data.
table TraceData: The trace data to use. See {{Struct|Trace}}

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/util/TypeToString Shared Converts a type to a (nice, but still parsable) string
any input: What to convert

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Vector/Add Shared Adds the values of the second vector to the orignal vector, this function can be used to avoid garbage collection.
Vector vector: The other vector.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Vector/Angle Shared Returns an angle representing the normal of the vector.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Vector/AngleEx Shared Returns an angle between two vectors.
Vector vector: The second vector

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Vector/Cross Shared Calculates the cross product of the 2 vectors(the vectors that defined the normal created by the 2 vectors).
Vector otherVector: Vector to calculate the cross product with.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Vector/Distance Shared Returns the pythagorean distance between the vector and the other vector.
Vector otherVector: The vector to get the distance to.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Vector/DistToSqr Shared Returns the squared distance of 2 vectors, this is faster as calculating the square root is an expensive process.
Vector otherVec: The vector to calculate the distance to.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Vector/Dot Shared The dot product of two vectors is the product of the entries of the two vectors. A dot product returns the cosine of the angle between the two vectors multiplied by the length of both vectors. A dot product returns just the cosine of the angle if both vectors are normalized.
Vector rhs: The vector to calculate the dot product of

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Vector/DotProduct Shared Returns the dot product of the two vectors.
Vector Vector: The other vector.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Vector/GetNormal Shared Returns a normalized version of the vector.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Vector/GetNormalized Shared Returns a normalized version of the vector.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Vector/IsEqualTol Shared Returns if the vector is equal to another vector with the given tolerance.
Vector compare: The vector to compare to.
number tolerance: The tolerance range.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Vector/IsZero Shared Checks whenever all fields of the vector are 0.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Vector/Length Shared Returns the pythagorean length of the vector.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Vector/Length2D Shared Returns the length of the vector.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Vector/Length2DSqr Shared Returns the squared length of the vectors x and y value, this is faster as calculating the square root is an expensive process.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Vector/LengthSqr Shared Returns the squared length of the vector, this is faster than {{ClassFunction|Vector|Length}} as calculating the square root is an expensive process.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Vector/Mul Shared Scales the vector by the given number, that means x, y and z are multiplied by that value.
number multiplier: The value to scale the vector with.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Vector/Normalize Shared Normalizes the given vector.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Vector/Rotate Shared Rotates a vector by the given angle. Doesn't return anything, but rather changes the original angle.
Angle rotation: The angle to rotate the vector by.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Vector/Set Shared Copies the values from the second vector to the first vector.
Vector vector: The vector to copy from.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Vector/Sub Shared Substracts the values of the second vector from the orignal vector, this function can be used to avoid garbage collection.
Vector vector: The other vector.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Vector/ToScreen Client Translates the vectors position into 2D user screen coordinates.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Vector/WithinAABox Shared Returns whenever the given vector is in a box created by the 2 other vectors.
Vector boxStart: The first vector.
Vector boxEnd: The second vector.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Vector/Zero Shared Sets x, y and z to 0.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Vehicle/GetCameraDistance Shared Returns third person camera distance.
http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Vehicle/GetDriver Server Gets the driver of the vehicle, returns NULL if no drivers is present.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Vehicle/GetPassenger Server Gets the passenger of the vehicle, returns NULL if no drivers is present.
number passenger: The index of the passenger

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Vehicle/IsVehicle Shared Always returns true, as this overrides {{ClassFunction|Entity|IsVehicle}}.

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Vehicle/SetCameraDistance Shared Sets the third person camera distance of the vehicle.
number distance: Camera distance to set to

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Vehicle/SetThirdPersonMode Shared Sets the third person mode state.
boolean enable: Enable or disable the third person mode for this vehicle

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Vehicle/SetVehicleEntryAnim Server Sets the animation which the camera follows when entering this vehicle.

string name: Name of the created panel.

string element: The HUD element in question

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Weapon/IsWeapon Shared Checks if the entity is a weapon or not.

number speed: The value to set deploy speed to

http://wiki.garrysmod.com/page/Weapon/SetWeaponHoldType Shared Sets the hold type of the weapon. This must be called on '''both''' the server and the client to work properly
string name: Name of the hold type. Built in hold types: ;normal :No weapon stance, hands at sides ;melee :Hand raised above head, used for crowbar ;melee2 :Two-handed sword ;fist :Hands up punching hold type ;knife :Bent over stabbing hold type ;smg :Used for two-handed weapons such as the SMG1 ;ar2 :Used for two-handed weapons such as the AR2 ;pistol :Two hand grasp used for pistols ;rpg :Used for weapons that rest on your shoulder ;physgun :Used for the gravity/physics guns ;grenade :Used for items that you throw ;shotgun :Used for weapons such as shotguns ;crossbow :Used for crossbows and sniper rifles ;slam :Used for stuff you hold away from your face ;passive :Sort of an "idle" stance, like when the civil protection hold their smg's when they aren't aiming
